    <h1>Harry Potter</h1>

	<nav class="wikia-menu-button" >
	<a   href="/wiki/Harry_Potter?action=edit" data-id="source" id="ca-viewsource">

<div style="position:absolute; z-index:100; right:10px; top:10px;" class="metadata" id="administrator"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_Wiki:Featured_articles" 	class="image image-thumbnail link-internal" 	 title="Harry Potter Wiki:Featured articles"  	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="GSnitch"  	class="lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="GSnitch.JPG" 	data-image-name="GSnitch.JPG" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/GSnitch.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/30?cb=20120226221029"  	 width="30"  	 height="28"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/GSnitch.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/30?cb=20120226221029" 	 alt="GSnitch"  	class="" 	 	data-image-key="GSnitch.JPG" 	data-image-name="GSnitch.JPG" 	 	 width="30"  	 height="28"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a></div>
<div class="notice metadata" id="spoiler" style="text-align: center; background: snow; margin: 1em 05%; padding: 0 1em; border: #a00 1px solid;">
<p><a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Pottermore_logo.png/revision/latest?cb=20120816231228" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Pottermore logo"  	class="lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Pottermore_logo.png" 	data-image-name="Pottermore logo.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Pottermore_logo.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/150?cb=20120816231228"  	 width="150"  	 height="35"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Pottermore_logo.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/150?cb=20120816231228" 	 alt="Pottermore logo"  	class="" 	 	data-image-key="Pottermore_logo.png" 	data-image-name="Pottermore logo.png" 	 	 width="150"  	 height="35"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>
</p><p><b>Warning!</b>
</p>
At least some content in this article is derived from information featured in the latest update of <i><a href="/wiki/Pottermore" title="Pottermore">Pottermore</a></i>. As such, spoilers will be present within the article. Please take care when reading this article if you have not yet been through the latest update.</div>

<td class="infoboxlabel" style=""> Boggart

<tr>
<td class="infoboxlabel" style=""> Wand
</td><td class="infoboxcell" style=";">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">11", Holly, phoenix feather</a> 
</li><li><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_wand" title="Hermione Granger&#39;s wand">10¾", Vine, dragon heartstring</a> <small>(temporarily)</small>
</li><li><a href="/wiki/Blackthorn_wand" title="Blackthorn wand">10", Blackthorn, unknown core</a> <small>(temporarily)</small>
</li><li><a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy%27s_wand" title="Draco Malfoy&#39;s wand">10", Hawthorn, unicorn hair</a> <small>(temporarily)</small>
</li><li><a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">15", Elder, Thestral Hair</a> <small>(temporarily)</small>
</li></ul>
</td></tr>

<div class="infoboxfooter plainlinks" style="text-align: center; background: #9966CC"><span class="hidable-button"></span><a href="/wiki/Template:Ministry_of_Magic_individual_infobox" title="Template:Ministry of Magic individual infobox">[Source]</a></div>
<span class="content-bg rbottom" style=""><span class="r4" style="background: #9966CC"></span><span class="r3" style="background: #9966CC"></span><span class="r2" style="background: #9966CC"></span><span class="r1" style="background: #9966CC"></span></span></div>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>You are protected, in short, by your ability to <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a>! The only protection that can possibly work against the lure of power like <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>'s! In spite of all the temptation you have endured, all the suffering, you remain pure of heart, just as pure as you were at the age of eleven, when you stared into a <a href="/wiki/Mirror_of_Erised" title="Mirror of Erised">mirror that reflected your heart's desire</a>, and it showed you only the way to thwart <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, and not immortality or riches.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> to Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p><b>Harry James Potter</b> (b. <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">31 July</a>, <a href="/wiki/1980" title="1980">1980</a>) was a <a href="/wiki/Half-blood" title="Half-blood">half-blood</a> <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a>, the only child and son of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Potter</a> <small>(née <a href="/wiki/Evans" title="Evans" class="mw-redirect">Evans</a>)</small>, and one of the most famous wizards of modern times. In what proved to be <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1981)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1981)">a vain attempt</a> to circumvent a <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_first_prophecy" title="Sybill Trelawney&#39;s first prophecy">prophecy</a>, that stated a boy born at the end of <a href="/wiki/July" title="July">July</a> of <a href="/wiki/1980" title="1980">1980</a> could be able to defeat him, Lord Voldemort attempted to murder him when he was a year and three months old, shortly after murdering Harry's parents as they tried to protect him. This early, unsuccessful attempt to vanquish Harry led to Voldemort's first defeat and the end of the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First Wizarding War</a>. One consequence of Lily's sacrificial protection is that her orphaned son had to be raised by her only remaining blood relative, <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia Dursley</a>, where he was neither welcomed nor nurtured, but would stay alive, at least until he was seventeen years old. As the only known survivor of the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> (up to that point) Harry was already famous before he arrived at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a>.
</p><p>Early on his eleventh birthday, Harry learned that he was a wizard. He began attending Hogwarts in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a> and was Sorted into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> house. While at school, Harry became best friends with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>, and later became the youngest <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> Seeker in over a century and eventually captain of his house's <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">team</a>, winning two <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Cup" title="Quidditch Cup" class="mw-redirect">Quidditch Cups</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-10">[11]</a></sup> He became even better known in his early years for protecting the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> from Voldemort and saving Ron's sister <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a>. In <a href="/wiki/1994%E2%80%931995_school_year" title="1994–1995 school year">his fourth year</a>, Harry won the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, although the competition ended in tragedy with the death of <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Rebirth_of_Tom_Riddle" title="Rebirth of Tom Riddle">return</a> of Lord Voldemort. The <a href="/wiki/1995%E2%80%931996_school_year" title="1995–1996 school year">next school year</a>, Harry reluctantly taught and led <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a> and fought in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, during which he lost his godfather, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, who was a father/brother figure to him.
</p><p>Harry played a significant role in many other battles of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a> and hunted down and destroyed Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> along with Ron and Hermione. During the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, he personally witnessed the deaths of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a> and learned that <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a>, <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a>, and many others had fallen as well. He encountered Voldemort and sacrificed himself, knowing that his doing so was the only way to destroy the fragment of Voldemort's soul that was inside him. In Harry's near-death experience after Voldemort cursed him in the forest clearing, Dumbledore gave Harry advice and background information on Voldemort. When told he could choose to live or to "move on", Harry chose to live; after he awoke, he confronted Voldemort and defeated him once and for all.
</p><p>Harry was also notable for being the only known <a href="/wiki/Master_of_Death" title="Master of Death">Master of Death</a>, having united the three <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> at the age of only seventeen.
</p><p>After the war, Harry became <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> and married <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, with whom he had three children; <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Sirius</a>, named after his father and godfather, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Severus</a>, named after Severus Snape and Albus Dumbledore, and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter" title="Lily Potter">Lily Luna</a>, who was named after his mother and good friend <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>. Harry was also named the godfather of <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Ted Lupin</a>. He became Head of the <a href="/wiki/Auror_Office" title="Auror Office">Auror Office</a> in <a href="/wiki/2000s" title="2000s">2007</a> and occasionally went to Hogwarts to deliver <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> lectures. 
</p>
<nav id="toc" class="toc"><div id="toctitle"><h2>Contents</h2><span class="toctoggle">[<a href="#" class="internal" id="togglelink" data-show="show" data-hide="hide">show</a>]</span></div><ol></ol></nav>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Biography">Biography</span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Family_lineage">Family lineage</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>Now, yer mum an' dad were as good a witch an' wizard as I ever knew. <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy" title="Head Boy">Head Boy</a> an' <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy" title="Head Boy">Head Girl</a> at Hogwarts in their day!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> talking about Harry's parents<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Potters3.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140811062357" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Potters3"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Potters3.gif" 	data-image-name="Potters3.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Potters3.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20140811062357"  	 width="230"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Potters3.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20140811062357" 	 alt="Potters3"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Potters3.gif" 	data-image-name="Potters3.gif" 	 	 width="230"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potters3.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry as a baby with his parents</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">Potters</a> were an old and wealthy <a href="/wiki/Pure-blood" title="Pure-blood">pure-blood</a> family, and Harry inherited much wealth from his father <a href="/wiki/James_Potter" title="James Potter" class="mw-redirect">James</a>. The Potters descended from the <a href="/wiki/Peverell_family" title="Peverell family">Peverell family</a> through <a href="/wiki/Ignotus_Peverell" title="Ignotus Peverell">Ignotus Peverell</a>, who passed the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a> on to his descendants. The Potters are related to the <a href="/wiki/House_of_Gaunt" title="House of Gaunt">Gaunts</a>, who are descendants of the second brother <a href="/wiki/Cadmus_Peverell" title="Cadmus Peverell">Cadmus</a>. From him, the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> was passed onto his descendants as a family heirloom, set in a <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt%27s_Ring" title="Marvolo Gaunt&#39;s Ring">signet ring</a>.
</p><p>Conversely, Harry's mother <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Evans</a> was a <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-born</a>, the first witch in her family. Lily had an older sister, <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia</a>, who was forced to raise Harry alongside <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">her son</a>.
</p><p>As the Potters were considered a pure-blood family, Harry may be related paternally to various other wizards and witches through families like the <a href="/wiki/House_of_Black" title="House of Black">Blacks</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_family" title="Malfoy family">Malfoys</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasleys</a>, and the <a href="/wiki/Longbottom_family" title="Longbottom family">Longbottoms</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-11">[12]</a></sup> as well as many other <a href="/wiki/Pure-blood" title="Pure-blood">Pure-blood</a> families. According to the <a href="/wiki/Black_Family_Tree" title="Black Family Tree" class="mw-redirect">Black Family Tree</a>, Harry may possibly be the grandson of <a href="/wiki/Dorea_Black" title="Dorea Black">Dorea Potter </a><small>(née <a href="/wiki/Black" title="Black" class="mw-redirect">Black</a>)</small>, which would mean that he was a third cousin of <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, and even his wife <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, and the third cousin once removed of <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a>. Else, they would be related to him through Dorea's husband <a href="/wiki/Charlus_Potter" title="Charlus Potter">Charlus Potter</a>, though the relationship between Harry and Charlus wasn't specified.<sup id="cite_ref-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-12">[13]</a></sup>
</p><p>Harry's only known maternal relatives were the <a href="/wiki/Evans_family" title="Evans family">Evans</a> and <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursley</a> families.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Childhood_.281980-1991.29">Childhood <small>(1980-1991)</small></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>This boy will be famous, a legend. I wouldn't be surprised if today was known as Harry Potter day in future. There will be books written about Harry, every child in our <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">world</a> will know his name.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 220px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8c/Harrypotter.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20141122213518" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harrypotter"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harrypotter.JPG" 	data-image-name="Harrypotter.JPG" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8c/Harrypotter.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/220?cb=20141122213518"  	 width="220"  	 height="137"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8c/Harrypotter.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/220?cb=20141122213518" 	 alt="Harrypotter"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harrypotter.JPG" 	data-image-name="Harrypotter.JPG" 	 	 width="220"  	 height="137"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harrypotter.JPG" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry as a baby, faces death for the first time</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry Potter was born on <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">31 July</a>, <a href="/wiki/1980" title="1980">1980</a> to <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily</a> and <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James Potter</a>, members of the (original) <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> at the height of the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First Wizarding War</a>; he was born "hours" after classmate Neville Longbottom.<sup id="cite_ref-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-13">[14]</a></sup> From birth, he lived in hiding with his parents after Voldemort marked them for death. They lived in the village of <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a> in a home put under the <a href="/wiki/Fidelius_Charm" title="Fidelius Charm">Fidelius Charm</a> to keep them hidden. They also had planned to make Sirius their Secret-Keeper, but on his advice, they changed this designation to <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, whom they thought would be less suspicious. In a terrible turn of fate, it happened that Pettigrew was a spy for Voldemort. He betrayed James and Lily, then faked his own death, and framed Sirius for both.
</p><p>When Harry was born Lily held a <a href="/wiki/Christening_of_Harry_Potter" title="Christening of Harry Potter">christening</a>; it was quiet, quick, and only James, Lily, Harry and Sirius were there. For Harry's first birthday, Sirius bought him a <a href="/wiki/Toy_broomstick" title="Toy broomstick">toy broomstick</a>. The Potters owned <a href="/wiki/Potters%27_cat" title="Potters&#39; cat">a cat</a> but it is unknown what happened to it after Voldemort's attack.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140804174322" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Voldemort arrives"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Voldemort_arrives.gif" 	data-image-name="Voldemort arrives.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140804174322"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Voldemort_arrives.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140804174322" 	 alt="Voldemort arrives"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Voldemort_arrives.gif" 	data-image-name="Voldemort arrives.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_arrives.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort arrives at <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a> intending to murder Harry on 31 October, 1981</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On the evening of Hallowe'en 1981, Voldemort arrived at Godric's Hollow and murdered James and Lily; he started with James, who tried to stand up to him; unfortunately he did not have his wand with him and was killed immediately. Lord Voldemort then advanced on Lily, who died protecting Harry. Her <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">sacrifice</a> prevented the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> from working on Harry. Additionally, her <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a> for Harry became a barrier protecting her son, when Voldemort attempted the curse on Harry, it backfired and instead of killing Harry Voldemort lost all his powers and his physical form was obliterated, but was saved from death by the five Horcruxes he had made up to that point. These included <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_diary" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s diary" class="mw-redirect">his diary</a>, <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt%27s_Ring" title="Marvolo Gaunt&#39;s Ring">Marvolo Gaunt's Ring</a>, <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Locket" class="mw-redirect">Salazar Slytherin's Locket</a>, <a href="/wiki/Helga_Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Helga Hufflepuff&#39;s Cup" class="mw-redirect">Helga Hufflepuff's Cup</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Rowena_Ravenclaw%27s_Diadem" title="Rowena Ravenclaw&#39;s Diadem" class="mw-redirect">Rowena Ravenclaw's Diadem</a><sup id="cite_ref-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-14">[15]</a></sup> Later, this also included Harry himself because Voldemort not only gave part of his powers to Harry, he also accidentally gave part of his soul. This event made Harry the only person to have survived the Killing Curse, thus giving him the title "<i>The Boy Who Lived</i>". The failed curse left a <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">lightning-bolt scar on his forehead</a>. The scar would be a bane and a blessing to Harry in the years to come, as it opened a <a href="/wiki/Mind-reading" title="Mind-reading">telepathic link between</a> Voldemort and himself.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0d/Godric_flash.PNG/revision/latest?cb=20131017031704" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Godric flash"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Godric_flash.PNG" 	data-image-name="Godric flash.PNG" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0d/Godric_flash.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20131017031704"  	 width="240"  	 height="98"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0d/Godric_flash.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20131017031704" 	 alt="Godric flash"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Godric_flash.PNG" 	data-image-name="Godric flash.PNG" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="98"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Godric_flash.PNG" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Potter_cottage" title="Potter cottage" class="mw-redirect">The Potter family home</a> under attack</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The house at Godric's Hollow was destroyed in the attack, and Hagrid rescued Harry from the ruined house. Hagrid was given specific orders to take him to his <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Aunt</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Uncle</a>, but he was intercepted by Sirius, who pleaded for Hagrid to give the baby to him. Hagrid refused, saying that he was under orders from Dumbledore to get Harry to <a href="/wiki/Privet_Drive" title="Privet Drive">Privet Drive</a> as quickly as possible.
</p><p>Sirius, though reluctant, relented and gave Hagrid his flying motorcycle to take Harry to Privet Drive. Dumbledore left a letter of explanation to the Dursleys, but they never relayed it to Harry. Instead, Harry spent the next decade of his life in their strict and miserable home without knowing he was a wizard.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Life_at_Privet_Drive">Life at Privet Drive</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>I'm not having <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">one</a> in the house, Petunia! Didn't we swear when we took him in we'd stamp out <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">that dangerous nonsense</a>?</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon Dursley</a> refusing that Harry was a wizard<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/B1C1M3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213634" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="B1C1M3"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="B1C1M3.jpg" 	data-image-name="B1C1M3.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/B1C1M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213634"  	 width="240"  	 height="105"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/B1C1M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213634" 	 alt="B1C1M3"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="B1C1M3.jpg" 	data-image-name="B1C1M3.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="105"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B1C1M3.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry is delivered to 4 Privet Drive in <a href="/wiki/1981" title="1981">1981</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's life at Privet Drive was quite difficult. As they were Muggles, they had no understanding of <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magic</a>, and even though his aunt and uncle knew about his lineage, they wanted absolutely nothing to do with it. The Dursleys considered themselves a "normal" family and despised anything out of the ordinary. They lied to Harry about his parents, claiming they had died in a car crash and that James was an unemployed drunk. When he tried to remember them, all he saw was a <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">green flash</a>. He tried to understand what it was, or if it was from the car crash, but he simply could not. Petunia and Vernon forbade Harry from asking questions, particularly those regarding his parents. In addition, the Dursleys refused to have pictures of Lily and James, and did their best to avoid the subject of Harry's parents altogether. 
</p><p>They resented Harry for his magic, which was sporadic, but evident. They discouraged any sort of imagination, insisting upon "<i>stamping that rubbish out</i>", and screamed at or punished Harry — sometimes by depriving him of meals — whenever something "unusual" occurred. The way he was treated bordered on abuse. In his youth, Harry could make strange things happen without understanding why he could, as no one had told him that he was a wizard. For instance, after Petunia sheared off all his messy hair using a pair of <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley%27s_kitchen_scissors" title="Petunia Dursley&#39;s kitchen scissors">kitchen scissors</a> in fury that it would not lay flat, leaving him almost completely bald with only the fringe at the front, it had <a href="/wiki/Hair-regrowing_spells" title="Hair-regrowing spells">grown all the way back</a>, and to its previous messy state at that, by the next morning. Harry was punished, even though he had not done anything on purpose. Another time, <a href="/wiki/Dedalus_Diggle" title="Dedalus Diggle">Dedalus Diggle</a> bowed to him in a shop, and Petunia ferociously interrogated Harry as to how he knew the man before leaving the shop very quickly.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6f/Tumblr_mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140621030117" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6f/Tumblr_mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140621030117"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6f/Tumblr_mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140621030117" 	 alt="Tumblr mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_mjxs7zmnyK1qew2ypo4_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's bedroom beneath the staircase</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The Dursleys spoiled and pampered their son <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a> and paid almost no attention to Harry; indeed, what little attention they did pay to him was entirely negative. All his clothes were hand-me-downs from Dudley and were far too large for Harry. He was forced to sleep in the <a href="/wiki/Cupboard_under_the_stairs" title="Cupboard under the stairs" class="mw-redirect">cupboard under the stairs</a>, while his cousin got two bedrooms to himself. They ordered Harry around like a slave for most of his childhood. In time, Dudley started bullying Harry. The Dursleys took Dudley and a friend to spectacular places every year for his birthday, but the only thing Harry got for his birthday was one of Vernon's old socks. The Dursleys also hid evidence of Harry's existence by not having pictures of him in the house. During the times that Harry wasn't being made to work or bullied, he was provided with little entertainment and sometimes tried to entertain himself by playing games such as <a href="/wiki/Solitaire" title="Solitaire">solitaire</a>.
</p><p>Harry's hardship, however, was necessary as by returning to live with his mother's only living blood relative, the <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">protection</a> that Lily gave Harry would continue. While Harry could call that place home, he could not be harmed. However, this charm would be broken when Harry turned seventeen years old, or when he no longer called <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> his home. Furthermore, Harry's neighbour, <a href="/wiki/Arabella_Figg" title="Arabella Figg">Arabella Figg</a>, was a <a href="/wiki/Squib" title="Squib">Squib</a> working undercover for the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> to keep tabs on Harry's well-being. Unfortunately for Harry, to maintain favour with the Dursleys, she was forced to give him a lousy time whenever she had to look after him, as the Dursleys would never have let him go if they knew Harry was enjoying himself, a possibility that infuriated them.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest?cb=20131023144655" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="HarryParseltongue"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="HarryParseltongue.png" 	data-image-name="HarryParseltongue.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20131023144655"  	 width="240"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/49/HarryParseltongue.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20131023144655" 	 alt="HarryParseltongue"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="HarryParseltongue.png" 	data-image-name="HarryParseltongue.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HarryParseltongue.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry speaking <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a> to the boa constrictor at the zoo</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On Dudley's eleventh birthday, the Dursleys went to the <a href="/wiki/Zoo" title="Zoo">zoo</a> with Dudley's best friend <a href="/wiki/Piers_Polkiss" title="Piers Polkiss">Piers Polkiss</a>. Unfortunately for the Dursleys, they had to take Harry with them, as Mrs Figg had broken her leg and there was no one to take Harry, and they refused to leave him alone in their house. At the zoo, Harry unintentionally made the glass of an enclosure containing a boa constrictor disappear. This allowed the snake to slither out of his cage which scared Dudley into thinking it was after him. Harry was able to communicate with the freed boa in <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>, which thanked Harry briefly, then slithered out of the reptile house calmly. After this incident, the enraged Dursleys sentenced Harry to his <a href="/wiki/Cupboard_Under_the_Stairs" title="Cupboard Under the Stairs">cupboard</a> until the beginning of the summer holidays.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="St._Grogory.27s_Primary_School">St. Grogory's Primary School</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>At school, Harry had no one. Everybody knew that Dudley's gang hated that odd Harry Potter in his baggy old clothes and broken glasses, and nobody liked to disagree with Dudley's gang.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;The reason Harry had no friends at school<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e3/HP1-0270.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141201172421" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="HP1-0270"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="HP1-0270.jpg" 	data-image-name="HP1-0270.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e3/HP1-0270.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141201172421"  	 width="240"  	 height="103"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e3/HP1-0270.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141201172421" 	 alt="HP1-0270"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="HP1-0270.jpg" 	data-image-name="HP1-0270.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="103"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HP1-0270.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry as he looked around the time he attended primary school</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure> 
<p>Harry attended <a href="/wiki/St._Grogory%27s_Primary_School" title="St. Grogory&#39;s Primary School">St. Grogory's Primary School</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Muggle" title="Muggle">Muggle</a> school, with Dudley. He had no friends there, since all the students were afraid of <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley%27s_gang" title="Dudley Dursley&#39;s gang">Dudley's gang</a>, all of whose members hated Harry. In particular, Dudley's friends liked to play a unique game known as <a href="/wiki/Harry_Hunting" title="Harry Hunting">Harry Hunting</a> which involved chasing Harry. Although he was good at sports, he was the last picked for a team because no one wanted to admit to Dudley that they liked him, rather than because he was no good. Harry got decent, if not good grades at school. On one occasion, Harry accidentally <a href="/wiki/Colour_Change_Charm" title="Colour Change Charm">turned his teacher's wig blue</a>; on another, he accidentally <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparated</a> onto the school kitchen roof when escaping from Dudley's gang; and on a third, he made Dudley's old jumper shrink as aunt Petunia tried to shove it over his head. These incidents always enraged the Dursleys, and after each, they would punish Harry by exiling him to the cupboard — except after the jumper incident.
</p><p>If Harry had not gone to Hogwarts, then he would have attended <a href="/wiki/Stonewall_High" title="Stonewall High">Stonewall High</a>, a Muggle secondary school.<sup id="cite_ref-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-15">[16]</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Discovery_of_being_a_wizard">Discovery of being a wizard</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone (film)">"<i>Yer a <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a>, Harry, and a thumpin' good one I'd wager, once yer trained up a bit, o' course.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> upon meeting Harry for the first time<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912122002" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Hogwarts letter"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Hogwarts_letter.gif" 	data-image-name="Hogwarts letter.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912122002"  	 width="245"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8a/Hogwarts_letter.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912122002" 	 alt="Hogwarts letter"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Hogwarts_letter.gif" 	data-image-name="Hogwarts letter.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hogwarts_letter.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry finally receives his <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts" title="Hogwarts" class="mw-redirect">Hogwarts</a> acceptance letter</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had no birthday celebrations until the day he turned 11, which was the same day that he discovered the exceptional reality about his <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">identity</a>. The week of Harry's birthday, hundreds of letters began arriving at the Dursleys's home, addressed to him from a place called <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a>. When the Dursleys saw the first letter was addressed as "<i>cupboard under the stairs</i>", they panicked at the thought of Harry's ill treatment being observed and transferred him to <a href="/wiki/The_Smallest_Bedroom" title="The Smallest Bedroom">Dudley's second bedroom</a>, which soon appeared on letters as the "<i>smallest bedroom</i>", When Harry's Uncle Vernon first read the letter, he turned a pale, <a href="/wiki/Porridge" title="Porridge">porridge</a> grey out of fear that wizards were trying to contact Harry. Because of this, <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon Dursley</a> tried to destroy the letters in a futile attempt to keep Harry from his destiny. But the letters kept coming in increasingly larger quantities, to the point where they literally started flying out of the fireplace, and as they did, the Dursleys saw no alternative but to flee from them. This was not enough to enable the Dursleys to avoid the letters, as the <a href="/wiki/Owl" title="Owl">owls</a> carrying these letters followed them wherever they went. In a final desperate move, the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> relocated themselves to <a href="/wiki/Hut-on-the-Rock" title="Hut-on-the-Rock">a shack</a> on a rocky island in the edge of the sea.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111131533" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry birthday"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_birthday.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry birthday.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111131533"  	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Harry_birthday.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111131533" 	 alt="Harry birthday"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_birthday.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry birthday.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_birthday.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>'s birthday cake to Harry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At midnight on Harry's <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">birthday</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> appeared in person to find out why Harry had not received his letter. He was infuriated by the Dursleys and explained to Harry, in spite of Vernon's obstinate protests, that he was a wizard, how his parents died, and that he was to be sent to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
</p><p>This would be Harry's first birthday celebration, and Hagrid gave him a small homemade <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_birthday_cake_from_Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Harry Potter&#39;s birthday cake from Rubeus Hagrid">birthday cake</a> and later, a <a href="/wiki/Snowy_Owl" title="Snowy Owl">Snowy Owl</a>, whom Harry named <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a>. Hagrid took Harry to the <a href="/wiki/Leaky_Cauldron" title="Leaky Cauldron">Leaky Cauldron</a>, where he learned that he was famous. He met <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirinus Quirrell</a>, his soon-to-be <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> teacher at Hogwarts, the Inn-keeper, <a href="/wiki/Tom" title="Tom">Tom</a>, a witch named <a href="/wiki/Doris_Crockford" title="Doris Crockford">Doris Crockford</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Dedalus_Diggle" title="Dedalus Diggle">Dedalus Diggle</a>, the man who had bowed to Harry several years earlier. Hagrid then took Harry to <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a>, where he learned more about his fame in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">Wizarding world</a> and that his parents had left him a small fortune in <a href="/wiki/Vault_687" title="Vault 687">a vault</a> at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest?cb=20140712235551" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="00Wand shopPM"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="00Wand_shopPM.png" 	data-image-name="00Wand shopPM.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140712235551"  	 width="240"  	 height="111"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/00Wand_shopPM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140712235551" 	 alt="00Wand shopPM"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="00Wand_shopPM.png" 	data-image-name="00Wand shopPM.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="111"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:00Wand_shopPM.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry at Ollivanders buying his <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">wand</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry bought his first <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">wand</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Wandmaker" title="Wandmaker">wandmaker</a> <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Garrick Ollivander</a> that day. The wand that chose Harry was made of holly wood and had a phoenix-feather core; it was eleven inches long and supple. The <a href="/wiki/Phoenix_feather" title="Phoenix feather">phoenix feather</a> at the core came from <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>'s phoenix <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a>. It was crafted by Garrick Ollivander, who had also created a twin wand. This wand had been made from <a href="/wiki/Yew" title="Yew">yew</a>, and contained the only other feather supplied by Fawkes. This <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_wand" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s wand">twin wand</a> had <a href="/wiki/1938" title="1938" class="mw-redirect">long ago</a> chosen <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a> as its wielder. But Riddle, after he turned to evil and assumed the alias of Lord Voldemort, ended up using this wand to attack Harry and his <a href="/wiki/Potter_Family" title="Potter Family" class="mw-redirect">parents</a>. The two wands, sharing the same <a href="/wiki/Phoenix" title="Phoenix">phoenix</a> origin, had a <a href="/wiki/Priori_Incantatem" title="Priori Incantatem">unique connection</a> which would prevent them from successfully <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duelling</a> against each other.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Hogwarts_years_.281991-1997.29">Hogwarts years <small>(1991-1997)</small></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="First_year">First year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone (film)"><b>Dumbledore</b>: "<i>Harry, do you know why Professor Quirrell couldn't bear to have you touch him? It was because of your mother. She sacrificed herself for you. And that kind of act leaves a mark... This kind of mark cannot be seen. It lives in your very skin.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>What is it?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Dumbledore</b>: "<i><a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">Love</a>, Harry. Love.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> to Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213530" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="HP1-1294"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="HP1-1294.jpg" 	data-image-name="HP1-1294.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213530"  	 width="240"  	 height="106"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/HP1-1294.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213530" 	 alt="HP1-1294"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="HP1-1294.jpg" 	data-image-name="HP1-1294.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="106"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HP1-1294.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's scar hurts during the sorting ceremony when he makes eye contact with <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry Potter was further guided by destiny when he met his lifelong best friends <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> while riding the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>. The <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> <a href="/wiki/Hatstall" title="Hatstall">took a while</a> to decide where to place Harry. It considered putting Harry into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>, but changed its mind at Harry's insistence, as he had heard about the Dark Wizards who had been in the house. All three were Sorted into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> House on their first evening at school. While Harry immediately took to Ron, he did not immediately befriend Hermione, though he was nicer to her than Ron was. On Hallowe'en, a <a href="/wiki/Mountain_Troll" title="Mountain Troll">Mountain Troll</a> was let into the school. The students were sent back to their <a href="/wiki/Common_Room" title="Common Room" class="mw-redirect">Common Rooms</a>, but Harry realised that Hermione did not know about the Troll, since she was in the bathroom crying as Ron had made fun of her earlier in the day. Harry and Ron went to the girls' bathroom and found the troll bearing down on Hermione. After Harry stuck his wand up its nose, Ron was able to knock the troll out with its own club. Hermione lied to the professors when they came to investigate to keep Harry and Ron out of trouble. From that point on, the three were best friends.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/97/Quidditch%2C_first_year.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213858" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Quidditch, first year"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Quidditch%2C_first_year.jpg" 	data-image-name="Quidditch, first year.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/97/Quidditch%2C_first_year.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213858"  	 width="240"  	 height="93"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/97/Quidditch%2C_first_year.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213858" 	 alt="Quidditch, first year"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Quidditch%2C_first_year.jpg" 	data-image-name="Quidditch, first year.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="93"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Quidditch,_first_year.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry playing in his first <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match against <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry discovered at his first <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomstick</a> flying lesson that he was a natural flyer. When <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> took <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Remembrall" title="Remembrall">Remembrall</a>, Harry retrieved it using his broom to fly up and catch it. He was so skilled that he was able to join the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a>, becoming the youngest <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a> in a century, since <a href="/wiki/First_year" title="First year">first year</a> students normally were not allowed to have their own <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomsticks</a>. Before Harry's first <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match, he received the new <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2000" title="Nimbus 2000">Nimbus 2000</a>, a top of the line racing broom, from <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a>. During that Quidditch match, Harry's broom was jinxed, and he <i>lost control</i>, which caused him to nearly fall off.
</p><p><a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> saw <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">Professor</a> <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> staring at Harry and mumbling an incantation. <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> went to Snape's row and under his seat and cast <a href="/wiki/Lacarnum_Inflamarae" title="Lacarnum Inflamarae" class="mw-redirect">Lacarnum Inflamarae</a> causing the end of his robes to catch on <a href="/wiki/Fire" title="Fire">fire</a>. As soon as Snape stopped making eye contact with Harry, he regained control of his <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broom</a> and zoomed toward the ground. On his way, he caught the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">snitch</a> in his mouth, almost swallowing it, ending the match and leaving <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> victorious. It was later revealed that Quirrell was the one jinxing Harry's broom, and Snape was trying to perform a counter-jinx, much to Harry, Ron, and Hermione's surprise. Meanwhile, <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, long presumed dead, was secretly mounting a return using the new <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">Professor</a> of <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>, <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirinus Quirrell</a>, as a host body, he was able to search for the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a>, which he believed would restore him to his body and grant him everlasting life. Voldemort was thwarted by Harry, with the help of Ron and Hermione. Harry, Ron and Hermione suffered a series of exhausting and difficult challenges down in the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone_chambers" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone chambers" class="mw-redirect">Philosopher's Stone chambers</a> in an attempt to stop the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher&#39;s Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> being stolen.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/I38993mfjwik939.png/revision/latest?cb=20140120171937" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="I38993mfjwik939"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="I38993mfjwik939.png" 	data-image-name="I38993mfjwik939.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/I38993mfjwik939.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140120171937"  	 width="240"  	 height="122"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/I38993mfjwik939.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140120171937" 	 alt="I38993mfjwik939"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="I38993mfjwik939.png" 	data-image-name="I38993mfjwik939.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="122"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:I38993mfjwik939.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Quirrell" title="Quirrell" class="mw-redirect">Quirrell</a> and <a href="/wiki/Voldemort" title="Voldemort" class="mw-redirect">Voldemort</a> in confrontation</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Throughout the challenges the group was picked off and in the final task Harry was left on his own when Hermione was unable to pass through, this left Harry to face <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> alone. Harry and Quirrell (who had been harbouring Voldemort with him all year) fought one another and Harry learned of his mother's protective charm when he blistered Quirrell's face by touching it with his hands.
</p><p>Overcome by his struggle for the Stone and his injuries, Harry then passed out, just as Dumbledore arrived and took the Stone. When Harry awoke in the hospital three days later, Dumbledore informed him that Quirrell had been abandoned by Voldemort, leaving him to die. During his unconsciousness in the Hospital Wing, Harry missed the last Quidditch match of the year: Gryffindor vs. Ravenclaw, the latter house winning. At the end-of-year feast, Harry was awarded an extra 60 points for Gryffindor by Dumbledore for pure nerve and outstanding courage, as Ron and Hermione were awarded 50 and Neville Longbottom 10, eventually winning Gryffindor the House Cup, breaking Slytherin's chance of winning a seventh year in a row.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Second_year">Second year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (film)"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>You're a <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parselmouth</a>! Why didn't you tell us?... Now the whole school is gonna think you're <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">his</a> great-great-great-grandson or something.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>But I'm not! I can't be.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>He lived a thousand years ago. For all we know, you could be.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry finds out he is a Parselmouth<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213655" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg" 	data-image-name="2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122213655"  	 width="140"  	 height="195"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b2/2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122213655" 	 alt="2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg" 	data-image-name="2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="195"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:2001-Harry-Potter-and-the-Sorcerer-s-Stone-Promotional-Shoot-HQ-harry-potter-11097228-1600-1960.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his second year, <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's second year started out badly, and gradually got worse. Throughout the preceding summer, Harry had not been in contact with any of his friends, had heard no news from the wizarding world, and had been mistreated by his family, as usual. The Dursleys had gone so far as to ban Harry from saying words pertaining or related to magic in general. The Dursleys had also gained a fear of Harry's newly discovered magical abilities, which he often exploited in order to get them to leave him alone. The evening of his twelfth birthday, Harry learned that the reason his friends had not been in contact with him was that a <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a> named <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> had been stopping letters from coming to Harry. When Harry questioned Dobby as to why, Dobby told him that Harry Potter must not return to Hogwarts. Harry refused, saying the wizarding world was where he belonged, and Dobby set out to cause him trouble. During a business meeting between <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon</a> and <a href="/wiki/Mason" title="Mason">Mr Mason</a>, who brought his <a href="/wiki/Mason%27s_wife" title="Mason&#39;s wife">wife</a> with him, Dobby used his magical powers to drop Petunia's master-piece pudding, and then shortly afterwards disappeared, framing Harry for the chaos. Dobby's act of magic caused Harry to receive a warning from the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> and to be imprisoned in his room by the Dursleys. Despite their efforts, Harry was rescued by <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> and his brothers, <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a>. Harry had packed his bags and loaded the Weasleys' magic <a href="/wiki/Flying_Ford_Anglia" title="Flying Ford Anglia">flying car</a>. Harry and the brothers arrived at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">the Burrow</a> in the early hours of the morning, hoping not to be noticed. However, they were, and Mrs Weasley was furious.
</p><p>Dobby's first attempt at stopping Harry from returning had failed, so he continued trying. When Harry and the Weasleys arrived at <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a>, Dobby sealed the entrance to <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform Nine and Three-Quarters</a> early and stopped Harry and Ron from passing through the wall to get on the Hogwarts Express. However, this did not stop Harry from returning to Hogwarts, as he and Ron used the Weasleys' <a href="/wiki/Flying_Ford_Anglia" title="Flying Ford Anglia">Flying Ford Anglia</a> to follow the train to Hogwarts. They arrived later than they had hoped, but all in one piece; until Ron accidentally drove the flying car into the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a> and broke his wand.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/CHAMBERsterces.PNG/revision/latest?cb=20081228115422" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="CHAMBERsterces"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="CHAMBERsterces.PNG" 	data-image-name="CHAMBERsterces.PNG" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/CHAMBERsterces.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20081228115422"  	 width="235"  	 height="138"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/CHAMBERsterces.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20081228115422" 	 alt="CHAMBERsterces"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="CHAMBERsterces.PNG" 	data-image-name="CHAMBERsterces.PNG" 	 	 width="235"  	 height="138"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:CHAMBERsterces.PNG" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The writing on the wall "<i>The Chamber of Secrets has been opended. Enemies of the heir... beware</i>"</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, Harry's year at Hogwarts was destined not to improve in the least. Throughout the year, the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Gilderoy Lockhart</a>, humiliated Harry repeatedly by dragging Harry into the spotlight against Harry's will. During a duelling class led by Lockhart, Harry revealed himself to his fellow students and members of staff to be a <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parselmouth</a>, an uncommon skill that was normally associated with dark wizards. This brought on a great deal of trouble for Harry, since the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> had been re-opened, and it was the "Heir of Slytherin" who was deemed responsible. Once the chamber had been unsealed, there were various attacks on <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-born</a> pupils, including Harry's best friend Hermione Granger.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Polyjuice.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213717" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Polyjuice"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Polyjuice.jpg" 	data-image-name="Polyjuice.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Polyjuice.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122213717"  	 width="230"  	 height="118"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Polyjuice.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122213717" 	 alt="Polyjuice"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Polyjuice.jpg" 	data-image-name="Polyjuice.jpg" 	 	 width="230"  	 height="118"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Polyjuice.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a>, used by the <a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">Trio</a> in an attempt to gain information from <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>These attacks were believed to have been carried out by the heir, whom many believed to be Harry, but Harry believed that <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> was responsible. In order to prove their hypothesis, Hermione brewed <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a>, that Harry and Ron used to change their physical appearances to that of Crabbe and Goyle, so they could try to get information from Malfoy. They learned that Malfoy was not the heir and that he had no idea who the attacker was. Hermione, however, did not join the boys in this adventure as she had accidentally used a cat hair in her potion, causing her to spend weeks in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_wing" title="Hospital wing" class="mw-redirect">hospital wing</a>. Prior to Valentine's Day, Harry discovered a <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">diary</a>, and while writing in it, Harry learned that the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber</a> had been opened fifty years ago and that <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> had been accused of the crime.
</p><p>By this time, Hermione had a different theory. She believed that the monster responsible for these attacks was a <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Basilisk" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Basilisk" class="mw-redirect">basilisk</a> and conducted research into her theory. The morning Hermione was attacked, she and <a href="/wiki/Penelope_Clearwater" title="Penelope Clearwater">Penelope Clearwater</a> had been using a mirror to look around corners for any attacking predator. Hermione had done enough research to figure that the basilisk had been moving around the school using the pipe system and scribbled her theory down on a scrap piece of paper torn out of a book. She was attacked the same day, and her paralysed body was taken to the school's hospital wing.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213728" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Petrification"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Petrification.jpg" 	data-image-name="Petrification.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213728"  	 width="240"  	 height="123"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Petrification.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213728" 	 alt="Petrification"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Petrification.jpg" 	data-image-name="Petrification.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="123"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Petrification.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> and the other petrified students being visited by Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Still believing that if Hagrid were not responsible, he could at least point them in the right direction, Harry and Ron visited him after the attack on Hermione. From under the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a>, they witnessed his arrest by <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> and the suspension of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>. As Hagrid was being led away, he gave the pair a new clue. He told them to follow the <a href="/wiki/Spider" title="Spider">spiders</a>. Harry and Ron heeded this advice, even though Ron was deathly afraid of spiders. They met <a href="/wiki/Aragog" title="Aragog">Aragog</a> who told them that Hagrid was not responsible for opening the Chamber the first time and that the girl who died was killed in a bathroom, leading Harry to theorise that <a href="/wiki/Myrtle" title="Myrtle">Moaning Myrtle</a> was the victim. A few days later, Harry and Ron discovered a scrap of paper in Hermione's hand, which was torn out of a book and described a deadly creature known as the Basilisk. Harry and Ron wondered how an enormous Basilisk would go around the school undetected, and then they saw the word "<i><b>pipes</b></i>" written on the scrap of paper.
</p><p>Harry (and later Ron) would soon learn that the person responsible for opening the Chamber was in fact Ron's younger sister, <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, under the control of a <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">memory of Lord Voldemort</a> by writing into his diary, forcing her to torment and vandalise the school. They also learned that she was being kept down in the Chamber and were told that her "<i>skeleton would lie in the Chamber forever</i>", Determined to rescue Ginny and hopefully catch the Heir and destroy the Basilisk, Harry, accompanied by Ron and Lockhart, was able to locate and open the Chamber using his Parseltongue abilities. Once they got down into the Chamber, it was not long before the cowardly Lockhart attempted to erase Harry and Ron's memories using <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley%27s_first_wand" title="Ronald Weasley&#39;s first wand">Ron's broken wand</a>; however, his spell backfired, and he erased his own memory. The Chamber roof caved in, separating Harry from Ron and Lockhart.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140710235835" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7 r1 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7_r1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7 r1 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140710235835"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140710235835" 	 alt="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7 r1 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7_r1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7 r1 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo7_r1_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry slays <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Basilisk" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Basilisk" class="mw-redirect">Slytherin's basilisk</a> in the chamber itself</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Separated from Ron and a now deluded Lockhart, Harry ventured on alone. Harry soon found Ginny's unconscious body lying on the floor of the Chamber. As he hoped, she was not dead; Harry was greeted by Tom Riddle, who had come to a simulation of life from the memories stored in the diary. Revealing his history and true nature as Voldemort, Riddle set the <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Basilisk" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Basilisk" class="mw-redirect">basilisk</a> upon Harry. He defeated the Basilisk with the help of <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a> — <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>'s phoenix — and <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a>.
</p><p>However, Harry was bitten by the Basilisk as he killed the wretched creature. Fawkes flew over to Harry and wept upon his wound. As phoenix tears had healing powers, Harry survived. Harry then stabbed the diary three times with the Basilisk fang to rid himself of Riddle, unknowingly destroying one of Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> in the process. Riddle's manifestation exploded, therefore foiling his attempt to come back to life. Once the emergency was over, Fawkes flew Harry, Ginny, Ron, and Lockhart to safety. Harry spoke with Dumbledore on the events that had taken place, and explained to him that Ginny was not to blame and that Lockhart was a fraud. Harry and Ron both received Awards for Special Services to the School and two hundred points a piece for Gryffindor House.
