</p><p>After interpreting Dobby's strange actions in Dumbledore's office, Harry realised <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a> was the ultimate culprit for opening the Chamber. Before the term started, he had planted Tom Riddle's diary in Ginny's cauldron in the hope of indirectly opening the Chamber of Secrets. At this time, he did not know the diary was one of Lord Voldemort's Horcruxes. Afterwards, Harry was able to trick Lucius into freeing his mistreated <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>, who had been attempting to protect Harry all year, by giving him one of his socks. Malfoy was subsequently sacked as a school governor.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Third_year">Third year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (film)">"<i>He was their friend... and he betrayed them. HE WAS THEIR FRIEND! I hope he finds me, because when he does, I'm gonna be ready! When he does, I'M GONNA KILL HIM!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry, still believing <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> to be the man who betrayed his parents<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d5/Dementor_on_the_train.png/revision/latest?cb=20140222050950" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Dementor on the train"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Dementor_on_the_train.png" 	data-image-name="Dementor on the train.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d5/Dementor_on_the_train.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140222050950"  	 width="240"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d5/Dementor_on_the_train.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140222050950" 	 alt="Dementor on the train"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Dementor_on_the_train.png" 	data-image-name="Dementor on the train.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dementor_on_the_train.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> board the train in search of <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In the summer of <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> — who had been wrongly imprisoned twelve years earlier for allegedly betraying and <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Potter</a> to Voldemort and murdering <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew%27s_victims" title="Peter Pettigrew&#39;s victims" class="mw-redirect">twelve Muggles</a> — <a href="/wiki/Azkaban_escapes" title="Azkaban escapes">escaped</a> from <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a>. This created a tense climate in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a>, and many believed that murdering Harry was the object of Black's escape. As such, he was treated leniently when, late in the summer, he inadvertently inflated his <a href="/wiki/Marjorie_Dursley" title="Marjorie Dursley">"Aunt" Marge</a>, possibly with an <a href="/wiki/Engorgement_Charm" title="Engorgement Charm">Engorgement Charm</a>. That evening he ran away from the Dursleys, and after an enlightening journey aboard the <a href="/wiki/Knight_Bus" title="Knight Bus">Knight Bus</a>, he arrived at the <a href="/wiki/Leaky_Cauldron" title="Leaky Cauldron">Leaky Cauldron</a>, where <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> was awaiting him. After spending two happy weeks at the Leaky Cauldron, Harry met up with his friends <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, along with the entire <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>, who had just returned from a holiday in Egypt. That night, Harry overheard <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Mr</a> and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a> arguing and learned of the Ministry's fears that Harry was the target of Sirius Black.
</p><p>Prior to their departure aboard the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>, Mr Weasley pulled Harry aside and in no uncertain terms told Harry not to go looking for Black. Harry found it necessary to point out that he "<i>was not stupid enough to go looking for someone who want[ed] to kill me [him]</i>". Finding only one open compartment, Harry and his friends shared their ride with a new professor, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>. The train suddenly stopped well before it should have and was searched by <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> looking for Black. Harry reacted poorly to the appearance of the Dementors, passing out, and beginning a pattern that would last most of the year. While he fainted, a Dementor began to suck out his positive emotions, and might possibly have <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor&#39;s Kiss">stripped him of his soul</a> had Lupin not repelled it.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c1/Buckbeak_Harry.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140729151833" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Buckbeak Harry"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Buckbeak_Harry.gif" 	data-image-name="Buckbeak Harry.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c1/Buckbeak_Harry.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140729151833"  	 width="245"  	 height="105"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c1/Buckbeak_Harry.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140729151833" 	 alt="Buckbeak Harry"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Buckbeak_Harry.gif" 	data-image-name="Buckbeak Harry.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="105"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Buckbeak_Harry.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry approaches <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> the <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">hippogriff</a> in his first lesson of <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The following day, Harry and his classmates began their new classes. Among the first was <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a>, where <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">Professor</a> <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney" title="Sybill Trelawney">Sybill Trelawney</a> told Harry that he had the <a href="/wiki/Grim" title="Grim">Grim</a> in his <a href="/wiki/Tea" title="Tea">tea</a> leaves. Trelawney also made a frequent habit of predicting very gruesome deaths for Harry, much to Harry's annoyance. On the other hand, there were courses in <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a>, during which <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, the new professor, taught them about <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">hippogriffs</a>. Unfortunately, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> had not been listening when Hagrid lectured and was injured by the hippogriff, <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a>. Professor Lupin soon proved to be an excellent teacher in <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>, where he taught the students how to combat various dark creatures. At Hallowe'en, the third year students went on their first visit to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> village. Harry was not allowed to go, as he had not had his permission form signed. In light of Harry's difficulties, Ron and Hermione, who had been fighting over Hermione's new cat, <a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a>, put aside their differences. While his friends were enjoying themselves in Hogsmeade, Harry visited with Professor Lupin. A few weeks later, Harry played in the first <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match of the year versus <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff" title="Hufflepuff">Hufflepuff</a>. In the pouring rain and storms, the teams played until the Dementors invaded the field. In their presence, Harry tumbled off his broom fifty feet to the ground, and his <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2000" title="Nimbus 2000">Nimbus 2000</a> was destroyed in the process. Knowing that <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> would not win the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Cup" title="Quidditch Cup" class="mw-redirect">Quidditch Cup</a> if he continued to collapse in the presence of the Dementors, Harry asked Lupin to help teach him how to combat them.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Pottermore-poa8.png/revision/latest?cb=20140728155441" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Pottermore-poa8"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Pottermore-poa8.png" 	data-image-name="Pottermore-poa8.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Pottermore-poa8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140728155441"  	 width="240"  	 height="110"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/Pottermore-poa8.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140728155441" 	 alt="Pottermore-poa8"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Pottermore-poa8.png" 	data-image-name="Pottermore-poa8.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="110"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Pottermore-poa8.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> village during Christmas</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Just before Christmas, the school had another Hogsmeade visit. This time Harry sneaked out of the castle using the <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a>, which the Weasley twins presented to him in his time of need. During his illicit visit to Hogsmeade, Harry overheard a conversation between <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> and several of the Hogwarts teachers. Fudge told them that Black had betrayed the Potters and that Black was still Harry's godfather. This revelation caused Harry great distress. To relieve Harry of some of his troubles, the trio went to visit Hagrid, where they learned that Buckbeak was to be put on trial, and they promised to help his defence. Soon after, on <a href="/wiki/December_25" title="December 25" class="mw-redirect">Christmas Day</a>, Harry received a <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">Firebolt</a>, a broom of extreme quality and high price, from an anonymous benefactor. Believing it to be from Sirius Black, Hermione reported it to <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a>, causing Harry and Ron to stop talking to her.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Classroom_4F.png/revision/latest?cb=20130902094214" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Classroom 4F"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Classroom_4F.png" 	data-image-name="Classroom 4F.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Classroom_4F.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20130902094214"  	 width="240"  	 height="94"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Classroom_4F.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20130902094214" 	 alt="Classroom 4F"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Classroom_4F.png" 	data-image-name="Classroom 4F.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="94"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Classroom_4F.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">First lesson on the <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Following the break, Lupin began his <a href="/wiki/Anti-Dementor_lessons" title="Anti-Dementor lessons">lessons</a> with Harry. While Harry made progress, he regretted his inability to create a corporeal <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> many lessons in. Soon after, Harry was given his Firebolt back by Professor McGonagall, and Harry decided it was high time to patch things up with Hermione. However, that same evening, Ron's rat, <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Scabbers</a>, disappeared, and Ron blamed Crookshanks. Harry and Ron did not reconcile with her until after the next Hogsmeade visit, when Harry was almost caught. After receiving a stern talking to for sneaking out of the school, Harry and Ron emerged from Professor Lupin's office to find Hermione standing there looking distraught. She told them that <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a> had used his influence and Buckbeak had been convicted and sentenced to execution.
</p><p>The Quidditch final was soon upon them, and Harry played in the dirtiest game of his career. He managed to catch the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a> after Gryffindor was sufficiently ahead, and Gryffindor won the Quidditch Cup. They could not celebrate for long, as finals were right around the corner. Harry did well on his exams, and following his last final in <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a>, Professor Trelawney went into a trance and predicted <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_second_prophecy" title="Sybill Trelawney&#39;s second prophecy">her second prophecy</a>, which stated that the <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">servant</a> would return to <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> and help him return to power. The same day, Buckbeak's appeal had taken place in the castle, where the hippogriff was, again, sentenced to death. Against the advice of Hagrid, the trio went down to his cabin to comfort him. While there, Scabbers resurfaced. When he discovered that the Ministry officials were on their way, Hagrid rushed Harry, Ron, and Hermione out the back. While they made their way back to the castle, the sound of a swishing blade rent the air, and Buckbeak was apparently executed.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Turning time"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Turning_time.gif" 	data-image-name="Turning time.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907"  	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" 	 alt="Turning time"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Turning_time.gif" 	data-image-name="Turning time.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Turning_time.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione use the <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a> in order to save <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> and <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Immediately afterwards, Scabbers bit Ron and attempted to escape, causing Ron to chase the rat into the shadow of the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>. Once there, he was attacked by a large black dog who dragged Ron and Scabbers into a tunnel under the Willow. Harry and Hermione followed them into the tunnel, which led them to the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>. There, they followed the sound of Ron and discovered him in an upstairs bedroom, where they were ambushed by <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, who was revealed to be an <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a> that turned into a dog. They were saved by <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Professor Lupin</a>, but then the situation turned on its head when he embraced Black like a brother, and they began talking about the long dead <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>. When asked to explain, they revealed that Lupin, Black, and Pettigrew went to Hogwarts with Harry's father (<a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a>), that they had all become Animagi to help Lupin with his <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">lycanthropy</a>, and that in fact it was Peter Pettigrew who had betrayed the Potters. This was proven when Black and Lupin forced Scabbers to become Pettigrew.
</p><p>After questioning, Pettigrew confessed, but Harry prevented Black and Lupin from killing him. Determined to turn Pettigrew over, the whole group set off for the castle. Along the way, the <a href="/wiki/Moon" title="Moon">moon</a> came out from behind the clouds, and Lupin transformed into a werewolf, since he had not drunk his <a href="/wiki/Wolfsbane_Potion" title="Wolfsbane Potion">Wolfsbane Potion</a>. Seeing the danger, Black used his Animagus ability to protect Harry and his friends, but was badly injured. When Harry and Hermione went to look for him, hundreds of <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> fell upon them, trying to perform the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor&#39;s Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a> both on Sirius and Harry. Sirius quickly passed out, as Harry tried casting the Patronus Charm (using the thought that he would leave the Dursleys and move in with Sirius to try and conjure it) and tried to make Hermione think of something happy and cast it as well, but neither could do it. The Dementors were quickly descending on them, and as Harry finally conjured a fog Patronus, Hermione passed out, leaving Harry to fight the Dementors alone. After trying to hold them off, Harry was quickly overwhelmed. The Dementors descended on him, Sirius, and Hermione. Then one Dementor grabbed Harry by the throat and attempted to perform the kiss on him. Harry then heard his mother screaming in his ears, thinking that she would be the last thing he ever heard, when a mysterious figure on the other side of the lake cast a powerful Patronus sending away all of the Dementors and saving Harry, Sirius, and Hermione.                                                             
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Stag_Patronus1.png/revision/latest?cb=20140728160623" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Stag Patronus1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Stag_Patronus1.png" 	data-image-name="Stag Patronus1.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Stag_Patronus1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140728160623"  	 width="240"  	 height="111"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Stag_Patronus1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140728160623" 	 alt="Stag Patronus1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Stag_Patronus1.png" 	data-image-name="Stag Patronus1.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="111"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Stag_Patronus1.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's stag <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> fends off hundreds of <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As he began to pass out, Harry began to think that the mysterious stranger was <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">his father</a>. Later, Harry and Hermione awoke to find themselves in the <a href="/wiki/Infirmary" title="Infirmary" class="mw-redirect">infirmary</a> and that Sirius was about to be subjected to the Dementor's Kiss. They pleaded with <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>, who instructed them that nothing could be done without more time. With this clue, Hermione grabbed Harry and used her <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a> to send them back in time. Once there, they hid out until the time was right to <a href="/wiki/Rescue_of_Sirius_Black_and_Buckbeak" title="Rescue of Sirius Black and Buckbeak">rescue</a> Buckbeak, whom they saved just prior to his execution. Afterwards, they waited for the appropriate moment to save Sirius. While they sat in the woods, Harry tried to tell Hermione that he thought his father might have saved them. When Hermione reminded him that his father was dead, Harry dropped the subject. They ran for safety to <a href="/wiki/Hagrid%27s_hut" title="Hagrid&#39;s hut" class="mw-redirect">Hagrid's hut</a> when the werewolf Lupin was on the loose, and Harry, desperate to see who had saved him, left to observe the situation. Harry arrived at the lake watching the dementors attack his past self, until he in a flash of clarity realised that <i>he</i> had been the one he had seen cast the <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a> that saved his life. Stepping forward, Harry cast the Patronus and produced a fully fledged <a href="/wiki/Deer" title="Deer">stag</a> Patronus that drove all of the dementors back — saving his past self, Hermione, and Sirius. Once reunited, the pair rode <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> to Sirius's window and saved him.
</p><p>Harry returned to the Dursleys feeling as if he had accomplished nothing, but his trip and future at Hogwarts was brightened when he received a letter from Sirius. Inside there was permission for him to go to Hogsmeade, and Harry was delighted to have a godfather. Sirius also told him that it was indeed he who had given Harry the Firebolt.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fourth_year">Fourth year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>You have shown bravery beyond anything I could have expected of you.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Dumbledore to Harry at the end of his fourth year<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>In <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, Harry, the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a> (except <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a>), and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> attended the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_World_Cup" title="Quidditch World Cup">Quidditch World Cup</a>. At <a href="/wiki/Stoatshead_Hill" title="Stoatshead Hill">Stoatshead Hill</a>, <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> and his father, <a href="/wiki/Amos_Diggory" title="Amos Diggory">Amos</a>, joined them. Once at the camp grounds, they met <a href="/wiki/Ludovic_Bagman" title="Ludovic Bagman">Ludo Bagman</a>, <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Sr." title="Bartemius Crouch Sr.">Barty Crouch Sr.</a> and his <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a> <a href="/wiki/Winky" title="Winky">Winky</a>, and many other Hogwarts students and their families, including <a href="/wiki/Seamus_Finnigan" title="Seamus Finnigan">Seamus Finnigan</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>, <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Wood" title="Oliver Wood">Oliver Wood</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. They were able to see the match between the <a href="/wiki/Ireland" title="Ireland">Irish</a> and <a href="/wiki/Bulgaria" title="Bulgaria">Bulgarian</a> national teams up close, because Harry, the Weasleys, and Hermione had seats in the <a href="/wiki/Top_Box" title="Top Box">Top Box</a>, thanks to a favour Mr Weasley had done for Ludo Bagman. It was during this World Cup that Harry learned the existence of foreign wizarding schools.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Roit_at_the_World_cup.png/revision/latest?cb=20140222051525" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Roit at the World cup"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Roit_at_the_World_cup.png" 	data-image-name="Roit at the World cup.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Roit_at_the_World_cup.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140222051525"  	 width="240"  	 height="104"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/Roit_at_the_World_cup.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140222051525" 	 alt="Roit at the World cup"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Roit_at_the_World_cup.png" 	data-image-name="Roit at the World cup.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="104"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Roit_at_the_World_cup.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron, Harry, and Hermione after the riot at the Quidditch World Cup</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The night after the match, while the Irish team's supporters were still celebrating, a group of <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">black-cloaked, hooded figures</a> held terrifying celebrations of their own by suspending the <a href="/wiki/Muggle" title="Muggle">Muggle</a> camp site manager and his family in air like twisted marionettes. On Mr Weasley's orders, Harry fled into the woods near the camp site, along with Ron, Hermione, Fred, George, and Ginny. The group was separated in the woods, and in the chaos, Harry had lost his wand. The trio ran into <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, and he all but told them that his father was among the cloaked wizards. Later, Harry learned that <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Jr." title="Bartemius Crouch Jr.">Barty Crouch Jr.</a> had stolen his wand from his pocket. While in a clearing in the woods, Harry, Ron, and Hermione heard someone shout the incantation <i><a href="/wiki/Morsmordre" title="Morsmordre">Morsmordre</a></i>, casting the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> — a green skull with a snake protruding from its mouth like a tongue — into the sky. Although Harry did not immediately recognise its significance, he soon learned that the Dark Mark had evil implications. Then, Barty Crouch Sr., Amos Diggory, and other Ministry of Magic employees <a href="/wiki/Apparation" title="Apparation" class="mw-redirect">Apparated</a> into the clearing and began to question Harry, Ron, and Hermione about the Dark Mark. After Harry mentioned he had heard another voice conjure the Dark Mark, the Ministry employees searched the area and found the house-elf Winky unconscious in the bushes. Since Harry's wand was found in Winky's hand, Mr Crouch fired her for shaming his family and disobeying his orders.
</p><p>At the Hogwarts start of term feast, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Professor Dumbledore</a> announced that <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> would host the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, a recently revived inter-school competition in which the <a href="/wiki/Beauxbatons_Academy_of_Magic" title="Beauxbatons Academy of Magic">Beauxbatons Academy of Magic</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang Institute</a> would also participate. New rules stated that only students seventeen and older could compete. Also, during the start of term feast, Dumbledore introduced <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a>, an ex-<a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a>, as the newly appointed <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> teacher. This news was greeted with a mixture of responses, as Moody was known to be a great <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a>, a little crazy, and to have a magical eye, earning him the nickname "Mad-Eye Moody". Around Hallowe'en, the students from <a href="/wiki/Beauxbatons_Academy_of_Magic" title="Beauxbatons Academy of Magic">Beauxbatons Academy of Magic</a> and <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang Institute</a> arrived at the school, and <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> were all chosen to represent their respective schools in this tournament. However, Harry was mysteriously chosen as a fourth competitor, even though he was under-age and never entered his name into the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a> during the selection process. Many people did not believe Harry's story, including <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, believing this to be nothing but another attempt to gain fame. This caused extreme tension between the two friends. <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, on the other hand, "<i>accepted his story without question</i>", and assisted Harry in preparing for the Tournament by teaching him useful <a href="/wiki/Spell" title="Spell">spells</a>, such as the <a href="/wiki/Summoning_Charm" title="Summoning Charm">Summoning Charm</a>, which Harry used in the first task of the Tournament. The champions faced three dangerous challenges on their way to the Triwizard Cup. A few days after his name came out of the Goblet, Harry attended the <a href="/wiki/Wand_weighing_ceremony" title="Wand weighing ceremony">Wand weighing ceremony</a>. There he was cornered by the notorious <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> reporter <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>, who asked him many <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/leading_question" class="extiw exitstitial" title="wikipedia:leading question">leading questions</a> and wrote an inflammatory article about him.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Horntail-prm.png/revision/latest?cb=20140730230314" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Horntail-prm"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Horntail-prm.png" 	data-image-name="Horntail-prm.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Horntail-prm.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140730230314"  	 width="240"  	 height="97"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Horntail-prm.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140730230314" 	 alt="Horntail-prm"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Horntail-prm.png" 	data-image-name="Horntail-prm.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="97"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Horntail-prm.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry faces the <a href="/wiki/Hungarian_Horntail" title="Hungarian Horntail">Hungarian Horntail</a> in the first task of the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In the first task, each champion needed to get past a <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">dragon</a> to collect a <a href="/wiki/Golden_egg" title="Golden egg">golden egg</a>. Harry received help from <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, who showed the dragons to him. Realising that every champion but <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric</a> had found out about the dragons, Harry told Cedric about the first task, trying to level the playing field. The newly appointed Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a>, witnessed Harry telling Cedric, but did not report him. Instead he advised Harry to play to his strengths, hinting that he should use his <a href="/wiki/Flying" title="Flying">flying</a> ability to get the golden egg. Four different dragons were chosen for each of the champions to face. <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur</a> ended up with the <a href="/wiki/Common_Welsh_Green" title="Common Welsh Green">Common Welsh Green</a>, <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric</a> with the <a href="/wiki/Swedish_Short-Snout" title="Swedish Short-Snout">Swedish Short-Snout</a>, <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a> with the <a href="/wiki/Chinese_Fireball" title="Chinese Fireball">Chinese Fireball</a>, and Harry faced the <a href="/wiki/Hungarian_Horntail" title="Hungarian Horntail">Hungarian Horntail</a>. Harry used a Summoning Charm to bring him his Firebolt and dodged the Hungarian Horntail to get the golden egg. Harry and <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a> tied for first at the end of the task. After seeing how dangerous the task was, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, as well as the other students, made amends with Harry, with Ron telling him, "<i>I reckon someone is trying to do you in</i>". Harry managed to escape the first task with only an injured arm.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 136px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7e/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213758" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry Potter (GoF-07)"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry Potter (GoF-07).jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7e/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/136?cb=20141122213758"  	 width="136"  	 height="220"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7e/Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/136?cb=20141122213758" 	 alt="Harry Potter (GoF-07)"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Potter_%28GoF-07%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry Potter (GoF-07).jpg" 	 	 width="136"  	 height="220"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_(GoF-07).jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his Yule Ball attire in winter of <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Between the first and second tasks, the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a>, a Triwizard Tournament tradition took place at Christmas. <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, dismayed to discover that <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a> had asked <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> to go with him, called her out for "<i>consorting with the enemy</i>" though he and Hermione acted as if they had not fought the following day. Harry asked his long-time crush <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a> to attend the Yule Ball with him, but was disappointed to learn that she had already accepted an invitation from <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a>. Harry and Ron ended up attending with <a href="/wiki/Parvati_and_Padma_Patil" title="Parvati and Padma Patil" class="mw-redirect">Parvati and Padma Patil</a>, respectively. They both ended up neglecting their dates, as Harry watched Cho with Cedric, and Ron was overcome with jealousy for Viktor Krum, who danced with Hermione. After the Yule Ball, Rita Skeeter struck again. She had overheard <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> telling <a href="/wiki/Olympe_Maxime" title="Olympe Maxime">Madame Maxime</a> about his family. She then wrote an article exposing Hagrid as a <a href="/wiki/Half-giant" title="Half-giant">half-giant</a>, and he was so ashamed that he stopped teaching. Only after Harry, Ron, and Hermione proved that they still liked him did he return to work.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Merpeople-4-26-1.png/revision/latest?cb=20140828133806" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Merpeople-4-26-1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Merpeople-4-26-1.png" 	data-image-name="Merpeople-4-26-1.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Merpeople-4-26-1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140828133806"  	 width="240"  	 height="105"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Merpeople-4-26-1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140828133806" 	 alt="Merpeople-4-26-1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Merpeople-4-26-1.png" 	data-image-name="Merpeople-4-26-1.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="105"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Merpeople-4-26-1.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and the Merpeople in the <a href="/wiki/Black_Lake" title="Black Lake" class="mw-redirect">Black Lake</a> during the second task</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>To prepare for the second task, Harry had to open the egg he won from the dragon, but every time he did, it screeched. His rescue from that particular problem came when <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> paid him back with the information that he would figure it out if he were to "<i>mull things over in the hot water</i>" with the egg. Harry followed this advice; while in the bathroom, he had an uncomfortable exchange with <a href="/wiki/Myrtle" title="Myrtle">Moaning Myrtle</a>, and on the way back to the Common Room, he ran into Professors <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a> and <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Moody</a>. The latter informed Harry of <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Sr." title="Bartemius Crouch Sr.">Barty Crouch Sr</a>'s obsession with catching <a href="/wiki/Dark_Wizard" title="Dark Wizard">Dark Wizards</a>. Harry learned that the second task was going into the <a href="/wiki/Black_Lake" title="Black Lake" class="mw-redirect">Black Lake</a> to rescue "<i>the thing they would miss most</i>" from the <a href="/wiki/Merpeople" title="Merpeople">Merpeople</a>. Harry's new problem was that he had no idea of how to survive underwater for an hour. He got his answer in the form of <a href="/wiki/Gillyweed" title="Gillyweed">gillyweed</a> from <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>, who had come to work at Hogwarts. For this task, Harry had to save his best friend <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>. When Harry reached Ron, he was shocked to find Hermione, Cho, and <a href="/wiki/Gabrielle_Delacour" title="Gabrielle Delacour">Gabrielle Delacour</a>, Fleur's sister, there as well. After Cedric and Viktor rescued Cho and Hermione, respectively, Harry hung around, and, concerned for Gabrielle, he saved her as well as Ron, landing him outside the hour allotted, but earning him points for "moral fibre". After the second task was finished, Harry and Cedric were tied for first. Viktor was in second, and Fleur was finshed in last.
</p><p>A month before the final task, the Champions were shown the beginnings of the challenge. They were told the third and final task was going into a maze filled with obstacles to find the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Cup" title="Triwizard Cup">Triwizard Cup</a>. On the way back to the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Castle" title="Hogwarts Castle">castle</a>, Krum took Harry aside to ask him something. Thinking that this was something important, Harry went with him. Krum then asked Harry about his relationship with Hermione, in whom Krum was deeply interested. Harry told him that there was nothing between him and Hermione and that she was just a friend. He also told Krum not to believe anything <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>, who had recently written in <i><a href="/wiki/Witch_Weekly" title="Witch Weekly">Witch Weekly</a></i> that there was a Harry-Hermione-Krum love triangle, wrote about him. That moment, Barty Crouch Sr. appeared in the forest disoriented and asking for Dumbledore. He disappeared when Harry went to fetch Dumbledore.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/B4C31M1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122213848" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="B4C31M1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="B4C31M1.jpg" 	data-image-name="B4C31M1.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/B4C31M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213848"  	 width="240"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/B4C31M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122213848" 	 alt="B4C31M1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="B4C31M1.jpg" 	data-image-name="B4C31M1.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C31M1.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The third and final task (the hedge maze)</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>To prepare for the final task, Harry, Ron, and Hermione used vacant classrooms to practise spells and jinxes. In <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a> class between two of these study periods, Harry dozed off dreaming about Voldemort and left the classroom in a disturbing fashion. Rita Skeeter had witnessed this event, and she wrote, on the day of the final task, that Harry was disturbed and dangerous. This did nothing to boost Harry's morale, but when he spent the day with <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a>, they cheered him up when they also came to watch the final task as his substitute family. During this final event, Hogwarts champions <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> and Harry both showed supreme sportsmanship and cooperation despite the tension brought on by the maze and agreed to touch the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Cup" title="Triwizard Cup">Triwizard Cup</a> simultaneously, planning to tie for first place. They were unaware it was actually a <a href="/wiki/Portkey" title="Portkey">Portkey</a> and were transported to the graveyard in <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton" title="Little Hangleton">Little Hangleton</a>, the Riddle family's final resting place, where <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> was waiting. On Voldemort's order, his servant <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a> (Wormtail) murdered Cedric with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140828123858" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Duel graveyard"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Duel_graveyard.gif" 	data-image-name="Duel graveyard.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140828123858"  	 width="245"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Duel_graveyard.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140828123858" 	 alt="Duel graveyard"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Duel_graveyard.gif" 	data-image-name="Duel graveyard.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Duel_graveyard.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry duels Voldemort and triggers the effect of <a href="/wiki/Priori_Incantatem" title="Priori Incantatem">Priori Incantatem</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was bound to <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle_Sr." title="Tom Riddle Sr.">Tom Riddle Sr.</a>'s tombstone and forced to witness a ritual in which Pettigrew used some of Harry's blood to <a href="/wiki/Rebirth_of_Tom_Riddle" title="Rebirth of Tom Riddle">restore Voldemort's body</a>. At which time, the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> were summoned to the cemetery. After Voldemort regained a full-size human form and explained his downfall and disappearance to his followers, he engaged Harry in a <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duel</a>. Voldemort then tortured Harry with two <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curses</a> and then tried to kill him using the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>. The nature of their wands' mystical connection caused their magical streams to interlock, which created an effect called <a href="/wiki/Priori_Incantatem" title="Priori Incantatem">Priori Incantatem</a>. After a battle of wills with Voldemort, Harry was momentarily shielded by the echoes of Lord Voldemort's previous victims, including Harry's parents and Cedric, with the last of whom asking Harry to return his body to his parents, which allowed Harry some time to grab Cedric's body and the Portkey and escape back to Hogwarts.
</p><p>It was uncovered that <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Jr." title="Bartemius Crouch Jr.">Barty Crouch Jr</a>, who had willingly taken the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> as a young man, was throughout the school year disguised as Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a>. In a terrible turn of fate, Crouch's soul was destroyed by the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor&#39;s Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementor</a> that accompanied <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>. As a result, he could not give testimony, and the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> began to dispute Harry's and Dumbledore's insistence that Voldemort had returned, insisting that Dumbledore was trying to stir up trouble and that Harry was insane.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fifth_year">Fifth year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (film)"><b>Molly Weasley</b>: "<i>All right, that's enough! He's just a boy! You might as well induct him into the Order!</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Good, then I want to join! If Voldemort's building up an army then I want to fight!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry in 12 Grimmauld Place<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/53/550w_movies_harry_potter_order_of_phoenix_1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214324" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="550w movies harry potter order of phoenix 1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="550w_movies_harry_potter_order_of_phoenix_1.jpg" 	data-image-name="550w movies harry potter order of phoenix 1.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/53/550w_movies_harry_potter_order_of_phoenix_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122214324"  	 width="140"  	 height="207"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/53/550w_movies_harry_potter_order_of_phoenix_1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122214324" 	 alt="550w movies harry potter order of phoenix 1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="550w_movies_harry_potter_order_of_phoenix_1.jpg" 	data-image-name="550w movies harry potter order of phoenix 1.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="207"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:550w_movies_harry_potter_order_of_phoenix_1.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his fifth year</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Witnessing Cedric Diggory's murder was very difficult for Harry, and it was not helpful that he was forced back to number <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> on school holidays. To make things worse than they were already, in early August, <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">someone</a> sent Dementors to attack Harry in the Muggle town of <a href="/wiki/Little_Whinging" title="Little Whinging">Little Whinging</a>, in an attempt to neutralise him. He was forced to perform a <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a> in order to save Dudley and himself. Subsequently, Harry was formally accused of performing under-age magic in the presence of a Muggle and was expelled, but thanks to <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>'s intervention, this was changed to a <a href="/wiki/Disciplinary_hearing_of_Harry_Potter" title="Disciplinary hearing of Harry Potter">disciplinary hearing</a> in front of the entire <a href="/wiki/Wizengamot" title="Wizengamot">Wizengamot</a> at the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>. In a further attempt to discredit Harry, the Ministry changed the time and location of the hearing at the last minute, but Harry was able to make it there just minutes late. He was threatened with <a href="/wiki/Discipline_at_Hogwarts#Expulsion" title="Discipline at Hogwarts">expulsion</a> from Hogwarts, but was exonerated with help from Dumbledore, who had a witness and legal loopholes to help him.
</p><p>In retaliation against Dumbledore, <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> appointed Umbridge, then Senior Under-Secretary to the Minister of Magic, as the new Hogwarts <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> teacher so that she could spy on the school. She was later appointed <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_High_Inquisitor" title="Hogwarts High Inquisitor">Hogwarts High Inquisitor</a>, empowered to arbitrarily change and impose school rules whenever she chose. Moreover, every time Harry spoke out of turn, or even mentioned Voldemort, Umbridge threw him into detention, forcing him to write with her <a href="/wiki/Blood_Quill" title="Blood Quill" class="mw-redirect">quill</a>, that scribed the message "<i>I must not tell lies</i>" onto the back of his hand. However, she presumed the message failed to sink in, as Harry spread the word through <i><a href="/wiki/The_Quibbler" title="The Quibbler">The Quibbler</a></i> about the previous year's events, and thus he was banned from any more <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> visits.
</p><p>He was surprised when <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> was chosen to be a <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a>, not him, as <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> always had expected Harry to be one. It was later revealed that Ron was chosen instead of Harry because Dumbledore thought that Harry had "<i>enough responsibility to be going on with</i>". Harry's jealousy threatened to affect his friendship with Ron, but he felt better when he discovered that his <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">father</a> was also not chosen as a prefect at school. This suggests that Harry's desire in becoming prefect was to emulate his father, who was <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy" title="Head Boy">Head Boy</a> in his day with his mother as <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy" title="Head Boy">Head Girl</a> respectively, not to inflate a sense of his own importance.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Tumblr_n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Tumblr_n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/dd/Tumblr_n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" 	 alt="Tumblr n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_n6unbjelLi1r5w42zo4_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry instructs <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> and others during a <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">D.A.</a> meeting</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Because Fudge stubbornly believed that Dumbledore was training an army to overthrow him, Umbridge had the Defence Against the Dark Arts class reduced to reading textbooks. Urged by Hermione, Harry secretly trained a group students in practical defensive magic. In an attempt to make light of the Ministry's fears, the group called themselves <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>, or the <i>D.A.</i> Feeling highly anxious and frustrated most of the time, Harry found that the D.A. was now his chief source of happiness, and the thing to which he looked forward throughout his school day. This happiness was felt by most members, as all of them, particularly <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>, gained a lot under Harry's tutelage. <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a> became a member, and before the Christmas holidays, she and Harry kissed under the <a href="/wiki/Mistletoe" title="Mistletoe">mistletoe</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> after a D.A. meeting. This moment was confusing to Harry, as Cho, clearly still suffering from <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a>'s death, had been crying during their kiss.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/Legilimency1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214329" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Legilimency1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Legilimency1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Legilimency1.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/Legilimency1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214329"  	 width="240"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a5/Legilimency1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214329" 	 alt="Legilimency1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Legilimency1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Legilimency1.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Legilimency1.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's mind being invaded by Snape during their Occlumency lessons</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, Harry took on some much more pressing worries later that night. <a href="/wiki/Lord_Voldemort" title="Lord Voldemort" class="mw-redirect">Lord Voldemort</a>, wanting a "secret weapon" against Harry Potter, had heard of a <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_first_prophecy" title="Sybill Trelawney&#39;s first prophecy">prophecy</a> hidden in the Ministry's <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a> concerning both of them. Voldemort had been obsessing over the door to the <a href="/wiki/Hall_of_Prophecy" title="Hall of Prophecy">Hall of Prophecy</a> for the past few months, and had been inadvertently allowing Harry to read his thoughts through <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimency</a>. The link had been growing stronger for quite awhile. As a result, after falling asleep on the night of his kiss with Cho, Harry witnessed <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> <a href="/wiki/Attack_on_Arthur_Weasley" title="Attack on Arthur Weasley">attack</a> <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> in his dream, and felt almost as if he had been the <a href="/wiki/Snake" title="Snake">snake</a>. Realising what could happen if the link grew more powerful, Dumbledore commissioned Snape to train Harry in <a href="/wiki/Occlumency" title="Occlumency">Occlumency</a> in an effort to prevent further problems. Unfortunately, Harry did not enjoy having his mind peered into and did not focus on using Occlumency, having indeed been extremely curious about the door himself. During a lesson in Occlumency, Snape stepped out of the room, and Harry's curiosity got the best of him. He looked into the <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve" title="Albus Dumbledore&#39;s Pensieve" class="mw-redirect">pensieve</a>, which contained Snape's memories, and, to his dismay, Harry found images of his father bullying Snape. Snape himself discovered Harry's spying and refused to give him any more Occlumency lessons.
</p><p>As the second term progressed, Harry's relationship with Cho became more strained. While the two did like each other, Cho was mistakenly jealous of Hermione due to the latter's closeness with Harry, and Harry still felt awkward about Cho's feelings over Cedric. When Cho's friend, <a href="/wiki/Marietta_Edgecombe" title="Marietta Edgecombe">Marietta Edgecombe</a>, betrayed the D.A. to Umbridge, the members were all punished and forced to end their meetings. Harry was furious with Marietta, but Cho insisted on defending her friend. This was the final straw; at this point, Cho's and Harry's relationship "fell apart", and the two no longer saw each other romantically.
</p><p>During the final Quidditch match of the year — in which Harry did not play as Umbridge had banned him for life — <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, who had returned to the school months into the term and very badly beaten, decided to show Harry and Hermione why he was so badly injured. Hagrid had dragged a <a href="/wiki/Giant" title="Giant">giant</a> back with him from his mission over the summer. It transpired that the giant, named <a href="/wiki/Grawp" title="Grawp">Grawp</a>, was Hagrid's half-brother, and that Hagrid had been attempting to civilise the giant, but with few results. He made Harry and Hermione promise that they would look after Grawp should Hagrid be forced to leave the school. Hagrid was attacked and left the school during <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> examinations, and Harry never had to go down to Grawp in the forest.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Sirius_torture.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214420" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Sirius torture"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Sirius_torture.jpg" 	data-image-name="Sirius torture.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Sirius_torture.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214420"  	 width="240"  	 height="117"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ee/Sirius_torture.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214420" 	 alt="Sirius torture"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Sirius_torture.jpg" 	data-image-name="Sirius torture.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="117"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Sirius_torture.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry's <i>false</i> vision of Voldemort torturing <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius</a> in the Department of Mysteries</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Eventually, late in the O.W.L. examinations, Harry dozed off and received a vision of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> torturing <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius</a> and ordering him to get the prophecy. Harry was full of mind to go to the Ministry immediately, but Hermione advised him to check <a href="/wiki/Grimmauld_Place" title="Grimmauld Place">Grimmauld Place</a> first to see if Sirius was still there. Harry used the <a href="/wiki/Floo_Network" title="Floo Network">Floo Network</a> in Umbridge's office to peer into Grimmauld Place, where <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> stated that Sirius was gone. Unfortunately, Umbridge caught Harry and his friends in the act. She attempted to extract information via <a href="/wiki/Veritaserum" title="Veritaserum">Veritaserum</a>, which Snape claimed to have used up, before resorting to the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>, revealing that it was she who set the Dementors loose on Harry. Hermione managed to save him by luring Umbridge into the Forbidden Forest, where Umbridge was dragged off by <a href="/wiki/Centaur" title="Centaur">centaurs</a> for insulting them. Harry and Hermione escaped when Grawp stumbled into the centaur camp looking for Hagrid. The trio, along with <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">D.A.</a> members Ginny Weasley, <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> — who had assisted in Harry's attempt to contact Grimmauld Place — used <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">Thestrals</a> to fly to <a href="/wiki/London" title="London">London</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/86/Tumblr_mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616001030" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/86/Tumblr_mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616001030"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/86/Tumblr_mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616001030" 	 alt="Tumblr mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_mrdww6TW8y1qag66no7_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius</a> duelling Death Eaters <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a> and <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After reaching the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a>, Harry led them all through various rooms in search of Sirius, without finding him. The group became doubtful until they came across a room filled with crystal balls, later to be known as <a href="/wiki/Prophecy" title="Prophecy">prophecies</a>. One of the prophecies had Harry's name on it, and he picked it up, much to the displeasure of Hermione. Upon picking up the prophecy <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> appeared, revealing that it was all a ruse to bring him there. Chaos ensued, and all but Harry and Neville were incapacitated in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">fighting</a>. Then reinforcements from the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, alerted by Snape, arrived to help aid in the battle. In the ensuing fighting, Sirius Black was murdered by a curse from his cousin, <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, and fell through a mysterious <a href="/wiki/Veil" title="Veil">stone arch</a>. Harry, enraged, pursued Bellatrix, using the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>, but he was unable to kill her.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/Harrypossessed.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141127142301" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harrypossessed"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harrypossessed.gif" 	data-image-name="Harrypossessed.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/Harrypossessed.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141127142301"  	 width="240"  	 height="115"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/Harrypossessed.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141127142301" 	 alt="Harrypossessed"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harrypossessed.gif" 	data-image-name="Harrypossessed.gif" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="115"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harrypossessed.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry fully possessed by Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Voldemort appeared, enraged by the failures of his Death Eaters. For the second time, he attempted to fatally curse Harry, who was too transfixed to even defend himself, but <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>'s sudden arrival saved him. Voldemort then possessed Harry, hoping that Dumbledore would sacrifice Harry in order to kill Voldemort. However, Voldemort was forced to leave Harry's body when Harry grieved for Sirius, which Voldemort failed to understand. Voldemort then grabbed Bellatrix and <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">disapparated</a>, but <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">the Minister</a> and Ministry employees saw him first.
</p><p>Back at Hogwarts, Harry appeared in Dumbledore's office and tried to get out after <a href="/wiki/Phineas_Nigellus_Black" title="Phineas Nigellus Black">Phineas Nigellus Black</a> mentioned Sirius, only to find the door locked. Harry was none too pleased about Dumbledore's name being mentioned by the portraits. When the Headmaster returned, Harry lost his temper and started destroying Dumbledore's possessions, trying to get Dumbledore to let him out; Dumbledore refused, asking Harry to sit down and listen to what Dumbledore needed to say.
</p><p>Dumbledore explained to Harry the real reason why Voldemort tried to kill him as an infant. A prophecy stated that he was destined to defeat the Dark Lord, for he had powers Voldemort did not: the ability to <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a>, something that the Department of Mysteries was trying to research in a locked room. As a result of the battle, the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> realised that Lord Voldemort had indeed returned, and Harry and Dumbledore were vindicated. Serious steps were taken following this change in policy, such as the dismissal of <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>. However, this was not a sea change, as the Ministry still had a mistrust of Dumbledore.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sixth_year">Sixth year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (film)"><b>Dumbledore</b>: "<i>You are of course, wondering why I brought you here tonight?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Actually sir, after all these years I sort of just go with it.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Dumbledore and Harry speak briefly of their tasks<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p>In the wake of the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, in <a href="/wiki/June" title="June">June</a>, Harry was sent home to <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> for the summer holidays. There, he obsessed over his <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">godfather</a>'s death, hardly leaving his room and refusing meals. As the battle had taken place in the famed <a href="/wiki/Hall_of_Prophecy" title="Hall of Prophecy">Hall of Prophecy</a>, many in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding community</a> including the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> began to speculate about the relationship between Harry and that place, leading to, accidentally correct, reports calling Harry "the Chosen One". 
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 233px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214532" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" 	data-image-name="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/233?cb=20141122214532"  	 width="233"  	 height="140"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/233?cb=20141122214532" 	 alt="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" 	data-image-name="DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" 	 	 width="233"  	 height="140"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DumbledoreSlughornsHouse.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore and Harry searching for <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Early in his summer, Dumbledore requested that Harry join him in some unknown adventure and arrived to pick Harry up on a Friday, late in the evening. However, they could not depart immediately, because there was a piece of business to attend to: Sirius's <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black%27s_will" title="Sirius Black&#39;s will">will</a>. Much to his chagrin, Harry inherited his godfather Sirius Black's estate, including Grimmauld Place and the Blacks' melancholic and half-crazed house elf, <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a>. They soon were off, and Dumbledore <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">apparated</a> Harry to the village of <a href="/wiki/Budleigh_Babberton" title="Budleigh Babberton">Budleigh Babberton</a>, where Harry was introduced to <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a>. In their time together, Harry and Slughorn discussed some of the professor's old students and the improved security at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. When Harry and Dumbledore made to leave, Slughorn agreed to return to the school if he got a raise and a larger office. Following their visit, Dumbledore dropped Harry off at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">the Burrow</a>, where Harry spent the rest of the summer, but not before informing Harry that he was to be given special lessons by Dumbledore himself. Later in the summer, Harry learned that he had achieved seven <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.s</a>; one '<a href="/wiki/Outstanding" title="Outstanding">Outstanding</a>', five '<a href="/wiki/Exceeds_Expectations" title="Exceeds Expectations">Exceeds Expectations</a>', and one '<a href="/wiki/Acceptable" title="Acceptable">Acceptable</a>', he also received a surprise when he was made <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Quidditch_Captain" title="Hogwarts Quidditch Captain">Captain</a> of the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a>, which put him at equal standing with prefects.
</p>
