<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 226px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/640x480.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214540" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="640x480"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="640x480.jpg" 	data-image-name="640x480.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/640x480.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/226?cb=20141122214540"  	 width="226"  	 height="150"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/640x480.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/226?cb=20141122214540" 	 alt="640x480"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="640x480.jpg" 	data-image-name="640x480.jpg" 	 	 width="226"  	 height="150"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:640x480.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry with <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Professor Slughorn</a> being handed the vial of <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Having learned of Professor Slughorn's propensity for hand-picking favourites, Harry experienced this first-hand when he was invited to join Horace Slughorn's <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club" title="Slug Club">Slug Club</a> during the ride to Hogwarts aboard the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>. He did not enjoy the experience, and made to leave as soon as possible. Instead of returning to his seat, Harry made to eavesdrop upon <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, who in a meeting weeks earlier had led Harry to believe he had taken the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a>. What he heard did nothing to dispel his suspicions. Arriving late to the <a href="/wiki/Welcoming_Feast" title="Welcoming Feast">Welcoming Feast</a>, due to an encounter with Malfoy, Harry learned that <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> had been promoted to <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> professor. While this disappointed Harry greatly, his career as an Auror reopened, as Professor Slughorn would accept his 'Exceeds Expectations' score in <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a>. As Harry had not bothered to buy a text book, Slughorn allowed Harry to borrow an old one from the supply cabinet. When Harry examined it, he found that it once had belonged to a student identified only as "<a href="/wiki/The_Half-Blood_Prince" title="The Half-Blood Prince" class="mw-redirect">The Half-Blood Prince</a>". The book contained copious handwritten notes that helped Harry excel in Potions for once. In fact, his skills won him a prize from Slughorn — a small vial of <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a>.
</p><p>Within the first week of school, Dumbledore made good on his promise of <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_Albus_Dumbledore%27s_private_lessons" title="Harry Potter and Albus Dumbledore&#39;s private lessons">private lessons</a>. He informed Harry that they would be viewing memories of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a> before he came to be known as Lord Voldemort, in order to learn his secrets and weaknesses. Dumbledore promised Harry that this information would help him survive and would prove crucial to the eventual defeat of Lord Voldemort. In their first lesson, the pair delved into the origin of the boy Tom Riddle in the <a href="/wiki/House_of_Gaunt" title="House of Gaunt">Gaunt family</a> around <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton" title="Little Hangleton">Little Hangleton</a>. The Saturday following Harry's first lesson, he assumed his Captain's duties holding open try-outs. After an arduous morning, Harry found three <a href="/wiki/Chaser" title="Chaser">Chasers</a>, including <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, two <a href="/wiki/Beater" title="Beater">Beaters</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> as <a href="/wiki/Keeper" title="Keeper">Keeper</a>, who had survived with <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>'s help. Throughout the autumn, Harry used Quidditch to dodge Professor Slughorn's <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club" title="Slug Club">Slug Club</a> events, doing this because he disliked the idea and because it was kinder than leaving Ron alone as Hermione had been invited, as well.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141113235408" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry pensinive"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_pensinive.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry pensinive.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141113235408"  	 width="245"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/Harry_pensinive.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141113235408" 	 alt="Harry pensinive"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_pensinive.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry pensinive.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_pensinive.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry about to view a memory in the <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">Pensieve</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's lessons were quite sporadic that autumn, and he did not have another one until after tragedy befell someone at Hogwarts. In October, during a <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade_weekend_trips" title="Hogsmeade weekend trips">Hogsmeade visit</a>, <a href="/wiki/Katie_Bell" title="Katie Bell">Katie Bell</a> was nearly killed after being bewitched to carry a cursed necklace to Dumbledore. The following Monday, Harry shared his suspicions of Malfoy with <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> during their lesson, only to be rebuffed. That evening, Dumbledore focused on Tom Riddle just as he was on the cusp of his Hogwarts years, and Harry discovered a troubled orphan who consciously used his magic to bully and intimidate the other children. Not long after that meeting, Quidditch season was upon them. In preparation for their first game, Harry replaced the injured Katie Bell with <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>. The change produced some results, both expected, as the team excelled on the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Pitch" title="Quidditch Pitch" class="mw-redirect">pitch</a>, and unexpected, as Harry found himself in a jealous rage after seeing Dean kissing Ginny after practice. The team's only problem was Ron, who was suffering from confidence issues. In an attempt to boost Ron's confidence, Harry blatantly acted as if he had spiked Ron's <a href="/wiki/Pumpkin_juice" title="Pumpkin juice">pumpkin juice</a> with <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a>. Ron took the bait and played a flawless match; however, Hermione took the bait as well and acted unkindly toward Ron and Harry. While she made up with Harry when he told her of the ruse, Ron's sudden relationship with <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a> led to continued strife.
</p><p>While Harry attempted to reconcile his best friends, the <a href="/wiki/Christmas_holidays" title="Christmas holidays">Christmas holidays</a> were fast approaching and with them the <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club_Christmas_party" title="Slug Club Christmas party">Slug Club Christmas party</a> out of which Harry could not wrangle. Since "The Chosen One" rumours had been printed, Harry had received an unnatural amount of attention from the young ladies at Hogwarts, specifically a <a href="/wiki/Fourth_year" title="Fourth year">fourth year</a> name <a href="/wiki/Romilda_Vane" title="Romilda Vane">Romilda Vane</a>. As Harry could not ask Ginny to the party, he was left to ask <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> to attend with him as a friend. This hugely disappointed the gaggles of giggling girls who awaited Harry below every doorway with <a href="/wiki/Mistletoe" title="Mistletoe">mistletoe</a>. At the party, Harry was surprised to learn that Hermione attended with <a href="/wiki/Cormac_McLaggen" title="Cormac McLaggen">Cormac McLaggen</a>, a large <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> seventh year whom Ron despised, and told her that it served her right when he was less than gentlemanly. Later, after <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a> was apprehended "gate-crashing" the party, Harry learned that Malfoy was indeed up to something and that <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a> had made the <a href="/wiki/Unbreakable_Vow" title="Unbreakable Vow">Unbreakable Vow</a> to protect him.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214628" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry in Hallway"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_in_Hallway.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry in Hallway.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20141122214628"  	 width="235"  	 height="121"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_in_Hallway.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20141122214628" 	 alt="Harry in Hallway"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_in_Hallway.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry in Hallway.jpg" 	 	 width="235"  	 height="121"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_in_Hallway.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry overhears a strange conversation between <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> and Snape</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a> was less than enjoyable, as he was cornered by the new <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a>. Scrimgeour had been hoping to speak with Harry for months and used <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy Weasley</a> as his in, interrupting the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a> Christmas. He tried pitching Harry on becoming the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry</a>'s mascot, an idea that Harry was not prepared to accept. Upon returning to Hogwarts, Harry's sporadic lessons with Dumbledore continued. Early in January, Harry delved into a memory that all but proved that Riddle had killed his own paternal family after his <a href="/wiki/Fifth_year" title="Fifth year">fifth year</a> at Hogwarts. Then Dumbledore showed Harry a most curious memory, a memory that <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Professor Slughorn</a> had apparently tampered with, and he gave Harry his first homework assignment: to get the real memory from Slughorn. After impressing Slughorn using a <a href="/wiki/Bezoar" title="Bezoar">bezoar</a> in class, Harry tried the direct approach only to be instantly shot down.
</p><p>By <a href="/wiki/1_March" title="1 March">1 March</a>, Harry had still not acquired Slughorn's true memory and had begun to grow more obsessed with <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. That morning he awoke to find Ron under the influence of a very powerful <a href="/wiki/Love_Potion" title="Love Potion">Love Potion</a>, and he took him to Slughorn, only for Ron to end up poisoned. This was enough for Hermione to overcome her animosity toward Ron, and the three became friends again. Ron survived, but was not fit for the upcoming Quidditch match, so he was replaced by McLaggen. This turned out to be a bad choice, as McLaggen accidentally knocked Harry unconscious mid-match. Upon his recovery, Harry had yet another lesson with the Headmaster. In it, he was upbraided by Dumbledore for not completing his assignment, witnessed the young Tom Riddle kill a <a href="/wiki/Hepzibah_Smith" title="Hepzibah Smith">woman</a> for the famous artefacts (<a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_locket" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s locket">Salazar Slytherin's locket</a> and <a href="/wiki/Helga_Hufflepuff%27s_cup" title="Helga Hufflepuff&#39;s cup">Helga Hufflepuff's cup</a>) she owned, and curse the <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> post at Hogwarts. However, Harry still could not figure out how to obtain the memory and focused on Malfoy. His interest was bordering on obsession, when Ron came up with the solution to Harry's dilemma with Slughorn: <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a>. In the evening, Harry took the potion and not only managed to obtain the memory, but also solved many of his and his friends's problems, including breaking up not only Ginny and Dean but also Ron and <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a>.
</p><p>Even though it was after midnight, Harry immediately went to Dumbledore with the new memory. It confirmed Dumbledore's theory that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> had created multiple <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> to ensure his <a href="/wiki/Immortality" title="Immortality">immortality</a>. Together, they theorised that the Dark Lord had created Horcruxes out of special objects such as <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">Riddle's Diary</a> and <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_locket" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s locket">Slytherin's Locket</a>. Before Harry left, Dumbledore promised to let Harry join him if he found another Horcrux. With the memory found, Harry had only Quidditch and Malfoy on his mind. In the week prior to the final Quidditch match, Harry discovered Malfoy crying in the toilet, and a <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duel</a> ensued. With Malfoy on the verge of using an <a href="/wiki/Unforgivable_Curses" title="Unforgivable Curses">Unforgivable Curse</a>, Harry cast <a href="/wiki/Sectumsempra" title="Sectumsempra">Sectumsempra</a>, a curse with unknown effects that he found in <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape%27s_copy_of_Advanced_Potion-Making" title="Severus Snape&#39;s copy of Advanced Potion-Making">the Half-Blood Prince's book</a>, nearly killing Malfoy and earning Harry indefinite Saturday <a href="/wiki/Detention" title="Detention" class="mw-redirect">detentions</a>. Unable to play, Harry waited with anticipation as he sat through his first detention. When he arrived back at <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">Gryffindor Tower</a> he was happy to discover that they had won the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Cup" title="Quidditch Cup" class="mw-redirect">Quidditch Cup</a>, and spontaneously kissed <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, about whom he had been thinking quite often, when she embraced him in the post-match elation; this marked the beginning of their relationship.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/1hbpconceptart_13.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214644" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="1hbpconceptart 13"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="1hbpconceptart_13.jpg" 	data-image-name="1hbpconceptart 13.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/1hbpconceptart_13.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214644"  	 width="240"  	 height="106"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/1hbpconceptart_13.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214644" 	 alt="1hbpconceptart 13"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="1hbpconceptart_13.jpg" 	data-image-name="1hbpconceptart 13.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="106"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:1hbpconceptart_13.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Dumbledore in the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> cave overwhelmed by <a href="/wiki/Inferi" title="Inferi" class="mw-redirect">Inferi</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In <a href="/wiki/June" title="June">June</a>, Dumbledore led Harry out of the castle in search of a <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>. From <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>, they <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">apparated</a> to a sea-side <a href="/wiki/Crystal_Cave" title="Crystal Cave">cave</a>, where Tom Riddle had traumatised two young children from his orphanage in his youth. The cave was difficult to enter with a toll paid in blood, and to get to the island in the centre of the cave there was only a small boat, only made to fit one. Once on the island, Dumbledore found a basin that he could not remove the Horcrux from without drinking its contents. Dumbledore extracted a promise from Harry that he would force him to drink, no matter how much he tried to persuade him not to. With this promise, Dumbledore drank, and Harry watched as Dumbledore was driven out of his mind, but upheld his promise. When the basin was empty, Dumbledore asked for water which Harry was forced to get from the lake, triggering the <a href="/wiki/Inferius" title="Inferius">Inferi</a> that were waiting there. Panicking, Harry was dragged below, but was saved when an incredibly weakened Dumbledore conjured a firestorm that fended off the Inferi. They landed atop the <a href="/wiki/Astronomy_Tower" title="Astronomy Tower">Astronomy Tower</a> to discover that Hogwarts had been invaded by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, but Harry's friends Ron, Hermione, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a>, <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, who had been ordered to watch the school lest Malfoy accomplish his nefarious goal, battled alongside members of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> on the floor below Harry and Dumbledore, with some help from the remainder of Harry's vial of <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a>. Dumbledore had stopped Harry from fighting and frozen him against a wall, hidden underneath his <a href="/wiki/Invisibility_Cloak" title="Invisibility Cloak" class="mw-redirect">invisibility cloak</a>, so all he could do was watch.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Dumbledore-falling.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214731" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Dumbledore-falling"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Dumbledore-falling.jpg" 	data-image-name="Dumbledore-falling.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Dumbledore-falling.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214731"  	 width="240"  	 height="110"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/Dumbledore-falling.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214731" 	 alt="Dumbledore-falling"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Dumbledore-falling.jpg" 	data-image-name="Dumbledore-falling.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="110"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore-falling.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry witnesses the death of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>, his mentor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry witnessed the death of Albus Dumbledore at the hands of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, and Dumbledore's body then plummeted from the tallest tower at Hogwarts. With Dumbledore dead, Harry was free of the spell that petrified him. He immediately set off after Snape, petrifying a Death Eater and seeking revenge. As the Death Eaters made their way out of Hogwarts Castle and on to the grounds, trying to reach the border where they would be able to <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparate</a> again, Harry pursued and faced off against Snape. Harry tried many times to defeat Snape, even weakly attempting the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> and Snape's own hand crafted spells, all with no effect. In the process, Snape identified himself as the Half-Blood Prince, and escaped Hogwarts with <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> and the other Death Eaters. <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> found Harry and together they managed to extinguish the fire that burnt Hagrid's hut (caused by <a href="/wiki/Thorfinn_Rowle" title="Thorfinn Rowle">Thorfinn Rowle</a>). Harry then told Hagrid that "<i>Snape killed Dumbledore</i>", but Hagrid refused to believe him. Harry (along with Hagrid) returned to the castle to find people staring at Dumbledore's crippled and lifeless body. Harry moved forward and found his mentor's body lying completely still on the ground and Hagrid finally believed him. Harry started to cry over Dumbledore's body where he was comforted by Ginny.
</p><p>Harry took the locket from Dumbledore's robes and was beside himself when he learned it was just a plain bit of jewellery, a decoy; there was a note inside the locket that revealed the real Horcrux was taken by someone called "<a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">R.A.B.</a>". It appeared to Harry that Dumbledore had died in vain and that they had achieved nothing that night. Ginny escorted Harry to the hospital wing on <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a>'s orders, where he found <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a> apparently asleep in bed, as well as <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a>, <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Tonks</a>, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Lupin</a>, <a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a> and Ron's brother <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> who had been horribly scarred by <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a>. When Ginny announced that Dumbledore was dead, everyone appeared horrified. Harry explained to everyone what had happened on the Astronomy Tower and when he was finished, they were all shocked by what he had said.
</p><p>Following the death of Albus Dumbledore, his funeral was carried out. Harry was disgusted to see that <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> and <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> had the nerve to attend his funeral, but he did not want to make a scene at Dumbledore's funeral and bit his tongue.
</p><p>Knowing that he would have to <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter&#39;s Horcrux Hunt">hunt down</a> Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> and fearing for her safety, Harry took Ginny aside, and broke off their romance. Ginny told him that she did not care about the danger of being his girlfriend, but Harry still thought it was best if the two stopped seeing each other. He then spoke to Ron and Hermione, who committed to forgoing their final year at Hogwarts in order to accompany him, despite his protests.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Hunting_the_Horcruxes_.281997-1998.29">Hunting the Horcruxes <small>(1997-1998)</small></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>You said to us once before that there was time to turn back if we wanted to. We've had time, haven't we?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>We're with you, whatever happens mate.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; <a href="/wiki/Hermione" title="Hermione" class="mw-redirect">Hermione</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ron" title="Ron" class="mw-redirect">Ron</a> vowing to help Harry in the Horcrux hunt<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/00Imagem.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214752" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="00Imagem"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="00Imagem.jpg" 	data-image-name="00Imagem.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/00Imagem.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214752"  	 width="240"  	 height="121"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/db/00Imagem.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122214752" 	 alt="00Imagem"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="00Imagem.jpg" 	data-image-name="00Imagem.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="121"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:00Imagem.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia Dursley</a> saying good-bye to Harry Potter in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry, Hermione, and Ron all remained committed to their goal to locate and destroy <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. To protect their families, Hermione <a href="/wiki/False_Memory_Charm" title="False Memory Charm" class="mw-redirect">altered her parents' memories</a> so that they forgot they had a daughter, then instructed them to move to Australia, and with some help from Fred, George, and their father, Ron transfigured the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family_ghoul" title="Weasley family ghoul">family ghoul</a> to resemble himself with <a href="/wiki/Spattergroit" title="Spattergroit">spattergroit</a>. Harry's <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">aunt</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">uncle</a> were taken into hiding by several members of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, such as <a href="/wiki/Dedalus_Diggle" title="Dedalus Diggle">Dedalus Diggle</a><b> </b>and <a href="/wiki/Hestia_Jones" title="Hestia Jones">Hestia Jones</a>, despite many misgivings on the part of the Dursleys.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I told them you'd take it like this.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>If you think I'm going to let six people risk their lives —&#160;!</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>— because it's the first time for all of us.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; The Trio before the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/7-potters.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122214814" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="7-potters"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="7-potters.jpg" 	data-image-name="7-potters.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/7-potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20141122214814"  	 width="235"  	 height="139"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/7-potters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20141122214814" 	 alt="7-potters"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="7-potters.jpg" 	data-image-name="7-potters.jpg" 	 	 width="235"  	 height="139"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:7-potters.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Seven Potters</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry stayed at <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> for a time, but the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> needed to evacuate him to <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">the Burrow</a> before he turned seventeen. They sent the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> into hiding first; Harry was surprised by <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a>'s gratitude and goodbye. Six out of thirteen of Harry's escorts took <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> to take on Harry's appearance in order to be diversions if they were attacked, despite Harry's protests. Harry also secretly thought that he wished they would respect his body more. Upon leaving, the group was attacked by over thirty <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>. Harry rode with <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> on his godfather <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black%27s_motorcycle" title="Sirius Black&#39;s motorcycle" class="mw-redirect">Sirius' old motorbike</a>, and they were attacked by multiple <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> and <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> himself.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5e/Tumblr_lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140408223005" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5e/Tumblr_lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140408223005"  	 width="245"  	 height="103"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5e/Tumblr_lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140408223005" 	 alt="Tumblr lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="103"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_lug4mz1evZ1qgt0vro6_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">Harry Potter's wand</a> retaliated automatically against <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's owl <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a> was hit by a stray <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> a Death Eater sent Harry's way. When Voldemort caught up with them, Harry thought this was the end, but his <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">wand</a> acted on its own to strike out at the man who was both kin and mortal enemy, destroying Voldemort's borrowed wand. The chaos ended when Harry and Hagrid passed the protective enchantments placed over the house of <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a>' parents, although Harry was still completely grief-stricken over the death of his beloved owl. After finding Hagrid safe and sound, the pair took a <a href="/wiki/Portkey" title="Portkey">Portkey</a> to the Burrow, where he found a worried <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Tumblr_mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307033516" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Tumblr_mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307033516"  	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Tumblr_mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307033516" 	 alt="Tumblr mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_mqmg5k5aLP1rrszjzo4_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry embracing Ron and Hermione after the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was relieved to see that Hermione and Ron were fine, but was shocked when <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> arrived with <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a>, who had lost an ear. Everyone else arrived safely, but <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a> who had been murdered by Voldemort and <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a>, who had <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Disapparated</a> as soon as the fight started. Many amongst those gathered at the Burrow believed that they had been betrayed, but Harry refused to believe any of those he loved would sell him to Voldemort, much to the chagrin of <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>. Harry then stormed outside, where he was struck by a vision of Voldemort torturing <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Ollivander</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Time_at_the_Burrow">Time at the Burrow</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Scrimgeour</b>: "<i>Remembered you're not at school, have you? Remembered that I am not Dumbledore, who forgave your insolence and insubordination? You may wear that scar like a crown, Potter, but it is not up to a seventeen-year-old boy to tell me how to do my job! It's time you learned some respect!</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>It's time you earned it.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; During the reading of <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore's will</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Scrimddwill.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215123" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Scrimddwill"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Scrimddwill.jpg" 	data-image-name="Scrimddwill.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Scrimddwill.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122215123"  	 width="230"  	 height="153"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Scrimddwill.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122215123" 	 alt="Scrimddwill"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Scrimddwill.jpg" 	data-image-name="Scrimddwill.jpg" 	 	 width="230"  	 height="153"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Scrimddwill.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus</a> gives the first Snitch Harry caught, willed to him by Albus Dumbledore</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Once settled in at the Burrow, Harry, Ron and Hermione helped prepare the wedding ceremony of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>. The <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">day before the wedding</a>, the group <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_seventeenth_birthday_party" title="Harry Potter&#39;s seventeenth birthday party" class="mw-redirect">celebrated</a> Harry's seventeenth birthday. Harry received a <a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett%27s_watch" title="Fabian Prewett&#39;s watch">watch</a> from <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Mr</a> and Mrs Weasley, a traditional coming-of-age gift, and Ginny gave him a kiss to remember her by in case he "<i>meet[s] some veela</i>" during the Horcrux hunt.
</p><p>At the party that night, <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a> arrived to release the contents of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>'s <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">will</a>. Harry was left the first Snitch he had ever caught in a Quidditch match and <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a>; Scrimgeour withheld this second gift, claiming that it was a historical magical item and was not exclusively Harry's property. Noting that Harry, Ron, and Hermione were the only students mentioned by name in the will, he asked the trio why this was; the three were unable to give him an answer.
</p><p>On <a href="/wiki/1_August" title="1 August">1 August</a>, Harry attended Bill and Fleur's wedding disguised as a distant <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley</a> cousin, Barny Weasley. They used polyjuice potion and the hairs of a <a href="/wiki/Red-haired_Muggle_boy" title="Red-haired Muggle boy">Red-haired Muggle boy</a> from the village to disguise him. The reception was interrupted when the <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> of <a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley Shacklebolt</a> arrived and announced the <a href="/wiki/Fall_of_the_Ministry_of_Magic" title="Fall of the Ministry of Magic">Fall of the Ministry of Magic</a> and the death of Rufus Scrimgeour. Chaos erupted and guests started to flee, while Harry and Hermione drew their <a href="/wiki/Wand" title="Wand">wands</a> and grabbed Ron before Disapparating to <a href="/wiki/Tottenham_Court_Road" title="Tottenham Court Road">Tottenham Court Road</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Tumblr_n74uropii41qetk8mo6_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140728172704" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr n74uropii41qetk8mo6 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n74uropii41qetk8mo6_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n74uropii41qetk8mo6 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Tumblr_n74uropii41qetk8mo6_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140728172704"  	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Tumblr_n74uropii41qetk8mo6_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140728172704" 	 alt="Tumblr n74uropii41qetk8mo6 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n74uropii41qetk8mo6_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n74uropii41qetk8mo6 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_n74uropii41qetk8mo6_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio after changing their sets of clothes after their escape</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>There, Hermione revealed that she had planned ahead, packing supplies in her bag, which had an <a href="/wiki/Undetectable_Extension_Charm" title="Undetectable Extension Charm">Undetectable Extension Charm</a> on it. Ron changed, and Harry put on his <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility cloak</a>, and the three then entered a nearby <a href="/wiki/Luchino_Caffe" title="Luchino Caffe">café</a> to hang low for a while. Whilst at the café, Ron and Hermione discussed the events of the wedding and Voldemort's coup. They unwittingly broke the <a href="/wiki/Taboo" title="Taboo">Taboo curse</a> that had been placed on Voldemort's name when the Death Eaters overthrew the Ministry of Magic, alerting Death Eaters <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a> and <a href="/wiki/Thorfinn_Rowle" title="Thorfinn Rowle">Thorfinn Rowle</a> to their location. After a brief <a href="/wiki/Luchino_Caffe_Duel" title="Luchino Caffe Duel">skirmish</a>, the trio defeated the Death Eaters, whose memories Hermione <a href="/wiki/Memory_Charm" title="Memory Charm">wiped</a> at Harry's suggestion. Harry, Ron, and Hermione then found refuge at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Infiltrating_the_Ministry_and_obtaining_the_locket">Infiltrating the Ministry and obtaining the locket</span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Infiltration_of_the_Ministry" title="Infiltration of the Ministry" class="mw-redirect">Infiltration of the Ministry</a></i></div>
</dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>You're going to leave here with us. Go home, grab your children, and get out, get out of the country if you've got to. Disguise yourselves and run. You've seen how it is, you won't get anything like a fair hearing here.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry while freeing <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-borns</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Muggle-Born_Registration_Commission" title="Muggle-Born Registration Commission">Muggle-Born Registration Commission</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 239px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f4/Albert1.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141127142628" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Albert1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Albert1.gif" 	data-image-name="Albert1.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f4/Albert1.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/239?cb=20141127142628"  	 width="239"  	 height="100"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f4/Albert1.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/239?cb=20141127142628" 	 alt="Albert1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Albert1.gif" 	data-image-name="Albert1.gif" 	 	 width="239"  	 height="100"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Albert1.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry disguised as <a href="/wiki/Albert_Runcorn" title="Albert Runcorn">Albert Runcorn</a> during the infiltration</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Having found no leads regarding the Horcruxes over the summer, Harry discovered <a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">R.A.B.</a> during the trio's first morning at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a>. Once Hermione remembered that the <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_locket" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s locket">locket</a> had been in the house during its occupation by the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, Harry summoned <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a>, and they learned that it had been stolen by <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a>. When the trio questioned him about it, he revealed that it was now in the possession of <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>. On the same day, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> had been to visit. He asked Harry if he could join them, but once Harry found out that <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Tonks</a> was pregnant, he refused. This caused a temporary rift between the two of them.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215131" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Undesirable no. 1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Undesirable_no._1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Undesirable no. 1.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215131"  	 width="140"  	 height="222"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/10/Undesirable_no._1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215131" 	 alt="Undesirable no. 1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Undesirable_no._1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Undesirable no. 1.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="222"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Undesirable_no._1.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry as "Undesirable No. 1" by the Ministry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>For the following month, the trio would take turns under the Invisibility Cloak to watch the Ministry entrance. Formulating their plans, they managed to <a href="/wiki/Infiltration_of_the_Ministry_of_Magic" title="Infiltration of the Ministry of Magic">infiltrate the Ministry</a>. Using <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> Harry transformed into <a href="/wiki/Albert_Runcorn" title="Albert Runcorn">Albert Runcorn</a>. He searched Umbridge's office but did not find the locket. He did, however, take Moody's <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody%27s_magical_eye" title="Alastor Moody&#39;s magical eye">eye</a> from her door. Finding Umbridge trying <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-borns</a> for "stealing" magic, Hermione managed to trick Umbridge into revealing the locket, and she lied about how she obtained it.
</p><p>Furious, Harry <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">stunned</a> both her and <a href="/wiki/Yaxley" title="Yaxley">Yaxley</a>. He and Hermione freed the Muggle-borns who were being held by the <a href="/wiki/Muggle-Born_Registration_Commission" title="Muggle-Born Registration Commission">Muggle-Born Registration Commission</a>, and Hermione <a href="/wiki/Geminio" title="Geminio" class="mw-redirect">conjured a copy</a> of the locket while they took the real thing. They met up with Ron again and escaped, though Yaxley grabbed Hermione’s arm while they were Disapparating. She evaded him with a <a href="/wiki/Revulsion_Jinx" title="Revulsion Jinx">Revulsion Jinx</a>, but the location of 12 Grimmauld Place was revealed to him, and they were forced to abandon it as a hide-out. But instead Hermione took them to the woods that were once the location of the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_World_Cup" title="Quidditch World Cup">Quidditch World Cup</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron.27s_departure">Ron's departure</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I thought you knew what you’d signed up for.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Yeah, I thought I did too.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>So what part of it isn't living up to your expectations? Did you think we’d be staying in five-star hotels? Finding a Horcrux every other day? Did you think you’d be back to Mummy by Christmas?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>We thought you knew what you were doing! We thought Dumbledore had told you what to do, we thought you had a real plan!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry and Ron before the latter's departure<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p>After securing the locket, the three friends took turns wearing it, to ensure it was not lost. The locket had a negative influence on all of them, straining relations and causing them to all act moody and inclined to get into petty arguments. They overheard a goblin saying that the sword protected by Snape was a fake. They learned that the Sword of Gryffindor in <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Snape</a>'s office was a copy of the real sword, and that they would have to trace the location of the real sword.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry ron fight"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_ron_fight.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry ron fight.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" 	 alt="Harry ron fight"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_ron_fight.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry ron fight.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_ron_fight.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ron fight before Ron abandons the hunt</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and Hermione were excited at knowing what object they could use to destroy Horcruxes, but the locket's negative energy pushed Ron over the edge. Knowing that they now had something they were not close to destroying, Ron and Harry got into a horrible row, in which Ron accused Harry of not knowing what he was doing and not being very concerned when they learned that <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> had been punished for attempting to steal Gryffindor’s Sword for them, along with <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>. Ron then abandoned his friends accusing Hermione of preferring Harry to himself.
</p><p>Ron’s departure left both Harry and Hermione depressed. After some listless time in which they accomplished nothing, they decided to head to <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>, as Harry wanted to visit his parents graves, and Hermione had convinced herself that Dumbledore might have entrusted the Sword of Gryffindor to <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>, a magical historian who lived there and who had been friendly with the Potters and the <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore_family" title="Dumbledore family">Dumbledores</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Attack_at_Godric.27s_Hollow">Attack at Godric's Hollow</span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1997)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1997)">Attack at Godric's Hollow (1997)</a></i></div>
</dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Meanwhile, we went to Godric's Hollow and, let's think, what happened there, Harry? Oh yes, You-Know-Who's snake turned up, it nearly killed both of us and then You-Know who himself arrived and missed us by about a second.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>What?</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Hermione recounting their trip to Godric's Hollow<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest?cb=20130219230228" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="NaginiCombat"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="NaginiCombat.gif" 	data-image-name="NaginiCombat.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest?cb=20130219230228"  	 width="250"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6c/NaginiCombat.gif/revision/latest?cb=20130219230228" 	 alt="NaginiCombat"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="NaginiCombat.gif" 	data-image-name="NaginiCombat.gif" 	 	 width="250"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:NaginiCombat.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> attacking Harry in <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>'s house in <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They arrived on <a href="/wiki/24_December" title="24 December">Christmas Eve</a>. After seeing the <a href="/wiki/Potter_memorial" title="Potter memorial">memorial</a> dedicated to his parents, Harry and Hermione searched the graveyard for the Potters's grave and came across the grave of <a href="/wiki/Kendra_Dumbledore" title="Kendra Dumbledore">Kendra</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ariana_Dumbledore" title="Ariana Dumbledore">Ariana Dumbledore</a> and that of Ignotus Peverell. Harry was filled with regret that Dumbledore had not shared this connection with him. Upon discovering Harry's parents's grave Hermione called out to Harry and comforted him when he reached the grave. After placing a wreath on his parents’s graves, the two then met Bathilda, who motioned for them to follow her into her home. Believing Bathilda wanted to give him the Sword, Harry accompanied her upstairs alone when she indicated that Hermione should stay downstairs.
</p><p>Once there, she questioned Harry in what he did not realise was <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>, revealing herself to in fact be <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, Voldemort's snake. Voldemort had murderd Bathilda and animated her corpse to hide Nagini, who attacked Harry, biting and coiling herself around Harry. Hermione raced upstairs and repelled the snake, while Harry’s <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">scar</a> burned, alerting him to Voldemort’s approach. The pair managed to escape, but Harry was knocked unconscious and such a close call with Voldemort caused the connection to re-open and Harry had a vision of his parents' demise. And in the <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1997)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1997)">scuffle</a>, Harry's <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">wand</a> was accidentally broken by Hermione's <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">Blasting Curse</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron.27s_return_and_the_obtaining_of_the_Sword_of_Gryffindor">Ron's return and the obtaining of the Sword of Gryffindor</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Ron, stab it, STAB IT!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry and Ron confronting Voldemort's locket Horcrux<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912132225" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Patronus doe"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Patronus_doe.gif" 	data-image-name="Patronus doe.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912132225"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Patronus_doe.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912132225" 	 alt="Patronus doe"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Patronus_doe.gif" 	data-image-name="Patronus doe.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Patronus_doe.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry being lead by a  doe Patronus to the hiding place of the <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">Sword of Gryffindor</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After escaping Voldemort, Harry and Hermione camped out in the <a href="/wiki/Forest_of_Dean" title="Forest of Dean">Forest of Dean</a>, where Hermione healed Nagini’s bite with <a href="/wiki/Dittany" title="Dittany">Dittany</a>. When they were camped out there, Harry and Hermione read parts of <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>'s biography of Dumbledore, <i><a href="/wiki/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore">The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore</a></i> which Hermione had stolen from the home of Bathilda Bagshot. Upon reading, Harry felt betrayed, because <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> had not shared this information with Harry. Hermione tried to convince Harry that Dumbledore had his best interests at heart, but Harry became quite disillusioned.
</p><p>A couple nights later, while standing guard outside the tent, Harry was lead by a silver doe <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a> to a frozen pool into which someone had placed the Sword of Gryffindor, which leads Harry to strip to his underwear and jump in the pool. While trying to acquire the sword, the locket attempted to strangle him, but he was rescued by Ron, who had returned through the use of his <a href="/wiki/Deluminator" title="Deluminator">Deluminator</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Harry_Hermione_riddle.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140812153210" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry Hermione riddle"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Hermione_riddle.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry Hermione riddle.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Harry_Hermione_riddle.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140812153210"  	 width="240"  	 height="119"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f5/Harry_Hermione_riddle.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140812153210" 	 alt="Harry Hermione riddle"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Hermione_riddle.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry Hermione riddle.gif" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="119"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Hermione_riddle.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Riddle Harry and Riddle Hermione share a kiss after taunting Ron</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the brief skirmish with the Horcrux, a taunting Harry and Hermione appear, created by the Horcrux. The naked Harry and Hermione begin to kiss passionately, angering Ron, who then destroyed the Horcrux with the sword, casting the two away. As Ron had saved his life, Harry forgave him for leaving, and after seeing the Horcrux torture Ron, explained that he had no feelings for Hermione beyond that of a sibling. Hermione, who had been inside the tent during the destruction of the Horcrux, was angry with Ron for a longer period.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Visit_to_the_Lovegood_House">Visit to the Lovegood House</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>‘There were once three brothers who were travelling along a long, winding road at twilight — </i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Midnight, our mum always told us. Sorry, I just think it’s a bit spookier if it’s midnight!</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Yeah, because we really need a bit more fear in our lives.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; The trio while reading <i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></i> at the Lovegood House<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest?cb=20141031144607" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Xenophilius-Lovegood"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" 	data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141031144607"  	 width="240"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141031144607" 	 alt="Xenophilius-Lovegood"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" 	data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Trio speaking with <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a> at his home, near the village of <a href="/wiki/Ottery_St._Catchpole" title="Ottery St. Catchpole" class="mw-redirect">Ottery St. Catchpole</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At Hermione's request, the three friends travelled to <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>’s <a href="/wiki/Lovegood_House" title="Lovegood House" class="mw-redirect">home</a> to question <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a>. They asked about a triangular symbol Dumbledore had left them to decipher in the <a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">book</a> he bequeathed to Hermione. After learning of the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>, Harry, Ron, and Hermione discovered that Xenophilius summoned Death Eaters in an attempt to persuade them to return his abducted daughter. The trio <a href="/wiki/Ambush_at_the_Lovegood_House" title="Ambush at the Lovegood House">escaped</a> the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Dea</a><a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">th Eaters</a> when Hermione blasted the floor open to show them Harry, but managed to keep Ron's alibi of being sick at home with <a href="/wiki/Spattergroit" title="Spattergroit">spattergroit</a> intact by covering him with the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility Cloak</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 220px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/The_sign_of_the_Deathly_Hallows.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20141122215137" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="The sign of the Deathly Hallows"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="The_sign_of_the_Deathly_Hallows.JPG" 	data-image-name="The sign of the Deathly Hallows.JPG" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/The_sign_of_the_Deathly_Hallows.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/220?cb=20141122215137"  	 width="220"  	 height="96"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/The_sign_of_the_Deathly_Hallows.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/220?cb=20141122215137" 	 alt="The sign of the Deathly Hallows"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="The_sign_of_the_Deathly_Hallows.JPG" 	data-image-name="The sign of the Deathly Hallows.JPG" 	 	 width="220"  	 height="96"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_sign_of_the_Deathly_Hallows.JPG" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The sign of the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry soon became obsessed by the Deathly Hallows. He spent hours each day brooding over the possibilities forgetting about his responsibilities. He came to believe that the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> was enclosed within the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a> bequeathed to him by Dumbledore. He also surmised that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> was abroad in a search for the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder </a><a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Wand</a>. This obsession troubled his friends, and with the drop in Harry's attentiveness, Ron's leadership qualities flourished.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Capture_by_Snatchers_and_Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor">Capture by Snatchers and Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</a></i></div>
</dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>You're a lying, you filthy <a href="/wiki/Mudblood" title="Mudblood">Mudblood</a>, and I know it! You have been inside my vault at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a>! Tell the truth, </i>tell the truth!<i> What else did you take? What else have you got? Tell me the truth or, I swear, I shall run you through with this knife! What else did you take, what else? ANSWER ME! </i><a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">CRUCIO</a><i>!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Overheard parts of Bellatrix's interrogation of <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>After listening to a broadcast of <i><a href="/wiki/Potterwatch" title="Potterwatch">Potterwatch</a></i> around Easter <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Harry determined that Voldemort was seeking the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>, and accidentally broke the <a href="/wiki/Taboo" title="Taboo">Taboo</a> on Voldemort's name. Captured by a gang of <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a> led by <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a>, the trio was questioned as to their identities. Hermione had hit Harry's face with a <a href="/wiki/Stinging_Hex" title="Stinging Hex" class="mw-redirect">Stinging Hex</a>, attempting to conceal their true identities. After Greyback and <a href="/wiki/Scabior" title="Scabior">Scabior</a> realised that they had caught Harry Potter, the trio was taken to <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a> in <a href="/wiki/Wiltshire" title="Wiltshire">Wiltshire</a>, <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">England</a>.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/58/Tumblr_msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140622054635" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/58/Tumblr_msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140622054635"  	 width="245"  	 height="142"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/58/Tumblr_msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140622054635" 	 alt="Tumblr msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="142"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_msmbxcyevh1qgwmapo2_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Bellatrix Lestrange at Malfoy Manor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> learned that Harry had been caught, she sought to <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">summon</a> Voldemort, until she noticed one of the Snatchers had the Sword of Gryffindor, which was supposed to be in her <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">vault</a> at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts Wizarding Bank</a>. From her drastic change in tone of voice and her worries that they would all perish, Harry determined that another Horcrux was hidden there, as well. Bellatrix isolated Hermione for interrogation and torture with the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>, but Hermione lied, claiming that the Sword was just a copy. Harry convinced <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Goblin" title="Goblin">goblin</a> prisoner, to support this story.
</p><p>In panic as Hermione screamed in pain upstairs, and Ron sobbed at hearing her, Harry called out for help — a cry heard by <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a> through a fragment of a two-way mirror in the cellar. Aberforth sent <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> the <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a> to rescue the prisoners. Harry had him take <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Garrick Ollivander</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a> to <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>, while he and Ron went to rescue Hermione. On the way, they had to fight <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, whose silver hand strangled him to death when he hesitated to hurt Harry, who reminded him that he had once saved his life. A <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">skirmish</a> ensued upstairs, during which Harry took <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy%27s_wand" title="Draco Malfoy&#39;s wand">Draco Malfoy's wand</a> from him, and he and Ron saved Hermione and Griphook with Dobby's assistance.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Escape_and_Dobby.27s_death">Escape and Dobby's death</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Dobby, no, don't die, don't die —</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Dobby</b>: "<i>Harry... Potter...</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>'s final moments.<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140612002051" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Dobby death"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Dobby_death.gif" 	data-image-name="Dobby death.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140612002051"  	 width="240"  	 height="101"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Dobby_death.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140612002051" 	 alt="Dobby death"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Dobby_death.gif" 	data-image-name="Dobby death.gif" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="101"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dobby_death.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dobby dies in Harry's arms</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As they escaped Malfoy Manor by <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparition</a>, <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> threw a silver knife to where they were disapparating. Harry was initially relieved to realise he had managed to apparate to <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a> with Ron, Hermione, and Dobby in tow, but was horrified to see the knife protruding from Dobby's chest before Dobby collapsed and died in Harry's arms. Harry decided that he would not build the grave of <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> with magic, opting instead to do so manually, using a shovel; this was his way of both repaying Dobby's bravery and ebbing his own grief.
</p><p>Harry, his scar now burning temptingly threatening to have Voldemort's thoughts engulf him, was finally able to learn control of denying <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>'s entry into his mind.
