He attributed this to his grief and love for Dobby. While digging the grave, more understanding came to Harry. He realised that though the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> were tempting objects, Dumbledore had tasked him with destroying <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. He decided to trust Dumbledore, reaffirming his faith in his mentor. During the <a href="/wiki/Funeral_of_Dobby" title="Funeral of Dobby">funeral</a>, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> gave a short eulogy to Dobby, and Harry managed to say his final goodbye to one of his most loyal friends.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shell_Cottage_and_break-in_of_Gringotts">Shell Cottage and break-in of Gringotts</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>He can have it after we've used it on all of the Horcruxes. I'll make sure he gets it then. I'll keep my word... I won't be lying... really.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I don't like it.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Nor do I, much.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry and Hermione on <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a>'s demand for <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/74/Tumblr_mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10_r3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308205956" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10 r3 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10_r3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10 r3 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/74/Tumblr_mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10_r3_250.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20140308205956"  	 width="235"  	 height="136"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/74/Tumblr_mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10_r3_250.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20140308205956" 	 alt="Tumblr mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10 r3 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10_r3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10 r3 250.gif" 	 	 width="235"  	 height="136"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_mg6o4nMu3j1rlr2dlo10_r3_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry at Dobby's Grave</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Following the death of Dobby, Harry, Ron, and Hermione stayed at <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a> for some time. During their stay, the trio formed a plan to <a href="/wiki/Break-in_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1998)" title="Break-in of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)">break into</a> the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">Lestrange Vault</a> to obtain the <a href="/wiki/Helga_Hufflepuff%27s_cup" title="Helga Hufflepuff&#39;s cup">Horcrux within</a>, with the help of <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a>. Due to the fact that Griphook would only help in exchange for <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a>, Harry decided to word his request so that the handover would not take place until after Harry had used it to dispose of the remaining <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>.
</p><p>Although feeling guilty for the deception, Harry knew that the sword was their only known weapon against the Horcruxes. The other residents of Shell Cottage could not fail to notice the trio's behaviour. <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> took Harry aside and advised Harry to be cautious when making deals with Griphook who Harry was increasingly disliking. Around the same time, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> came to Shell Cottage bearing tidings of new birth. He asked Harry to be the godfather of his newborn child, <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Ted Lupin</a>. It seemed as if the incident between them at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> had never occurred
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Break-In_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1998)" title="Break-In of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)" class="mw-redirect">Break-In of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)</a></i></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>The trio and Griphook left Shell Cottage early the next morning to break into Gringotts. Hermione disguised herself as notorious Death Eater <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, using <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a>. The goal was to try and fool the goblins at Gringotts into believing that it was really Bellatrix who was entering the vault. The Trio had Bellatrix's wand that Harry had captured at Malfoy Manor as further proof for the disguise. Ron was <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">transfigured</a> to look like a foreign wizard named Dragomir Despard, and Harry had Griphook on his shoulders; both were under the Invisibility Cloak.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4a/Hermionebellatrix.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141127143514" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Hermionebellatrix"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Hermionebellatrix.gif" 	data-image-name="Hermionebellatrix.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4a/Hermionebellatrix.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141127143514"  	 width="240"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4a/Hermionebellatrix.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141127143514" 	 alt="Hermionebellatrix"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Hermionebellatrix.gif" 	data-image-name="Hermionebellatrix.gif" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermionebellatrix.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione impersonating Bellatrix Lestrange at Gingotts, with Harry and <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a> under the <a href="/wiki/Invisibility_Cloak" title="Invisibility Cloak" class="mw-redirect">Invisibility Cloak</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Their plan proceeded reasonably well; Hermione made a convincing Bellatrix, despite a close encounter with a Death Eater named <a href="/wiki/Travers" title="Travers">Travers</a>, whose susipicions seemed to be eased and accompanied the group to Gringotts. Two human guards there had <a href="/wiki/Probity_Probe" title="Probity Probe">Probity Probes</a> that detected concealment charms, and Harry used a <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confundus Charm</a> on them to get Hermione passed unchecked. Inside, the Goblins requested Bellatrix's identification. When Hermione hesitated, one nervously said that her wand was sufficient proof, though Hermione claimed it was new. Harry suspected the Goblins knew that Bellatrix's wand was stolen and were looking for an impostor.
</p><p>Griphook told Harry to use the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a>, he complied and <a href="/wiki/Bogrod" title="Bogrod">Bogrod</a> then accepted the wand as being correct. Bogrod requested the <a href="/wiki/Clankers" title="Clankers">Clankers</a>, and then led Hermione and Ron, with Harry, Griphook, and Travers into a passageway. The door slammed shut, and Harry sent Travers away to hide. Bogrod, still under the Imperius curse, summoned a cart that descended deep within Gringotts. After many twists and turns, the cart passed through <a href="/wiki/Thief%27s_Downfall" title="Thief&#39;s Downfall">Thief's Downfall</a>, a security waterfall that washed away all illusion charms. When the cart overturned and dumped them out, Hermione and Ron had been reverted to themselves. Griphook believed the other Goblins knew they were impostors, but Harry wanted to continue and cursed Bogrod again.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0d/Tumblr_mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306203301" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0d/Tumblr_mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306203301"  	 width="245"  	 height="123"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0d/Tumblr_mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306203301" 	 alt="Tumblr mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="123"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_mibnclbhYQ1qdab59o3_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry searches for <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_cup" title="Hufflepuff&#39;s cup" class="mw-redirect">Hufflepuff's cup</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange" title="Lestrange">Lestranges</a>' vault</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio and Griphook found the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">Lestrange Vault</a> guarded by an aged, <a href="/wiki/Ukrainian_Ironbelly_at_Gringotts" title="Ukrainian Ironbelly at Gringotts">half-blind dragon</a>. Griphook subdued it using the Clankers. Hearing pursuit approaching, Harry forced Bogrod to open the vault, which was filled with precious objects. Hermione screamed in pain, and they discovered that the vault's protective charms included the <a href="/wiki/Flagrante_Curse" title="Flagrante Curse">Flagrante</a> and <a href="/wiki/Gemino_Curse" title="Gemino Curse">Gemino</a> curses: the contents would multiply and become searing hot every time something was touched. Harry spotted <a href="/wiki/Helga_Hufflepuff%E2%80%99s_cup" title="Helga Hufflepuff’s cup" class="mw-redirect">Helga Hufflepuff’s cup</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>, but it was out of reach. Hermione <a href="/wiki/Levicorpus" title="Levicorpus">levitated</a> Harry, and he snagged the Cup with Gryffindor's Sword, while Hermione, Ron, Griphook, and Bogrod all struggled to stay above the hot multiplying objects below.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b8/Blind_dragon.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814040525" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Blind dragon"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Blind_dragon.gif" 	data-image-name="Blind dragon.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b8/Blind_dragon.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814040525"  	 width="245"  	 height="123"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b8/Blind_dragon.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814040525" 	 alt="Blind dragon"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Blind_dragon.gif" 	data-image-name="Blind dragon.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="123"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Blind_dragon.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Trio escape <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a> on the back of a half-blind dragon</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As Harry was setting himself down, he dropped both the Sword and the Cup. Griphook grabbed Gryffindor's Sword, and flipped Hufflepuff's cup up into the air. Harry caught it, ignoring the searing heat. Borne by a treasure avalanche spilling from the now-opened vault, Griphook ran off with Gryffindor's Sword, yelling that thieves were in the vault. Harry, Hermione, and Ron hurled curses at the Goblin throng. Harry released the half-blind Dragon and the three jumped on its back. The freed Dragon took flight, the three blasting holes into the ceiling for it to fly through as they made their escape.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_Hogwarts"><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Dumbledore left the three of us a job, and we weren't supposed to tell — I mean, he wanted us to do it, just the three of us.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Neville</b>: "<i>We're his army. Dumbledore's Army. We were all in it together, we’ve been keeping it going while you three have been off on your own.... Everyone in this room’s been fighting and they’ve been driven in here because the Carrows were hunting them down. Everyone in here’s proven they’re loyal to Dumbledore — loyal to you.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry and <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> upon the trio's return to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215227" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Hogsmeade"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Hogsmeade.jpeg" 	data-image-name="Hogsmeade.jpeg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122215227"  	 width="230"  	 height="142"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122215227" 	 alt="Hogsmeade"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Hogsmeade.jpeg" 	data-image-name="Hogsmeade.jpeg" 	 	 width="230"  	 height="142"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hogsmeade.jpeg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Trio <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">apparate</a> into <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> before the start of the battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>A vision from Voldemort helped Harry realise that the third Horcrux, whilst unbeknown to him at the time, <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw%27s_Diadem" title="Ravenclaw&#39;s Diadem">Ravenclaw's Diadem</a>, remained at Hogwarts. Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on their final mission to return to the school and obtain the diadem, inadvertently tripping the <a href="/wiki/Caterwauling_Charm" title="Caterwauling Charm">Caterwauling Charm</a> upon apparating to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> and thereby alerting the waiting <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> to their presence. Due to the trio being under the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility cloak</a>, however, the Death Eaters resorted to unleashing <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> into the streets to try to force the intruders out of hiding.
</p><p>Having no choice, Harry conjured his <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> to protect himself and his friends, automatically giving away their position and confirming their identities (the Death Eaters having been pre-warned that Harry Potter's patronus took the form of a stag). As Death Eaters began to close in on the still invisible trio, <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a> emerged from the <a href="/wiki/Hog%27s_Head" title="Hog&#39;s Head" class="mw-redirect">Hog's Head</a>, hurriedly telling the three to enter his pub. While Harry, Ron, and Hermione did so, Aberforth remained outside, proclaiming to the Death Eaters that it was he who tripped the alarm (by letting his cat out) and conjured the Patronus to ward off the Dementor threat; mockingly contradicting a Death Eater, saying that what he had seen was a goat Patronus rather than a stag. The incensed Death Eaters believed this and retreated.
</p><p>After Aberforth re-entered his pub and home, he scolded them for coming to Hogsmeade advising them to leave the country. After Harry engaged in a fierce argument with him, he led the grateful trio directly into Hogwarts through a secret entrance behind the portrait of his deceased sister, <a href="/wiki/Ariana_Dumbledore" title="Ariana Dumbledore">Ariana Dumbledore</a>. <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>, acting as their escort, then guided them into the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a>, where they were greeted by the reconstituted <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>; most of which were beaten and bruised yet ready to fight the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> controlling the school. Harry tried to tell them that he, Ron, and Hermione only returned to find something, but Neville contacted other allies with a call to arms. Harry was initially reluctant to allow the others to help, but in an attempt to be a better man than Dumbledore, whom he feared he was turning into, and after some discussion with Ron and Hermione, he allowed it.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215243" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" 	data-image-name="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122215243"  	 width="230"  	 height="135"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/20/Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20141122215243" 	 alt="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" 	data-image-name="Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" 	 	 width="230"  	 height="135"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Deathly-hallows-part2-still07.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Luna entering <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw_Tower" title="Ravenclaw Tower">Ravenclaw Tower</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry hesitantly asked the room at large if they had ever heard of any sort of legendary artefact belonging to one of the Founders of Hogwarts. <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> then elaborated on the fabled Diadem of Ravenclaw, pronouncing that a statue in <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw_Tower" title="Ravenclaw Tower">Ravenclaw Tower</a> depicted <a href="/wiki/Rowena_Ravenclaw" title="Rowena Ravenclaw">Rowena Ravenclaw</a> wearing a diadem. Harry, having no idea of what the diadem looked like, was led by Luna to the Ravenclaw Common Room to observe the statue. Here the pair were ambushed by <a href="/wiki/Alecto_Carrow" title="Alecto Carrow">Alecto Carrow</a> who pressed her <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> immediately upon noticing Harry, summoning Voldemort, before Luna <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">stunned</a> her from under the Invisibility Cloak. <a href="/wiki/Amycus_Carrow" title="Amycus Carrow">Amycus Carrow</a> attempted to force his way through the common room door, designed only to open after the door-knocker's question was correctly answered, by seeking the help of <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>, who easily allowed him entry by solving the door's riddle herself; by that time, Harry had managed to rejoin Luna under the Invisibility Cloak.
</p><p>Amycus, in fear of his master's wrath, suggested framing Alecto's apparently mistaken summoning of the former on the Ravenclaw students; as he did, he spontaneously devised a lie that made it seem as though the students had forced Alecto to touch her Dark Mark at wand-point. In her outrage, McGonagall strongly insinuated that Amycus was a coward for proposing such an idea. Carrow spat in McGonagall's face in retaliation, utterly enraging Harry who suddenly revealed himself while momentarily casting the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> on the surprised Carrow, sending him flying backwards into the wall where he crumpled and fell unconscious. Harry then told McGonagall about the mission Dumbledore had left him, and she offered to hold Voldemort and his invading forces off, buying him the time he needed to search for the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>. All students of age, the D.A., and the members of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> who had arrived to fight prepared themselves for the impending siege. The <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> began as <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> and his army approached the outer boundaries of the school.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Battle_of_hogearts-_statues.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140901002635" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Battle of hogearts- statues"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Battle_of_hogearts-_statues.gif" 	data-image-name="Battle of hogearts- statues.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Battle_of_hogearts-_statues.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140901002635"  	 width="245"  	 height="98"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/Battle_of_hogearts-_statues.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140901002635" 	 alt="Battle of hogearts- statues"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Battle_of_hogearts-_statues.gif" 	data-image-name="Battle of hogearts- statues.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="98"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Battle_of_hogearts-_statues.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Minerva, Molly, and the Suits of Armour</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, upon arrival at Hogwarts, demanded that the school turn over Harry, and the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> began. Harry realised that the positioning of <a href="/wiki/Alecto_Carrow" title="Alecto Carrow">Alecto Carrow</a> in <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw_Tower" title="Ravenclaw Tower">Ravenclaw Tower</a> confirmed the Horcrux's identity. It was the lost diadem of Ravenclaw. After thinking on it for some seconds, he went to ask the <a href="/wiki/Helena_Ravenclaw" title="Helena Ravenclaw">Grey Lady</a> about the diadem. From her information, Harry surmised that the Horcrux had been hidden in the Room of Requirement. Harry, in the meantime, was worried about Hermione and Ron, who seemed to have disappeared. They had gone into the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a>, where Hermione destroyed Helga Hufflepuff’s Cup with basilisk fangs, which were one of the few weapons able to destroy Horcruxes.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_the_Room_of_Requirement" title="Skirmish at the Room of Requirement">Skirmish at the Room of Requirement</a></i></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Fyendfire.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215314" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Fyendfire"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Fyendfire.jpg" 	data-image-name="Fyendfire.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Fyendfire.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215314"  	 width="240"  	 height="124"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Fyendfire.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215314" 	 alt="Fyendfire"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Fyendfire.jpg" 	data-image-name="Fyendfire.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="124"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Fyendfire.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The <a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">Trio</a> escaping from the <a href="/wiki/Fiendfyre" title="Fiendfyre">Fiendfyre</a> that was cast by <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Vincent Crabbe</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio quickly headed for the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> where Harry remembered seeing the Diadem the previous year. However, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Vincent Crabbe</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Gregory Goyle</a> ambushed them. After a skirmish, the entire room was destroyed by the <a href="/wiki/Fiendfyre" title="Fiendfyre">cursed fire</a> Crabbe unleashed but could not control. Harry managed to fly himself and Malfoy out, while Ron and Hermione grabbed Goyle, but Crabbe perished in the flames that also destroyed the diadem. With one Horcrux remaining, Harry, Ron, and Hermione continued their pursuit of <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, but before they could go search for it, they witnessed the death of <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a>. This incensed Ron and Harry, but Hermione reminded them that only they could finish Voldemort and that to obtain the final Horcrux they would have to do their share of fighting.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Snape.27s_death">Snape's death</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Take... it.... </i>Take... it<i>....</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Snape referring to his memories<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215347" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" 	data-image-name="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20141122215347"  	 width="235"  	 height="124"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b4/Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20141122215347" 	 alt="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" 	data-image-name="Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" 	 	 width="235"  	 height="124"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Snape-s-last-minutes-severus-snape-27845931-640-472.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Snape's last moments, giving Harry the memories</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They fought their way to the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>. Along the way, Harry witnessed many scenes of horror. On the grounds, Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> were waiting. After having seen so much pain and death, Harry could not summon the happiness required to conjure a <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a>. Neither could Hermione or Ron. In fact, Harry welcomed the oblivion that would come with the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor&#39;s Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a>. But after seeing the patronuses conjured by <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ernest_Macmillan" title="Ernest Macmillan">Ernie Macmillan</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Seamus_Finnigan" title="Seamus Finnigan">Seamus Finnigan</a>, Harry summoned the will to conjure his and managed to drive the Dementors away. Once the trio arrived at the Shrieking Shack, they witnessed Voldemort order Nagini to kill <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, as he believed that Snape was preventing him from being the true owner of the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>. Before he died, Snape gave Harry memories to view in the <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">Pensieve</a> and asked him to look into his eyes. Upon returning to the castle, Harry saw the corpses of <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> and <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a> near Fred's, and he felt devastated. He left his friends behind to use <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve" title="Albus Dumbledore&#39;s Pensieve" class="mw-redirect">Albus Dumbledore's Pensieve</a>, welcoming the time in another's head.
</p><p>During a one-hour ceasefire, Harry viewed the memories given by a dying Snape, which revealed to him that he had inadvertently been turned into a <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> himself and that Voldemort had to kill him in order to be rendered mortal himself. Harry also learned that Snape was, all along, with Dumbledore because he loved <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Evans</a>, since before they started school. Heavy of heart, Harry courageously slipped off on his own to carry out this dreadful task. He felt ghostly as he strode through the castle's empty halls, feeling as if he was already dead.
</p><p>As Harry passed the Great Hall, he could not see Hermione, Ron, or the other Weasleys, nor Luna. He felt he would have given anything for one last look at them, but then he thought he would never be able to stop looking. During his way to Voldemort, he saw the corpse of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a> and told <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a> to kill <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, if he could. He passed Ginny, who was comforting a small girl, and almost wished she could have sensed him, but under the Invisibility Cloak, this was impossible. As he passed Hagrid's hut on the Grounds, he emotionally remembered his trips there, particularly rock cakes, Ron vomiting slugs, and Norbert.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4 r1 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4_r1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4 r1 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" 	 alt="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4 r1 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4_r1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4 r1 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_n29413O6t71rzvuwqo4_r1_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort hitting Harry with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry then entered the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, where he managed to open the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a>, which said on it, "<i>I open at the close;</i>" and the words to open it were, "I'm about to die"; this revealed the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> contained within. Harry used it to speak to the spirits of his <a href="/wiki/James_and_Lily_Potter" title="James and Lily Potter">parents</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, who offered him comfort before he met Voldemort and shielded him from the Dementors. As Harry approached the Death Eater camp, he dropped the Resurrection Stone. Harry offered no resistance as Voldemort struck him with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>, thinking of Ginny before he died.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215404" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry and Albus limbo"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry and Albus limbo.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215404"  	 width="240"  	 height="100"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/17/Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215404" 	 alt="Harry and Albus limbo"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry and Albus limbo.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="100"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Albus_limbo.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry speaking with <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> in Limbo</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, the "death" he met was not permanent: the blood Voldemort had taken from Harry to restore his physical form in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> still contained the Bond of Blood, anchoring him to life and protecting Harry from Voldemort's curse, and his willingness to die triggered protections on the people of Hogwarts similar to the protections he received from his <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">mother</a>'s sacrifice. Also, since he had part of Voldemort's soul in him, Voldemort's Killing Curse unknowingly destroyed the part of Voldemort's soul, leaving one Horcrux left. Harry entered a state of <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">limbo</a>, where he met the spirit of Albus Dumbledore and the piece of Voldemort's soul that had just been destroyed. Dumbledore explained everything to Harry saying that he had "<i>no more secrets from [Harry]</i>". After reconciling with his mentor, Harry made the choice to return to the physical world rather than go on to the afterlife with Dumbledore.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Endgame">Endgame</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>There are no more <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. It's just you and me. Neither can live while the other survives, and one of us is about to leave for good </i>[...]<i> </i>"
</dd><dd><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>One of us? You think it will be you, do you, the boy who has survived by accident, and because Dumbledore was pulling the strings?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>You won't be killing anyone else tonight. You won't be able to kill any of them ever again.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; The final confrontation between Harry and Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 237px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215447" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" 	data-image-name="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/237?cb=20141122215447"  	 width="237"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/237?cb=20141122215447" 	 alt="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" 	data-image-name="HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" 	 	 width="237"  	 height="102"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HP7-PT2-TRL-1335.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Narcissa_Malfoy" title="Narcissa Malfoy">Narcissa Malfoy</a> telling the gathered Death Eaters that Harry was "dead"</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry woke up, but feigned death. He was assisted in this by <a href="/wiki/Narcissa_Malfoy" title="Narcissa Malfoy">Narcissa Malfoy</a>, who had secretly turned against Voldemort by telling him Harry was dead in order to protect her son, because she knew the only way she would be permitted to enter Hogwarts was with the rest of the Death Eaters in their victory march. Voldemort then triumphantly disgraced Harry's "dead" body with the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> then forced Hagrid to carry Harry's body back to Hogwarts, proclaiming Harry dead and demanding surrender. At first, the surviving fighters were heartbroken, especially Ron, Hermione, Ginny, and Professor McGonagall. They screamed at the Death Eaters in anger but remained defiant.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c0/HPDH2-3404.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215456" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="HPDH2-3404"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="HPDH2-3404.jpg" 	data-image-name="HPDH2-3404.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c0/HPDH2-3404.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215456"  	 width="240"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c0/HPDH2-3404.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215456" 	 alt="HPDH2-3404"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="HPDH2-3404.jpg" 	data-image-name="HPDH2-3404.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="108"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HPDH2-3404.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> standing up to Voldemort and his army</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> courageously stood up to Voldemort, and when the latter offered Neville a rank in his Death Eater society, Neville proudly refused and screamed to the high heavens, "<i>Dumbledore's Army!</i>" Voldemort cast the Full body-Bind Curse, then Summoned the Sorting Hat and placed it upon Neville's head. After he announced that there would be no houses and that the school colours would be those loyal to <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a>, he caused the hat to burst into flames. As Neville cried in pain, a distant uproar came from the direction of the school boundaries. <a href="/wiki/Centaur" title="Centaur">Centaurs</a>, <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">thestrals</a>, <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> the <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">Hippogriff</a>, and the families of the Hogwarts students who remained to fight, plus the shop and home keepers of Hogsmeade joined the fight with a flourish.
</p><p>This distracted Voldemort and his Death Eaters, and Neville was able to pull off the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a>, and from its depths he received the Sword of Godric Gryffindor and sliced off <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>'s head in one swift, fluid motion. Harry slipped away in the ensuing melee under the Invisibility Cloak. Death Eaters started to fold under sheer weight of numbers as the house-elves in the kitchens joined the battle, with <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> at its front, declaring war against the Dark Lord in the name of brave <a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">Regulus Black</a>. Using his Invisibility Cloak, Harry protected the defenders of Hogwarts from attack. Soon, only Voldemort and Bellatrix Lestrange were the only two remaining and fighting, Voldemort duelling McGonagall, Slughorn, and Kingsley at once, and Bellatrix duelling Hermione, Luna, and Ginny. Harry was torn between the two until he saw a Killing Curse shot beside Ginny's ear, the latter missing death by an inch.
</p><p>Harry redirected his path to Bellatrix, until being roughly knocked aside by Molly Weasley, who duelled and ultimately killed Bellatrix. Voldemort's fury at the fall of his last, best lieutenant exploded with the force of a bomb and Harry turned in to see McGonagall, Slughorn, and Kingsley blasted backwards in pain and Voldemort directing his wand at Molly. Harry then cast a <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">shield charm</a> to protect her from Voldemort's wrath, revealing himself for the final duel.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article&#58; <a href="/wiki/Voldemort%27s_Last_Stand" title="Voldemort&#39;s Last Stand">Voldemort's Last Stand</a></i></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/00Harry_Potter_and_the_deaathly_hallows_-_the_final_battle_scene.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215624" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="00Harry Potter and the deaathly hallows - the final battle scene"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="00Harry_Potter_and_the_deaathly_hallows_-_the_final_battle_scene.jpg" 	data-image-name="00Harry Potter and the deaathly hallows - the final battle scene.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/00Harry_Potter_and_the_deaathly_hallows_-_the_final_battle_scene.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215624"  	 width="240"  	 height="113"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9e/00Harry_Potter_and_the_deaathly_hallows_-_the_final_battle_scene.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141122215624" 	 alt="00Harry Potter and the deaathly hallows - the final battle scene"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="00Harry_Potter_and_the_deaathly_hallows_-_the_final_battle_scene.jpg" 	data-image-name="00Harry Potter and the deaathly hallows - the final battle scene.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="113"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:00Harry_Potter_and_the_deaathly_hallows_-_the_final_battle_scene.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The final duel between Harry and Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Unbeknownst to Voldemort, mastery of the Elder Wand, which he had stolen from Dumbledore's grave, had not been taken from Dumbledore by Snape, but by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. Thus, when Harry had disarmed Malfoy in <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a> weeks earlier, he had become the true master of the Elder Wand.
</p><p>When Harry and Voldemort faced off for the last time, Harry tried to tell him this and about the other mistakes he had made. Harry also asked him to feel some remorse, which Voldemort rejected. Voldemort cast the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>, and Harry countered with the <a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Disarming Charm</a>. The Elder Wand refused to attack its master, and the Killing Curse rebounded, finally permanently destroying Voldemort once and for all.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Trio_after_battle.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814033323" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Trio after battle"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Trio_after_battle.gif" 	data-image-name="Trio after battle.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Trio_after_battle.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140814033323"  	 width="240"  	 height="127"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/65/Trio_after_battle.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20140814033323" 	 alt="Trio after battle"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Trio_after_battle.gif" 	data-image-name="Trio after battle.gif" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="127"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Trio_after_battle.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The surviving Trio the morning after the battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Immediately, Harry was surrounded by overjoyed fellow fighters; Hermione and Ron reached him first, and then <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, Neville and Luna. Victory celebrations began, but Harry soon grew weary, and Luna created a distraction so that he could slip away under the Invisibility Cloak to find Ron and Hermione. They visited <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>'s portrait, and along the way he explained everything to his two best friends. Harry decided to prevent the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> from ever being reunited again by keeping the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a>, leaving the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> where it lay in the Forbidden Forest, and returning the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a> to Dumbledore's grave, but not before using it to fix <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">his wand</a>.
</p><p>When Voldemort destroyed the Horcrux that was Harry, Harry Potter lost the ability to speak <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-16">[17]</a></sup> much to his relief. In addition, the <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">scar</a> on Harry's forehead no longer held magical powers, nor did it ever cause Harry pain again.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Later_life_.281998-2017.29">Later life <small>(1998-2017)</small></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>The scar hadn't pained Harry for nineteen years. All was well.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry's later life<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/1Harry_Potter_age_37.png/revision/latest?cb=20140712164938" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="1Harry Potter age 37"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="1Harry_Potter_age_37.png" 	data-image-name="1Harry Potter age 37.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/1Harry_Potter_age_37.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20140712164938"  	 width="140"  	 height="196"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/1Harry_Potter_age_37.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20140712164938" 	 alt="1Harry Potter age 37"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="1Harry_Potter_age_37.png" 	data-image-name="1Harry Potter age 37.png" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="196"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:1Harry_Potter_age_37.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Head Auror</a> Harry Potter, age 37</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At the end of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>, Harry became an <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> at the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>; new <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley Shacklebolt</a> permitted those who had fought in the final battle to become Aurors without getting their <a href="/wiki/Nastily_Exhausting_Wizarding_Test" title="Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Test">N.E.W.T.s</a>. In <a href="/wiki/2000s" title="2000s">2007</a>, Harry became the youngest head of the Auror Office at the age of 26. He and Ron were the "experts" and helped reform and revolutionize the Auror department and the rest of the ministry, along with <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> (who became a high ranking official in the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement" title="Department of Magical Law Enforcement">Department of Magical Law Enforcement</a>).<sup id="cite_ref-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-17">[18]</a></sup> At some point, all three of them were featured on <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_Frog_Cards" title="Chocolate Frog Cards">Chocolate Frog Cards</a> for their accomplishments.
</p><p>Following the war, he aided in the care of his godson, <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a>, thus fulfilling the role that his own godfather, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, never got to play.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814032717" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Potter family"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Potter_family.gif" 	data-image-name="Potter family.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814032717"  	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/Potter_family.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140814032717" 	 alt="Potter family"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Potter_family.gif" 	data-image-name="Potter family.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potter_family.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A 37 year old Harry with his wife, son, and daughter</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had <a href="/wiki/Marriage" title="Marriage">married</a> <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> sometime before <a href="/wiki/Between_2010_and_2017" title="Between 2010 and 2017">2014</a><sup id="cite_ref-PM_18-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-18">[19]</a></sup> and, by <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>, the couple had three children of his own: two sons <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Sirius</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Severus</a>, and one daughter <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter" title="Lily Potter">Lily Luna</a>. In September of that year, Harry and Ginny took their three children to <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a> to see James and Albus off to Hogwarts. There, they met Ron and Hermione, and their two children, Harry's niece <a href="/wiki/Rose_Weasley" title="Rose Weasley">Rose</a> and nephew <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Weasley" title="Hugo Weasley">Hugo</a>. When Albus expressed a fear that he might be sorted into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> house, Harry told his son that Albus was named after two Hogwarts Headmasters of whom one was a Slytherin and "<i>probably the bravest man [he] ever knew.</i>" Harry assured him that his parents would be proud of him regardless of where he was sorted, and told him that the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> would take his preferences into consideration, which happened to him when he was being sorted, a secret he had never shared with his other children.
</p><p>Harry ensured that <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>'s portrait was hung in the <a href="/wiki/Headmaster%27s_office" title="Headmaster&#39;s office">Headmaster's office</a> at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-19">[20]</a></sup> He also made occasional visits to the school to give lectures to the students on <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>.
</p><p>Harry was also on "Christmas card" terms with his cousin <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley Dursley</a> and his family, and occasionally visited him, which were occasions dreaded by his own children.<sup id="cite_ref-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-20">[21]</a></sup> Harry also made peace with his former rival <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, something that <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">his father</a> and <a href="/wiki/Marauders" title="Marauders">his friends</a> were never able to do with <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>. They were civil towards each other; however, their schoolboy enmity meant that they would never truly become friends.
</p><p>Harry attended the final of the <a href="/wiki/2014_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="2014 Quidditch World Cup">427th Quidditch World Cup</a>, sometime in the summer of <a href="/wiki/Between_2010_and_2017" title="Between 2010 and 2017">2014</a>, in the <a href="/wiki/Patagonian_Desert" title="Patagonian Desert">Patagonian Desert</a>. The Potters joined <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Potter</a>, who had been in Patagonia since the start of the Cup, in her capacity of special <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> correspondent to the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i>.<sup id="cite_ref-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-21">[22]</a></sup> Harry along with his family (including <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a>) and <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a> were granted access to the VIP section of the campsite. Harry embraced <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, who was competing again after being retired for a few years, upon meeting him and introduced him to his sons, James and Albus<sup id="cite_ref-dumbledores-army-reunites_22-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dumbledores-army-reunites-22">[23]</a></sup>. He also supported Bulgaria in the match together with the rest of his family (save for Albus) and looked "emotional" when Viktor Krum and his team had won the match.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 135px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_year_one1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215629" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry year one1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_year_one1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry year one1.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_year_one1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/135?cb=20141122215629"  	 width="135"  	 height="205"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Harry_year_one1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/135?cb=20141122215629" 	 alt="Harry year one1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_year_one1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry year one1.jpg" 	 	 width="135"  	 height="205"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_year_one1.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his first year</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>

    }
</script><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Physical_description">Physical description</span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>Las' time I saw you, you was only a baby. Yeh look a lot like yer dad, but yeh've got yer mum's eyes.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> to the eleven-year-old Harry Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>Harry was a near-spitting image of his <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">father</a>, having untidy jet-black hair, but his startlingly green, almond-shaped eyes were identical to those of his <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">mother</a>. Harry's physique as a boy was described as "small and skinny", with a thin face and knobbly knees, due to his poor quality of life in his childhood. However, despite the neglect he suffered, Harry seems to have grown at the same rate as James, as when he was fifteen he was within an inch of James at the same age, and when he was seventeen he was exactly the same height his father was, and James was often described as tall. Harry wore round-rimmed <a href="/wiki/Glasses" title="Glasses">glasses</a>, peculiarly similar to his father's glasses. During his time hunting Voldemort's horcruxes, Harry's black hair grew shoulder length as was described when he saw his reflection in Malfoy Manor. This was due to his preoccupation with the hunt for the horcruxes.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Harry_James_Potter34.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215639" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry James Potter34"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_James_Potter34.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry James Potter34.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Harry_James_Potter34.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215639"  	 width="140"  	 height="197"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Harry_James_Potter34.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215639" 	 alt="Harry James Potter34"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_James_Potter34.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry James Potter34.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="197"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_James_Potter34.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his third year</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Upon Harry's forehead, covered by his unruly black hair, was a <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">scar</a> shaped like a lightning bolt. The scar was a result of the failed (and famed) <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> cast on him by <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> when he was an infant. It burned painfully whenever Voldemort was near Harry or feeling particularly strong emotions, but this stopped after Voldemort's death and was reduced into an ordinary scar.
</p><p>Harry also had a faint scar on the back of his right hand which said, <i>"I must not tell lies".</i> This scar was caused while Harry spent detentions with <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>, who forced him to use the blood quill that carved the words into the back of his hand.
</p><p>In addition, Harry has an oval-shaped scar over his heart where the locket-Horcrux seared his skin during the confrontation with Nagini in Bathilda Bagshot's house, Godric's Hollow.
</p><p>When possessed by <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> at the end of the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, Harry's eyes became somewhat glassy green in appearance, and his voice became a mixture of his own and Voldemort's.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215646" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry Potter movies hbp promostills 6"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry Potter movies hbp promostills 6.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215646"  	 width="140"  	 height="194"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215646" 	 alt="Harry Potter movies hbp promostills 6"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry Potter movies hbp promostills 6.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="194"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_movies_hbp_promostills_6.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry in his sixth year</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had "great skin" and never suffered from zits.<sup id="cite_ref-couric_23-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-couric-23">[24]</a></sup>
</p><p>At age 33, Harry already had "<i>a couple of threads of silver</i>" in his hair, according to <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> gossip columnist <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-dumbledores-army-reunites_22-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dumbledores-army-reunites-22">[23]</a></sup> In the summer of <a href="/wiki/Between_2010_and_2017" title="Between 2010 and 2017">2014</a>, Harry made an appearance in the <a href="/wiki/Patagonian_Desert" title="Patagonian Desert">Patagonian Desert</a>, where he would attend the final of the <a href="/wiki/2014_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="2014 Quidditch World Cup">427th Quidditch World Cup</a> with his family, sporting a nasty cut over his right cheekbone, which was a result of his top-secret work for the <a href="/wiki/Auror_Office" title="Auror Office">Auror Office</a><sup id="cite_ref-dumbledores-army-reunites_22-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dumbledores-army-reunites-22">[23]</a></sup>.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Personality_and_traits">Personality and traits</span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span>"<i>I see Harry as someone who is struggling to do the right thing, who is not without faults, who acts impetuously as you would expect someone of his age to act, but who is ultimately a very loyal person, and a very very courageous person. So, in as much as he has qualities that I admire most I would say he is a good role model. That doesn't mean that he is saintly, but then frankly, who is? But I think you do see enough of Harry’s inner life, the workings of his mind in the books to know that he is ultimately human, struggling to do the right thing, which I think is admirable.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>Harry Potter was an extremely brave, loyal, and selfless person who possessed tremendous strength of character. He willingly went to what he truly believed to be his death because he believed that this was the only way to defeat the Dark Lord. Harry was also marked by what <a href="/wiki/Lord_Voldemort" title="Lord Voldemort" class="mw-redirect">Lord Voldemort</a> once deemed a "<i>weakness for heroics</i>" — he would go to great lengths and take great risks in order to help others, particularly his loved ones. Notably, this was taken advantage of by Voldemort in <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, when he lured Harry to the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a> by making him believe that his <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">godfather</a> was in danger.<sup id="cite_ref-OotP32_24-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OotP32-24">[25]</a></sup> Harry was also very strong-willed and unafraid to stand up for himself. The fact that he was capable of repelling the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a> suggests that he had an unusually strong sense of himself and his morals.<sup id="cite_ref-GoF34_25-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GoF34-25">[26]</a></sup> Dumbledore once made parallels between Harry's traits and qualities that <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a> looked for in his own hand-picked students, but noted that Harry's choice not to draw on those qualities really defined who he was rather than the simple fact that he had them.<sup id="cite_ref-CoS18_26-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CoS18-26">[27]</a></sup>
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>Hmm. Difficult. Very difficult. Plenty of courage, I see. Not a bad mind either. There's talent, oh my goodness, yes — and a nice thirst to prove yourself, now that's interesting... So where shall I put you?</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> to Harry Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>Harry was perfectly prepared to put his friends' needs and best interests first, shown by how he ended his relationship with <a href="/wiki/Ginny_Weasley" title="Ginny Weasley" class="mw-redirect">Ginny Weasley</a> due to his concern for her well being, even though being with her was one of the best thing that ever happened to him.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP30_27-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP30-27">[28]</a></sup> The amount of trust that Harry put into his friends was so strong that he absolutely refused to consider that any of them would betray him to Voldemort. Considering that Harry knew <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">a person</a> who had betrayed all of his closest friends to Voldemort, they being Harry's parents, godfather and <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> who was there when Harry declared his trust in him, proves Harry's ability to <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a> so unequivocally.
</p><p>The closeness that Harry felt for many was great enough for him to behave violently if any of them were harmed.<sup id="cite_ref-OotP36_28-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OotP36-28">[29]</a></sup> When his godfather was killed by <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, Harry attacked her in a grief-stricken rage of righteous anger and attempted to use the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> on her. He also attacked <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> after the latter murdered <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>. Ironically, the only people Harry ever initiated a duel with were Snape and Bellatrix and he only desired to do so right after they killed someone he loved. This highlights Harry's bravery even further because Harry was fully aware that Snape and Bellatrix were two very skilled and experienced duellists, but did not hesitate to harm them as soon as he was pushed into it.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>Listen to me, Harry. You happen to have many qualities Salazar Slytherin prized in his hand-picked students. His own very rare gift, <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a>; resourcefulness; determination; a certain disregard for the rules </i>[...]<i>  </i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Dumbledore, after Harry defeated the basilisk in the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 221px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Tumblr_mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306080419" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Tumblr_mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3_250.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/221?cb=20140306080419"  	 width="221"  	 height="146"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Tumblr_mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3_250.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/221?cb=20140306080419" 	 alt="Tumblr mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3 250.gif" 	 	 width="221"  	 height="146"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_mrx31wSOOh1qc0mpuo3_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry brooding over the snitch, left to him in Dumbledore's Will</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, Harry was also accused of being arrogant, in particular by <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> (although in fairness, Snape was extremely biased, and Harry often found being famous and admired very difficult), and could be hot-tempered and impulsive. This can sometimes make him rude to authority figures such as Professor Snape and <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a>, and irritable with his friends. In contrast, Dumbledore stated that "<i>many teachers report that he's modest, likable, and reasonably talented</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-DH_29-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-29">[30]</a></sup> Harry was prone to moodiness during his adolescence, though this is likely the result of the great emotional stress and trials he endured during this period.
</p><p>Harry possessed an instinctual, intuitive intelligence that allowed him to make intellectual leaps as opposed to the logical intelligence of Hermione. For example, Harry divined the truth about the Deathly Hallows, well before Hermione would accept it.<sup id="cite_ref-DH22_30-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH22-30">[31]</a></sup> And although he was clever, Harry lacked intellectual curiosity, rarely putting forth effort into school work; for example, he relied on the notes of the <i><a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Half-Blood Prince</a> </i>to get ahead in his sixth-year <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a> class rather than devoting time to studying<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_31-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-31">[32]</a></sup> (although he did study reasonably hard for his <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">Ordinary Wizarding Levels</a>, the only set of wizarding qualifications he sat at Hogwarts), and generally did his best magical work when tackling practical exams rather than theoretical ones. This could be a result of the lack of confidence that Harry developed from growing up with the Dursleys.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>You're a sharp boy, Potter.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Barty_Crouch_Jr." title="Barty Crouch Jr." class="mw-redirect">Barty Crouch Jr.</a> (disguised as <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a>)<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
