Hedwig loved Harry dearly, showing signs by nibbling his ear or fingers, and loyally obeyed his every command (even pecking <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> until they answer back). Harry loved her as much as she loved him. Hedwig was killed during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a> by a stray Killing Curse that was most likely meant for Hagrid. Harry was overcome with grief over Hedwig's death.
</li></ul>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest?cb=20080810144607" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Deathly Hallows"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Deathly_Hallows.PNG" 	data-image-name="Deathly Hallows.PNG" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20080810144607"  	 width="240"  	 height="65"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d6/Deathly_Hallows.PNG/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20080810144607" 	 alt="Deathly Hallows"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Deathly_Hallows.PNG" 	data-image-name="Deathly Hallows.PNG" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="65"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Deathly_Hallows.PNG" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Deathly Hallows</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a></b>: For a brief time, Harry was master of all three <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>: the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a>, and the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a> (though he was not in physical possession of the Elder Wand until after losing the Resurrection Stone). These three artefacts are the most powerful magical items in all of the wizarding world and were so ancient that they were only the subject of <a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">fairy tales</a>. When Harry lost the Resurrection Stone inside the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, he decided to leave it there. Harry also interred the Elder Wand in Albus Dumbledore's grave, so the power of the wand would be extinguished after Harry's eventual death. However, the portrait of Dumbledore that hangs in the <a href="/wiki/Headmaster%27s_office" title="Headmaster&#39;s office">Headmaster's office</a> advised Harry to keep the Invisibility Cloak, since it was his father's.<br style="clear: right;" />
</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>It belongs to Harry! It chose him, he was the one who found it, it came to him out of the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> —</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Hermione arguing with <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a>, regarding the ownership of the <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Sword of Gryffindor</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Gryffindor%27s_sword.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122215940" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Gryffindor&#39;s sword"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Gryffindor%27s_sword.jpg" 	data-image-name="Gryffindor&#39;s sword.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Gryffindor%27s_sword.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215940"  	 width="140"  	 height="181"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Gryffindor%27s_sword.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122215940" 	 alt="Gryffindor&#39;s sword"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Gryffindor%27s_sword.jpg" 	data-image-name="Gryffindor&#39;s sword.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="181"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Gryffindor%27s_sword.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Sword of Gryffindor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a></b>: A relic of the <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor" title="Godric Gryffindor">founder</a> of Harry's <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">house</a>, the goblin-made sword of Godric Gryffindor was left to Harry by his former Headmaster <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> in his <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">will</a>. However, the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> claimed that it was not Dumbledore's to give, and that it truly belonged to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. Although the Ministry confiscated a replica of the sword, the true sword found its way into Harry's possession still through the machinations of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>. Soon after, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> used it to destroy <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Locket" class="mw-redirect">Salazar Slytherin's Locket</a>, one of Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. Harry lost the sword to <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a> when he, Ron and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> <a href="/wiki/Break-in_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1998)" title="Break-in of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)">stole</a> <a href="/wiki/Helga_Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Helga Hufflepuff&#39;s Cup" class="mw-redirect">Helga Hufflepuff's Cup</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">Lestrange Vault</a> at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a>. However, the sword reappeared in the hands of <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>; he used it to kill <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, and thus destroyed the last of the Horcruxes. Neville was seen sitting beside the sword after the battle, but it is likely that it was returned to Hogwarts as a relic of the Founders, along with the remains of the other Founders' relics.<br style="clear: right;" />
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black%27s_penknife" title="Sirius Black&#39;s penknife">Sirius Black's Enchanted Knife</a></b>: This magical knife, with the power to open most mechanical locks and magical seals and which Harry received for Christmas from Sirius Black, was melted when Harry tried it on a locked door at the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a>. The protective enchantments on the door were far stronger than the magic of the enchanted knife.
</li></ul>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 195px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/74/Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220040" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Firebolt"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Firebolt.jpg" 	data-image-name="Firebolt.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/74/Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/195?cb=20141122220040"  	 width="195"  	 height="131"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/74/Firebolt.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/195?cb=20141122220040" 	 alt="Firebolt"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Firebolt.jpg" 	data-image-name="Firebolt.jpg" 	 	 width="195"  	 height="131"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Firebolt.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A Firebolt, his second broom and a previous Christmas gift</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_Firebolt_broomstick" title="Harry Potter&#39;s Firebolt broomstick" class="mw-redirect">Firebolt</a></b>: During Harry's third year at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2000" title="Nimbus 2000">Nimbus 2000</a> <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broom</a> he'd been riding since his first year was destroyed by the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> replaced it by giving Harry the <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">finest broom</a> available as an anonymous gift. The broom was one of Harry's most prized possessions for years. It was lost during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a>. It is not known if Harry ever recovered or replaced it.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_Nimbus_2000_broomstick" title="Harry Potter&#39;s Nimbus 2000 broomstick">Nimbus 2000</a></b>: This broomstick was gifted to him from <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> after agreeing to join the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a> in 1991. He used it during his first and second years at Hogwarts. In his third year it blew into the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a> and was smashed to bits, breaking it beyond repair.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Two-way_mirror" title="Two-way mirror">Communication mirror</a></b>: Harry also owns one in a pair of <a href="/wiki/Two-way_mirror" title="Two-way mirror">two-way mirrors</a>, given to him by his godfather <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>. The mirror was intended to be a means covert communication, but Harry broke it out of anger over Sirius' death. Harry did not realise the mirror could still work, although he kept a shard out of sentimentality. When Harry and several friends are captured at <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a>, at the time being used as a headquarters for Voldemort, Harry used the shard of mirror to communicate with <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a>, who had the other mirror. Aberforth sent <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> to rescue Harry and the other prisoners.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_schoolbag" title="Harry Potter&#39;s schoolbag">Schoolbag</a></b>: A schoolbag was used by Harry Potter to carry around textbooks, quills, and other items throughout his six years attending <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts" title="Hogwarts" class="mw-redirect">Hogwarts</a>. It is possible that this bag was used even in his <a href="/wiki/Muggle" title="Muggle">Muggle</a> education prior to attending Hogwarts.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Weasley_jumper" title="Weasley jumper">Weasley jumpers</a></b>: Harry received a homemade jumper every <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a> from <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs. Weasley</a>. His were said to be much more extravagant, as Mrs. Weasley "made much more effort" when her presents were not made for actual family members. The known jumpers he has include; an emerald green one, a scarlet one, a green one with a <a href="/wiki/Hungarian_Horntail" title="Hungarian Horntail">Hungarian Horntail</a> on the front, and one with a <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a> on the front.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Sneakoscope" title="Sneakoscope">Sneakoscope</a></b>: Hermione Granger gave Harry a Sneakoscope as a gift for his seventeenth birthday at breakfast, the trio would later take it on their <a href="/wiki/Horcrux_hunt" title="Horcrux hunt" class="mw-redirect">hunt for Horcruxes</a>.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_alarm_clock" title="Harry Potter&#39;s alarm clock">Alarm clock</a></b>: In the summer of <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, Harry found and repaired the alarm clock and in the summer of <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, this alarm clock ticked on Harry's windowsill as he slept on the night that <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> came to collect him.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_first_Golden_Snitch" title="Harry Potter&#39;s first Golden Snitch">Golden Snitch</a></b>: This Snitch was caught by Harry during the <a href="/wiki/1991-1992_school_year" title="1991-1992 school year" class="mw-redirect">1991-1992 school year</a>. It was later left to him in Albus Dumbledore's will, to posthumously ensure that <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt%27s_Ring" title="Marvolo Gaunt&#39;s Ring">Marvolo Gaunt's Ring</a> would be safely delivered to him.
</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Harry took off his watch, which he was only wearing out of habit, as it didn't work anymore, and stuffed it into his pocket.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry takes off his watch prior to a lesson about <a href="/wiki/Nifflers" title="Nifflers" class="mw-redirect">nifflers</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_watch" title="Harry Potter&#39;s watch">Watch</a></b>: This watch was used by Harry until it was destroyed in the <a href="/wiki/Second_Task" title="Second Task" class="mw-redirect">Second Task</a> of the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, since it was not waterproof and by <a href="/wiki/May" title="May">May</a> of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, he had discarded the watch entirely.
</li></ul>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 125px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/DH1_Harry_Potter_in_his_wedding.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220049" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="DH1 Harry Potter in his wedding"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="DH1_Harry_Potter_in_his_wedding.jpg" 	data-image-name="DH1 Harry Potter in his wedding.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/DH1_Harry_Potter_in_his_wedding.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/125?cb=20141122220049"  	 width="125"  	 height="220"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/DH1_Harry_Potter_in_his_wedding.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/125?cb=20141122220049" 	 alt="DH1 Harry Potter in his wedding"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="DH1_Harry_Potter_in_his_wedding.jpg" 	data-image-name="DH1 Harry Potter in his wedding.jpg" 	 	 width="125"  	 height="220"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH1_Harry_Potter_in_his_wedding.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry Potter's dress robes at Bill and Fleur's wedding</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_dress_robes" title="Harry Potter&#39;s dress robes">Dress robes</a></b>: Harry wore dress robes to the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> for the <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, they were bottle green that matched his eyes. He also wore dress robes to <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">Bill and Fleur's wedding</a> in 1997. He also wore a set of dress robes to Slughorn's Christmas Party in 1996 and to the wedding of Bill and Fleur in 1997.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett%27s_watch" title="Fabian Prewett&#39;s watch">Fabian Prewett's watch</a></b>: <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> gave Harry the watch of her late brother <a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett" title="Fabian Prewett">Fabian Prewett</a> for his <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_seventeenth_birthday_party" title="Harry Potter&#39;s seventeenth birthday party" class="mw-redirect">seventeenth birthday</a>. It has a dent in it, but Harry kept the watch, even into his thirties. The watch does not have arms; rather, it has stars.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Mokeskin_pouch" title="Mokeskin pouch">Mokeskin pouch</a></b>: A birthday present from Hagrid. Harry kept it with him throughout the Deathly Hallows, and kept in it his treasures that were of no use to his search; the Snitch, the broken mirror, his broken wand, his mother's letter and the fake Horcrux. Harry also received a photo album, from Hagrid, which had photos of his parents and other family members.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_rucksack" title="Harry Potter&#39;s rucksack">Rucksack</a></b>: This rucksack was owned by Harry during the 1997-1998 school year. He packed it with everything he felt he would need during the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux_hunt" title="Horcrux hunt" class="mw-redirect">hunt for Horcruxes</a>. He almost lost it during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a>, but managed to keep hold of it.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Enchanted_razor" title="Enchanted razor">Enchanted razor</a></b>: In 1997, Harry received an enchanted razor on his seventeenth birthday from <a href="/wiki/Bill_Weasley" title="Bill Weasley" class="mw-redirect">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>. It is not known whether he used it at any point or if he still owns it.
</li><li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Practical_Defensive_Magic_and_Its_Use_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Practical Defensive Magic and Its Use Against the Dark Arts">Practical Defensive Magic and Its Use Against the Dark Arts</a></b></i>: This book had moving colour illustrations of all the <a href="/wiki/Counter-jinx" title="Counter-jinx">counter-jinxes</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hex" title="Hex">hexes</a> it described. Harry received a set of these books in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> as a Christmas present from <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> and <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>. Harry planned to put them to good use in his lessons for <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>.
</li><li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Flying_with_the_Cannons" title="Flying with the Cannons">Flying with the Cannons</a></b></i>: Harry received a copy of this from Ron Weasley in 1992 as a Christmas present.<sup id="cite_ref-CoS_78-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CoS-78">[79]</a></sup>
</li><li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Teams_of_Britain_and_Ireland" title="Quidditch Teams of Britain and Ireland">Quidditch Teams of Britain and Ireland</a></b></i>: <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> gave this book to Harry in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, as a Christmas gift.
</li><li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Twelve_Fail-Safe_Ways_to_Charm_Witches" title="Twelve Fail-Safe Ways to Charm Witches">Twelve Fail-Safe Ways to Charm Witches</a></b></i>: This book is a sophomoric manual on dating and flirting with girls. A copy was given to Harry on his seventeenth birthday from <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>. Harry speculated that there might be an entire chapter devoted to compliments.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_notebook" title="Harry Potter&#39;s notebook">Notebook</a></b>: This notebook was owned by Harry from at least <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>. It was used to keep his notes and other writings, such as things he wanted to remember.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_toy_broomstick" title="Harry Potter&#39;s toy broomstick">Toy broomstick</a></b>: this was a gift to him from Sirius Black, it was the first broomstick he had ridden. It's unknown what happened to it after the <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1981)" title="Attack at Godric&#39;s Hollow (1981)">1981 attack at Godric's Hollow</a>.
</li><li><b><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_car" title="Harry Potter&#39;s car">Car</a></b>: This car was used by Harry to drive his family to <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a> on 1 September, 2017. On <a href="/wiki/Platform_9%C2%BE" title="Platform 9¾" class="mw-redirect">Platform 9¾</a>, Ron Weasley asked Harry if he had parked the vehicle alright, then told him he had managed to park his own car.
</li></ul>
<p>After <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> died, all of his remaining possessions were passed along to Harry. This included:
</p>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a></b>: The <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">hippogriff</a> Sirius acquired from <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a>. Harry allowed Hagrid to take care of Buckbeak/Witherwings, as Hagrid had dearly missed the creature while it was in Sirius' possession.
</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>As you can see, Harry, Kreacher is showing a certain reluctance to pass into your ownership.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<ul><li><b>The <a href="/wiki/House_of_Black" title="House of Black">Black Family</a> Residence</b>: Located at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a>, it and all the contents and furnishings of the house, including <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> (the family <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a>) became Harry's. <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a> would later try to steal many of Harry's inherited possessions, including <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_locket" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s locket">Salazar Slytherin's locket</a>.
</li></ul>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Grimmauld_Place1995.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141110151828" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Grimmauld Place1995"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Grimmauld_Place1995.jpg" 	data-image-name="Grimmauld Place1995.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Grimmauld_Place1995.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141110151828"  	 width="240"  	 height="101"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Grimmauld_Place1995.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/240?cb=20141110151828" 	 alt="Grimmauld Place1995"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Grimmauld_Place1995.jpg" 	data-image-name="Grimmauld Place1995.jpg" 	 	 width="240"  	 height="101"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Grimmauld_Place1995.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">12 Grimmauld Place, London</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b>Black Family Inheritance</b>: Harry also inherited the remainder of Sirius' wealth in wizard's gold at Gringotts. Since Sirius was disowned at the age of sixteen, it is likely that this wealth was limited to the gold left to him by his uncle <a href="/wiki/Alphard_Black" title="Alphard Black">Alphard Black</a>. However, that is open to debate because although Sirius Black was disinherited by his family, he ended up inheriting the <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> after their death, which might lead us to believe in the existence of forms of inheritance from his family other than what his uncle left him.
</li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Relationships">Relationships</span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Family">Family</span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Parents">Parents</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2">"<i>Harry, you are </i>so<i> loved. Mama loves you. Dada loves you. Harry, be safe. Be strong.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Potter</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows:_Part_2" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Potter_family2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140730024702" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Potter family2"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Potter_family2.gif" 	data-image-name="Potter family2.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Potter_family2.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20140730024702"  	 width="235"  	 height="129"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Potter_family2.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/235?cb=20140730024702" 	 alt="Potter family2"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Potter_family2.gif" 	data-image-name="Potter family2.gif" 	 	 width="235"  	 height="129"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potter_family2.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry with <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Potter</a>, his mother and father</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Potter</a> died when their son was only a year old. Harry barely knew them, but nevertheless regarded them with great reverence and fiercely defended their memory if anyone spoke ill of them. In <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, he punched <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> for insulting his mother, and he frequently became furious with <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a>, who taunted Harry that James was not the great man others made him out to be. Snape was, to Harry's horror, proven right in the spring of <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, when Harry accidentally witnessed James bully Snape using the Levicorpus spell in one of Snape's memories, with <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore%27s_Pensieve" title="Albus Dumbledore&#39;s Pensieve" class="mw-redirect">Dumbledore's Pensieve</a>. However, Harry was relieved to know that his mother was a fair and kind person, who neither participated in nor tolerated bullying, and would stand up for those in need. <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> and <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> later assured him that James had changed his ways, eventually becoming mature enough to win Lily over.<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Lily's smile was widest of all. She pushed her long hair back as she drew closer to him, and her green eyes, so like his, searched his face hungrily, as though she would never be able to look at him enough.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Description of Lily's spirit<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>The few times he ever saw his parents were through pictures given to him by <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a>, a vision within the <a href="/wiki/Mirror_of_Erised" title="Mirror of Erised">Mirror of Erised</a>, spectral forms which came out of Voldemort's wand during <i><a href="/wiki/Priori_Incantatem" title="Priori Incantatem">Priori Incantatem</a></i>, stored memories within the Pensieve, and as lifeless corpses in a flashback that was triggered when he saw his now-ruined parents' house. The last known time he saw them where when he "summoned" them during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> by using the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a>. Both James' and Lily's spirits had "<i>loving smiles on their faces</i>" and told their son that they were tremendously proud of him, for being so brave and strong despite all the suffering and pain that he had been forced to endure, and gave him the support he needed to sacrifice himself to Voldemort. Harry described their presence as his courage, the very reason why he was able to keep putting one foot in front of the other, with his mother smiling at him, and his father nodding encouragement.
</p><p><a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> maintained that Harry's greatest strength was his love for his parents and the love they had for him, and in part, this literally translated to the protection afforded to Harry by his mother's <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">sacrifice</a>. Harry eventually named two of his children after his parents, a gesture that clearly stated that he would always keep the memory of his parents alive and honoured. It is seen that both his parents call him a name of affection, as James calls Harry "<i>son</i>" and Lily calls him "<i>sweetheart</i>", it is very possible that they had a nickname for Harry when he was a baby.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Petunia_Dursley">Petunia Dursley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>She doesn't love me. She doesn't give a damn —</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Dumbledore</b>: "<i>But she took you. She may have taken you grudgingly, furiously, unwillingly, bitterly, yet still she took you </i>[...]<i> </i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry and <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> on <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia Dursley</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 162px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/56/Petunia_Dursley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220130" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Petunia Dursley"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Petunia_Dursley.jpg" 	data-image-name="Petunia Dursley.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/56/Petunia_Dursley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/162?cb=20141122220130"  	 width="162"  	 height="189"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/56/Petunia_Dursley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/162?cb=20141122220130" 	 alt="Petunia Dursley"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Petunia_Dursley.jpg" 	data-image-name="Petunia Dursley.jpg" 	 	 width="162"  	 height="189"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Petunia_Dursley.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Petunia Dursley, his aunt</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily</a> and <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James Potter</a> were murdered by <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, Harry was taken in by his maternal aunt, <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia Dursley</a>. Petunia had not been fond of her late sister, jealously and bitterly regarding her as a "freak" for her <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magical</a> abilities. She took out her resentment on Harry, treating him poorly and depriving him of affection. When Harry was finally told about his wizarding background, Petunia admitted she had always feared he would turn out "like his parents". Though after years of neglect, Harry did not particularly care for his aunt either, he was concerned enough for the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> to push them to go into hiding during the height of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>. Just before departing, Petunia gave her nephew an odd, tremulous look, and seemed to want to say something more to him than goodbye, but ultimately just shook her head and left. She had wanted to wish him luck, and admit that her loathing of him and his world was born out of jealousy, but years of pretending that "normal" was best had hardened her too much.<sup id="cite_ref-79" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-79">[80]</a></sup>
</p><p>During the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, Harry was browsing through the repressed memories of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> that were given to him after the latter's death at the fangs of <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> and explained Snape's <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">true</a> <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">loyalties</a>. In addition, Harry viewed many memories of Petunia as a child, and discovered the real reasons for her deplorable treatment of him: Petunia, as a child, was jealous of <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">her sister</a> for her <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magical</a> abilities, and had written to <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> to accept her into Hogwarts so that she could learn magic herself. When this request was denied, Petunia responded by furiously rejecting the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a> in general and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">her sister</a> in particular. However, Harry was more concerned with uncovering Snape's loyalties at the time. It is unknown if he ever revealed this information to anyone after the War.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Dudley_Dursley">Dudley Dursley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Dudley</b>: "<i>I don’t think you’re a waste of space.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Well... er... thanks, Dudley.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Dudley</b>: "<i>You saved my life.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry’s farewell to the Dursleys<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/DudleyDH.png/revision/latest?cb=20111116222229" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="DudleyDH"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="DudleyDH.png" 	data-image-name="DudleyDH.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/DudleyDH.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20111116222229"  	 width="140"  	 height="209"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/DudleyDH.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20111116222229" 	 alt="DudleyDH"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="DudleyDH.png" 	data-image-name="DudleyDH.png" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="209"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DudleyDH.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley Dursley</a>, his cousin</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and his cousin <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a> did not get along very well for most of their early lives. While <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon</a> and <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia</a> treated Harry poorly, they spoiled Dudley to the extreme. Dudley constantly bullied his much smaller cousin throughout their childhood, but did his best not to provoke him after he found out that Harry was a <a href="/wiki/Wizards" title="Wizards" class="mw-redirect">wizard</a>, though the two still got into an occasional argument and trading of insults.
</p><p>This changed after Harry saved Dudley from a pair of <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> that attacked them during the summer of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>. When the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> placed the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> into hiding to keep them safe during the height of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>, Dudley was the only member of the family to express concern for Harry's safety, asking his parents why Harry was not accompanying them and where he would go, if not with them. He also expressed remorse for his prior treatment of Harry, and the two shook hands before the Dursleys left.
</p><p>The cousins eventually reconciled as adults, remaining on "Christmas card terms" and visiting each other occasionally. At these times, Harry's three children and Dudley's <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley%27s_children" title="Dudley Dursley&#39;s children">children</a> would all play together while their fathers would sit together quietly.<sup id="cite_ref-80" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-80">[81]</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Vernon_Dursley">Vernon Dursley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>Well, I've got news for you, boy... I'm locking you up... you're never going back to that school... never... and if you try and magic yourself out — they'll expel you</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Vernon Dursley to Harry Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 152px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Vernon_Dursley_%28Promo_pic_from_Order_of_the_Phoenix_movie%29.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220233" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Vernon Dursley (Promo pic from Order of the Phoenix movie)"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Vernon_Dursley_%28Promo_pic_from_Order_of_the_Phoenix_movie%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Vernon Dursley (Promo pic from Order of the Phoenix movie).jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Vernon_Dursley_%28Promo_pic_from_Order_of_the_Phoenix_movie%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/152?cb=20141122220233"  	 width="152"  	 height="200"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Vernon_Dursley_%28Promo_pic_from_Order_of_the_Phoenix_movie%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/152?cb=20141122220233" 	 alt="Vernon Dursley (Promo pic from Order of the Phoenix movie)"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Vernon_Dursley_%28Promo_pic_from_Order_of_the_Phoenix_movie%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Vernon Dursley (Promo pic from Order of the Phoenix movie).jpg" 	 	 width="152"  	 height="200"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Vernon_Dursley_(Promo_pic_from_Order_of_the_Phoenix_movie).jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Vernon Dursley, his uncle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon Dursley</a> became Harry's uncle through Vernon's marriage to Harry's Aunt Petunia. Harry lived with the Dursleys after <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> appealed to Petunia and convinced her to take Harry in following the death of the <a href="/wiki/James_and_Lily_Potter" title="James and Lily Potter">Potters</a>. Vernon seemed to resent this fact as much as, if not more than, his wife; he and Petunia begrudged Harry all but the meanest comforts, even forcing their nephew to sleep in a cupboard under the stairs until shortly before Harry's eleventh birthday. After Harry discovered his magical abilities, Vernon tended to take offense whenever Harry used words related or pertaining to magic in the <a href="/wiki/Number_4,_Privet_Drive" title="Number 4, Privet Drive" class="mw-redirect">house</a>. Vernon rarely referred to Harry by name, instead referring to his nephew by pronouns or "[The] boy". Vernon seemed to take particular pleasure in showing Harry all he was missing, while simultaneously spoiling and indulging Harry's cousin, Dudley.
</p><p>In <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, when Harry and Dudley were attacked by <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a>, Vernon demanded that Harry leave, thinking it the only way to protect his family from <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, though Petunia disagreed after receiving a <a href="/wiki/Howler" title="Howler">Howler</a> from Dumbledore. In <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, Harry and the Dursleys parted ways, thus ending the <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">protection</a> placed on Harry by his mother's sacrifice for as long he had a "home" with his blood relatives, or until he came of age. Vernon, Petunia, and Dudley were hidden by the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, to be protected from the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, while Harry was transported to the <a href="/wiki/Burrow" title="Burrow" class="mw-redirect">Burrow</a> prior to searching for Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. Vernon almost shook Harry's hand, but changed his mind and left the house quickly. It is unknown if the two ever met again.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Marjorie_Dursley">Marjorie Dursley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>I won't have this namby-pamby, wishy-washy nonsense about not hitting people who deserve it. A good thrashing is what's needed in ninety-nine cases out of a hundred. Have you been beaten often?</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Marjorie_Dursley" title="Marjorie Dursley">"Aunt" Marge</a> to Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 155px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Normal_poa_%2824%29.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220239" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Normal poa (24)"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Normal_poa_%2824%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Normal poa (24).jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Normal_poa_%2824%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/155?cb=20141122220239"  	 width="155"  	 height="196"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/Normal_poa_%2824%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/155?cb=20141122220239" 	 alt="Normal poa (24)"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Normal_poa_%2824%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Normal poa (24).jpg" 	 	 width="155"  	 height="196"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Normal_poa_(24).jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Marge Dursley, his "aunt"</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Marjorie_Dursley" title="Marjorie Dursley">Marge Dursley</a> was <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">Vernon</a>'s sister, whom Harry was forced to call "Aunt Marge" despite only being indirectly related to her, and despite the fact that Marge, in fact, hated Harry. She seemed to resent Harry's parents for having "left Harry to be a burden on their decent, hard working relatives", and called his mother the "<i>bad egg</i>" of Petunia's family, while assuming his father was a "<i>good-for-nothing, lazy scrounger</i>" after Vernon told her James had been unemployed.
</p><p>She spoiled <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley</a>, giving him gifts and money, while she gave Harry dog biscuits, and was overjoyed to think he was being regularly beaten at <a href="/wiki/St._Brutus%27_Secure_Centre_for_Incurably_Criminal_Boys" title="St. Brutus&#39; Secure Centre for Incurably Criminal Boys" class="mw-redirect">St. Brutus' Secure Centre for Incurably Criminal Boys</a>. In <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>, Harry lost control of his magic, and inflated Marge like a balloon after she insinuated that Harry's parents had died as a result of their driving while drunk. She was found floating near a chimney in <a href="/wiki/Sheffield" title="Sheffield">Sheffield</a>, and her memory was modified by the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>; had the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_community" title="Wizarding community" class="mw-redirect">Wizarding community</a> not been in a panic about <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>'s escape from Azkaban, the incident could have resulted in serious trouble for Harry.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron_Weasley">Ron Weasley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>I'm sorry. I'm sorry I left. I know I was a — a —</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>You've sort of made up for it tonight. Getting the <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">sword</a>. Finishing off the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>. Saving my life.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>That makes me sound a lot cooler than I was.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry and Ron reconcile after Ron returns to the Horcrux hunt <sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 135px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220248" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg" 	data-image-name="1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/135?cb=20141122220248"  	 width="135"  	 height="207"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/135?cb=20141122220248" 	 alt="1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg" 	data-image-name="1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg" 	 	 width="135"  	 height="207"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:1Ron-Harry-Potter-and-the-half-blood-prince-potterhead-29292270-299-400.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron Weasley, his loyal best friend</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> became Harry's best friend during their first year at Hogwarts. Ron, along with his <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">mother</a>, brothers, and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">sister</a> first met Harry at <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a>, when Harry was unable to find '<a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform 9¾</a>.' Ron sat across from Harry during the train ride and the two almost immediately bonded over the ample <a href="/wiki/Popular_confectionery" title="Popular confectionery">sweets</a> Harry purchased from the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a> <a href="/wiki/Honeydukes_Express" title="Honeydukes Express">food trolley</a>, which Harry happily shared with Ron, who was unable to afford any sweets himself. Harry cemented his friendship with Ron by turning down <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>'s offer to help Harry avoid making friends "<i>with the wrong sort</i>", after Draco insulted Ron's family. After being sorted into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> House together and sharing the same dormitory, the two grew even closer, and eventually gained another best friend in <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> when they saved her from a <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell%27s_first_mountain_troll" title="Quirinus Quirrell&#39;s first mountain troll">troll</a> on Hallowe'en. As Ron was raised in a <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding</a> family, he was often called upon to explain customs and items that were commonplace to wizards, but completely new to Harry and Hermione, who had both been raised in <a href="/wiki/Muggle" title="Muggle">Muggle</a> society.
</p><p>In the summer of <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a>, after <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> had prevented Harry from receiving any letters, Ron and his twin brothers (<a href="/wiki/Fred_and_George_Weasley" title="Fred and George Weasley">Fred and George</a>) flew their <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">father</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Flying_Ford_Anglia" title="Flying Ford Anglia">Flying Ford Anglia</a> to rescue Harry from Privet Drive. After spending a few days less than a month at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">Ron's home</a>, Harry and Ron were supposed to return to school on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a> with Ron's other siblings. However, Dobby had blocked the entrance to the platform, and Harry and Ron were unable to board the train. Panicking, the pair flew the enchanted car to Hogwarts; however, they landed on the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a> and lost the car as well as broke Ron's wand. Later on in the year, when Hermione had been <a href="/wiki/Petrification" title="Petrification">Petrified</a> by <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_basilisk" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s basilisk" class="mw-redirect">Salazar Slytherin's basilisk</a>, Harry and Ron ventured into the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a> together, where they were rescued from a <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest_Acromantula_colony" title="Forbidden Forest Acromantula colony">clan</a> of <a href="/wiki/Acromantula" title="Acromantula">Acromantula</a> by the missing Ford Anglia. Ron also accompanied Harry down to the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> the same year to rescue his sister Ginny.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Tumblr_my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140405164157" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Tumblr_my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140405164157"  	 width="245"  	 height="110"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Tumblr_my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140405164157" 	 alt="Tumblr my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="110"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_my6tk9mIK81rjyrpro8_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ron reunite before the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and Ron had a major falling out in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> when Harry was made a <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Champion</a>; despite knowing it to be completely contrary to Harry's character, Ron's insecurities initially led him to believe Harry had cheated in order to enter the tournament, but left Ron out of scheme to keep the resulting glory and attention for himself. However, Ron soon realised how badly he had misjudged the situation and apologised. <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> was later taken as the object Harry would "sorely miss" in the Second Task of the competition.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>What are you doing? Are you staying, or what?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I... Yes — yes, I'm staying. Ron, we said we'd go with Harry, we said we'd help —</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>I get it. You choose him.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Ron, no — please — come back, come back!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Ron after an argument with Harry and Hermione<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Harry and Ron had an even more serious falling out in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, when they, along with Hermione, were hunting Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>; the negative energy within <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Locket" class="mw-redirect">Salazar Slytherin's Locket</a> affected Ron more severely than the other two, causing him to temporarily abandon his friends before regretting his decision, and returning to them as soon as he was able. During this outbreak, Ron thought that Harry and Hermione were in love, which momentarily disrupted Ron and Hermione's relationship.
</p><p>Upon his return, Ron watched Harry follow the <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">silver doe</a> to <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s sword" class="mw-redirect">Godric Gryffindor's sword</a>, and saved Harry's life after he jumped into a lake to retrieve it. When Harry finally <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">opened</a> the locket, Ron saw the part of Voldemort's soul transform into a supposed Harry and Hermione kissing, and it almost led him to believe that the imagined relationship between Harry and Hermione was real. However, Lord Voldemort underestimated how strong Ron really was, and so the locket was destroyed when Ron plunged the sword of Griffyndor into it and overcame his fears and worries.
</p><p>The hardships Ron and Harry faced together served to reinforce their bond, and they remained friends for life. Ron's fierce loyalty and sense of humour often helped Harry relax and have fun even in the darkest times of his life. The two were like brothers, and would eventually become brothers-in-law when Harry married Ginny. Ron was the uncle of Harry's three children, and became godfather to Harry and Ginny's eldest son, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Sirius Potter</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Hermione_Granger">Hermione Granger</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>She's like my sister. I <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a> her like a sister, and I reckon she feels the same way about me. It’s always been like that.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry on his and Hermione's relationship<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 133px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220303" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Hermione-granger-gallery5"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg" 	data-image-name="Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/133?cb=20141122220303"  	 width="133"  	 height="209"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9a/Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/133?cb=20141122220303" 	 alt="Hermione-granger-gallery5"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg" 	data-image-name="Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg" 	 	 width="133"  	 height="209"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione-granger-gallery5.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione Granger, his best friend</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Though Harry and Ron initially found <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> stuck-up and arrogant, the three became best friends after Harry and Ron saved her from a troll in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, and she, in turn, lied to keep them from getting in trouble.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_33-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-33">[34]</a></sup> Her quick mind was at times the only thing that saved the three friends from potential failure in both life-threatening and every-day situations. Out of concern for her friend, Hermione often chided Harry for his recklessness; though this occasionally put some strain on their relationship, it often served to keep Harry on track, such as when he briefly considered pursuing the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> instead of the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>.
</p><p>Hermione was always with Harry and was fiercely protective of him, from snapping at <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a> when she doubted Harry's claim that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> returned to interceding when <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> was about to use the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> on Harry. Hermione stood by Harry even when <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> doubted him during the Triwizard Tournament, accepting his story "without question", and when Ron temporarily left them in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, despite her own romantic feelings for Ron. Harry, for his part, was quick to defend Hermione against <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a>, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, and others who insulted her, and protects her physically on instinct in dangerous places.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Tumblr_n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306070856" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8 r1 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8_r1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8 r1 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Tumblr_n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306070856"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/70/Tumblr_n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8_r1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306070856" 	 alt="Tumblr n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8 r1 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8_r1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8 r1 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_n109aipg9S1ryj5t4o8_r1_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione grow closer during Ron's absence</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Though their friendship remained entirely platonic, at times their closeness engendered jealously or curiosity in others; especially those who had feelings for one or the other, including Cho Chang, Viktor Krum, and even Ron. When the two were briefly alone together during the search for the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>, Harry and Hermione experienced some "<i>charged moments,</i>" in which the two "<i>shared something very intense</i>";<sup id="cite_ref-HAH_81-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HAH-81">[82]</a></sup> however, each remained devoted to <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> and Ron, respectively.
</p><p>As Harry himself described, Hermione was one of two of his best friends, akin to a sister. It could be further said she was like his older sister, protective and always trying to keep him in line. The two were also close enough to share their feelings with one another before sharing those feelings with their significant other. Through Hermione's marriage to <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>, and through Harry's marriage to Ginny, Hermione became his sister-in-law, as well as the aunt and godmother of his children.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ginny_Weasley">Ginny Weasley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>Harry looked around; there was Ginny running toward him; she had a hard, blazing look in her face as she threw her arms around him. And without thinking, without planning it, without worrying about the fact that fifty people were watching, Harry kissed her. After several long moments — or it might have been half an hour — or possibly several sunlit days — they broke apart.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry finally expresses his feelings in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220330" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg" 	data-image-name="HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220330"  	 width="140"  	 height="215"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220330" 	 alt="HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg" 	data-image-name="HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="215"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HBP-promo-harry-potter-9632237-1920-2560.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ginny Weasley, his future wife and mother of his children</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> and Harry first met at <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a> in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, though they did not formally meet until the summer of <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a>, at which point it became blatantly clear that Ginny had a huge crush on Harry. Though the feeling moderated over time, until <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> she was too shy and nervous around him to speak to him comfortably. She became even further embarrassed after Harry saved her from the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> in his second year, when she had been possessed by a fragment of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>'s <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle&#39;s Diary">soul</a>. <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> helped Ginny by advising her to be more like herself around Harry, and perhaps even see other people. Ginny took this advice, and Harry came to see her as she truly was: strong-willed, funny, stubborn, and compassionate.
</p><p>The two became good friends in Harry's <a href="/wiki/1995%E2%80%931996_school_year" title="1995–1996 school year">fifth year</a>, the same year Harry started to enjoy her company as much as Ron or Hermione's, and also able to tell him to shut up and cheer up during his depression.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 220px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220402" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry-potter-kiss1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/220?cb=20141122220402"  	 width="220"  	 height="147"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/66/Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/220?cb=20141122220402" 	 alt="Harry-potter-kiss1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg" 	 	 width="220"  	 height="147"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-kiss1.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ginny giving Harry his seventeenth birthday present</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After his relationship with <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a> "fell apart" and Harry spent a good deal of time with <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> as well as <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> in the summer of <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, Harry's feelings for Ginny began to deepen and change. In his first potions class with <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Slughorn</a>, the love potion <a href="/wiki/Amortentia" title="Amortentia">Amortentia</a> revealed he was attracted to "<i>something flowery he had smelled at the Burrow</i>", which later turned out to be Ginny's hair. After witnessing her kissing <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>, Harry started to feel jealous and fantasise about kissing her himself, although he determinedly tried to convince himself that his feelings for her were "elder-brotherly". He began having dreams about her of a seemingly intimate nature, even reflecting once that he was very glad that Ron could not perform <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimency</a>. One of the many reasons that Harry fell in love with Ginny is that she is rarely weepy, in stark contrast to Cho, who cried all over the place after her previous boyfriend was killed.
</p><p>Shortly after Ginny and Dean broke up, she and Harry spontaneously kissed at a Gryffindor <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Cup" title="Quidditch Cup" class="mw-redirect">Quidditch Cup</a> victory party. The two began dating, and Harry regarded this time as one of the happiest in his life. However, after the murder of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>, Harry decided to end things with Ginny, fearing that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> would target her if he learned of their blossoming/growing strong romance and knowing that he would be leaving with Ron and Hermione to find Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. Ginny was upset, but respected Harry's decision, knowing that it was for "<i>some stupid, noble reason.</i>"
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Harry%26Ginny2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140625050047" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry&amp;Ginny2"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry%26Ginny2.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry&amp;amp;Ginny2.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Harry%26Ginny2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140625050047"  	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bd/Harry%26Ginny2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140625050047" 	 alt="Harry&amp;Ginny2"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry%26Ginny2.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry&amp;amp;Ginny2.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry%26Ginny2.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The power of love, demonstrated between Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Ginny</b>: "<i>I’d like you to have something to remember me by, you know, if you meet some <a href="/wiki/Veela" title="Veela">Veela</a> when you’re off doing whatever you’re doing.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I think dating opportunities are going to be pretty thin on the ground, to be honest.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Ginny</b>: "<i>There’s the silver lining I’ve been looking for.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Ginny kisses Harry on his seventeenth birthday<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p>The two soon saw each other again during the summer while Harry stayed at the Burrow. For Harry's seventeenth <a href="/wiki/31_July" title="31 July">birthday</a>, Ginny passionately kissed Harry as something for him to remember her by, but they were interrupted by Ron and Hermione. The former told Harry not to "<i>mess Ginny around</i>", as his sister had been "<i>pretty cut up</i>" when Harry ended their romantic relationship, though Hermione was more sympathetic towards the two of them. The two were soon separated for months as Harry tracked down <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> with Hermione and Ron, while Ginny returned to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, but still harboured pretty strong romantic feelings for one another. After Ron abandoned his friends, Harry took to staring at Ginny's dot on the <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a>, and was worried when he heard that she, <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a> had gotten in trouble for attempting to steal <a href="/wiki/Godric_Gryffindor%27s_Sword" title="Godric Gryffindor&#39;s Sword" class="mw-redirect">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a> for him.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest?cb=20140628034720" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Potter family1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Potter_family1.png" 	data-image-name="Potter family1.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20140628034720"  	 width="230"  	 height="146"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Potter_family1.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20140628034720" 	 alt="Potter family1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Potter_family1.png" 	data-image-name="Potter family1.png" 	 	 width="230"  	 height="146"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potter_family1.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ginny's children</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> began, Harry wanted Ginny to stay out of the fighting but was forced to ask her to leave the safety of the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> when he, Hermione, and Ron searched it for <a href="/wiki/Rowena_Ravenclaw%27s_Diadem" title="Rowena Ravenclaw&#39;s Diadem" class="mw-redirect">Rowena Ravenclaw's Diadem</a>. When preparing to sacrifice himself to Voldemort, Ginny was the last person about whom Harry thought.
