Later in battle, after Ginny was nearly killed by <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, Harry ran at Bellatrix rather than Voldemort, though <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a> got there first.
</p><p>After Voldemort's defeat, Harry and Ginny resumed their strong romance. Sometime between 1999 to 2002, they married and had three children: <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Sirius</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Severus</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter" title="Lily Potter">Lily Luna</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Weasley_family">Weasley family</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>Half our family does seem to owe you their lives, now I stop and think about it... well, all I can say is that it was a lucky day for the Weasleys when Ron decided to sit in your compartment on the Hogwarts Express, Harry.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> to Harry in the Hogwarts hospital wing<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6a/Weasleys.png/revision/latest?cb=20130704015342" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Weasleys"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Weasleys.png" 	data-image-name="Weasleys.png" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6a/Weasleys.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/245?cb=20130704015342"  	 width="245"  	 height="142"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6a/Weasleys.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/245?cb=20130704015342" 	 alt="Weasleys"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Weasleys.png" 	data-image-name="Weasleys.png" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="142"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Weasleys.png" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Weasley Family, his second family</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Beginning in the summer of <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a>, Harry came to spend many of his holidays with the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>, at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">the Burrow</a>. Through his friendship with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, and his later romance with <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, the Weasleys became far more of a family to him than the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a> ever were.
</p><p><a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> announced to Harry's <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">godfather</a> that Harry was "as good as" one of her actual sons, and her <a href="/wiki/Boggart" title="Boggart">Boggart</a> — of dead family members, one after another — included Harry. She was always keen to make sure Harry was taken care of; at one point Harry noted that she "<i>fussed over the state of his socks and tried to get him to eat fourth helpings at every meal</i>". Her caring sometimes led her to become overprotective of Harry, such as when she strongly objected to the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order</a> members giving Harry information regarding <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> during the summer of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>. She even went as far as to give him, for his coming of age, her <a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett" title="Fabian Prewett">brother</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett%27s_watch" title="Fabian Prewett&#39;s watch">watch</a>, a clearly treasured family heirloom, and reminder of how much she had already lost in the struggle against Voldemort.
</p><p><a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> was a surrogate father to Harry who like his wife treated him like one of his own children by opening his home to him for months at a time and inviting him to family functions. He unlike most entrusted Harry with sensitive information others had felt him too young to understand. Harry once saved Mr Weasley's life, after <a href="/wiki/Attack_on_Arthur_Weasley" title="Attack on Arthur Weasley">seeing</a> him being attacked by <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a> before Christmas of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>.
</p><p>When Ron was poisoned in Harry's sixth year, and Harry saved him with a <a href="/wiki/Bezoar" title="Bezoar">bezoar</a>, Arthur pointed out how he had saved several members of the Weasley family, and said that it was a good day for the Weasleys when Ron decided to sit with him on the train in 1991.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Tumblr_lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306063120" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Tumblr_lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306063120"  	 width="245"  	 height="136"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Tumblr_lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306063120" 	 alt="Tumblr lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="136"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_lwdkjrHFD21qibpnuo3_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a>, the closest thing he has to a mother</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Twins <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a> helped Harry out numerous times, including saving him from the Dursleys during the summer of <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a> with an enchanted car, giving him the <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a> in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>, as well as volunteering to be <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">D.A.</a> members in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> and later that same year, distracting <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> so that Harry could use her office to communicate with <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>. The twins, whom Harry regarded as close friends, were also on the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a> with Harry for four years. Harry gave his <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard</a> winnings to the Weasley twins to start <a href="/wiki/Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes" title="Weasleys&#39; Wizard Wheezes">Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes</a>, and in their gratitude for the "start-up loan", they gave Harry products from their joke shop free of charge. Fred's death during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> was one of the deaths that hit Harry the hardest.
</p><p>Harry liked Percy Weasley the least of Ron's brothers, finding him pompous, although he was genuinely shocked when Percy sided with the Ministry against him in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>. Percy later came to his senses and fought alongside Harry in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>. When Harry saw his sons go to Hogwarts, he thought he overheard Percy talking and "<i>was glad to have the excuse not to stop and say hello</i>". He was also friends with <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a>, describing him as "cool" upon first meeting him, participating at his wedding with <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>, and living for a month at their house, <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>. He also liked <a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley" title="Charles Weasley">Charlie</a>, who helped him out somewhat during the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>. In his first year, Harry heard many times that Charlie was a great Quidditch player, and was very happy when he and his team lived up to Charlie's reputation.
</p><p>After the end of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>, Harry officially became part of the Weasley family through his marriage to Ginny.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Children">Children</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Albus</b>: "<i>Dad, what if I am put in <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Albus Severus Potter. You were named after two headmasters of <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts" title="Hogwarts" class="mw-redirect">Hogwarts</a>. One of them was a Slytherin and he was the bravest man I’ve ever known.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Albus</b>: "<i>But let’s say that I am…</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Then Slytherin House will have gained a wonderful, young wizard. But listen — If it really means that much to you, you can choose <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a>. The <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> takes your choice into account. </i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Albus confides his fear to Harry, his father<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Harry%26Albus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140626070205" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry&amp;Albus"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry%26Albus.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry&amp;amp;Albus.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Harry%26Albus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140626070205"  	 width="245"  	 height="135"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Harry%26Albus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140626070205" 	 alt="Harry&amp;Albus"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry%26Albus.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry&amp;amp;Albus.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="135"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry%26Albus.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and his son Albus saying goodbye on the platform</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had three children with <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>: <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James Sirius</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Severus</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter" title="Lily Potter">Lily&#160;Luna Potter</a>. The eldest, James, has an outgoing personality and was a troublemaker, much like his <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">grandfather and namesake</a>, and liked to tease his brother Albus. Albus, on the other hand, was quieter and more thoughtful, much like his father. 
</p><p>When he admitted to Harry that he was afraid of being sorted into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a>, Harry told him that Albus and Severus were the names of two former headmasters of Hogwarts; one was a Slytherin, and "<i><a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">the bravest man I ever knew</a></i>". He also informed his son that the Sorting Hat would listen to the wearer's choice, and he knew that for a fact because it had considered putting him into Slytherin; this was something Harry had not shared with any of his other children. Albus also closely resembled Harry, having the same eyes, untidy hair, and glasses. Lily, the youngest, was very like her mother. Harry and Lily were seen holding hands while walking into Kings Cross, much like <a href="/wiki/Ginny_Weasley" title="Ginny Weasley" class="mw-redirect">Lily's mother</a> and <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">maternal grandfather</a>. Lily was jealous of her brothers as they boarded the train for Hogwarts, exactly as Ginny had been in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>. Harry comforted her by reminding her that she would be joining them in two years.
</p><p>It is seen through Harry's actions that he loves and cherishes each of his children very much.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nieces_and_nephews">Nieces and nephews</span></h4>
<p>Harry had many nieces and nephews through the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>. The children of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur</a> were <a href="/wiki/Victoire_Weasley" title="Victoire Weasley">Victoire</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dominique_Weasley" title="Dominique Weasley">Dominique</a> and <a href="/wiki/Louis_Weasley" title="Louis Weasley">Louis</a>, and <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James</a> announced that he had seen <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a> kissing Victoire at <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a>, in <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>. The children of <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy</a> and his wife, <a href="/wiki/Audrey_Weasley" title="Audrey Weasley">Audrey</a>, were <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley_II" title="Molly Weasley II">Molly</a>, who was named after her <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">grandmother</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Lucy_Weasley" title="Lucy Weasley">Lucy</a>, and either Molly or both of the girls were attending Hogwarts in the 2017-2018 school year, because Percy was at King's Cross on 1 September 2017. The children of <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a> and <a href="/wiki/Angelina_Johnson" title="Angelina Johnson">Angelina Johnson</a> were <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley_II" title="Fred Weasley II">Fred</a>, who was named after his late <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">uncle</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Roxanne_Weasley" title="Roxanne Weasley">Roxanne</a>.
</p><p>Harry was most likely closest to Ron and Hermione's children, <a href="/wiki/Rose_Weasley" title="Rose Weasley">Rose</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Weasley" title="Hugo Weasley">Hugo</a>, as they were the same ages as <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter" title="Lily Potter">Lily</a>, respectively, and Albus was "relieved" to meet up with Rose at King's Cross. Ron and Hermione were probably close to all of Harry's children as well, and Harry's eldest son, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James</a> is their godson. It is also highly likely that Ron and Hermione made Harry <a href="/wiki/Rose_Weasley" title="Rose Weasley">their daughter's</a> godfather.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fleur_Delacour">Fleur Delacour</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I'm sorry. I never meant you to have to deal with all of this.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Fleur</b>: "'<i>Arry, you saved my sister's life. I do not forget.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry Potter and Fleur at <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 145px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/FLEUR1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220452" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="FLEUR1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="FLEUR1.jpg" 	data-image-name="FLEUR1.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/FLEUR1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220452"  	 width="145"  	 height="193"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/FLEUR1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220452" 	 alt="FLEUR1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="FLEUR1.jpg" 	data-image-name="FLEUR1.jpg" 	 	 width="145"  	 height="193"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:FLEUR1.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Fleur Delacour, his future sister-in-law</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's first opinion of <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a> in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> was that she was a very beautiful girl who looked like a <a href="/wiki/Veela" title="Veela">Veela</a>. Though Fleur initially paid him as little attention as she did most of the younger Hogwarts students, after the second task, when Harry saved Fleur's younger sister <a href="/wiki/Gabrielle_Delacour" title="Gabrielle Delacour">Gabrielle Delacour</a>, Fleur was much kinder to Harry in her gratitude.
</p><p>Fleur met Harry again at the Burrow, in 1996, when Fleur was about to marry <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a>, the eldest brother of Harry's best friend, Ron. After the <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</a>, Harry and his friends lived with Bill and Fleur for roughly one month at <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>, where Fleur cared for them all, much like a mother or an older sister. Fleur eventually became Harry's sister-in-law, after Harry married <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>. Harry's godson, <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Ted Lupin</a>, was seen kissing Fleur's daughter, <a href="/wiki/Victoire_Weasley" title="Victoire Weasley">Victoire Weasley</a>, at King's Cross Station in <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Teddy_Lupin">Teddy Lupin</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Remus Lupin</b>: "<i>You'll be godfather?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>M-me?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Remus Lupin</b>: "<i>You, yes of course — Dora quite agrees, no one better —</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I — yeah — blimey —</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> and Harry on Teddy Lupin<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p><a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a> was Harry's godson, and the son of <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> and <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a>, two of Harry's close friends. In <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Remus asked Harry to be Teddy's godfather, and Harry accepted, with great happiness. After Remus and Tonks were killed in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, Harry helped Teddy's grandmother, <a href="/wiki/Andromeda_Tonks" title="Andromeda Tonks">Andromeda</a>, raise him, and by <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>, Harry and Teddy were clearly very close. When Harry's children wanted Teddy to move in with the Potters, Harry mentioned that Teddy had been coming to their home for dinner four times a week, and that he practically lived with them already. The Potter kids were also thrilled at the idea that Teddy, who was seen kissing <a href="/wiki/Victoire_Weasley" title="Victoire Weasley">Victoire Weasley</a>, the daughter of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur</a>, might officially become a part of their family.
</p><p>In <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, as Harry was planning to break in to the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_vault" title="Lestrange vault" class="mw-redirect">Lestrange vault</a>, he wondered if he was becoming as reckless as a godfather to Teddy as <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> had been to him. With helping Andromeda raise Teddy, Harry possibly became a father figure towards him, as Harry could understand how Teddy felt without parents.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Albus_Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Harry, I'm sorry, but I think the real reason you're so angry is that Dumbledore never told you any of this himself.</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Maybe I am! Look what he asked from me, Hermione! Risk your life, Harry!... And don't expect me to explain everything, just trust me blindly... even though I don't trust you! Never the whole truth! Never!</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>He loved you. I know he loved you.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; Harry and Hermione discussing the secrets Dumbledore kept<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 145px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220412" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg" 	data-image-name="600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220412"  	 width="145"  	 height="196"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220412" 	 alt="600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg" 	data-image-name="600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg" 	 	 width="145"  	 height="196"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:600full-Albus-Dumbledore-the-prisoner-of-azkaban-photo.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Albus Dumbledore: headmaster, friend, and mentor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> was a mentor to Harry, akin to a grandfather figure. Dumbledore arranged for Harry to be rescued from <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a> after his parents' murder and left him in the care of his aunt <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">Petunia Dursley</a> in order to give him the benefit of the magical protection of his mother's blood. In Harry's <a href="/wiki/1995-1996_school_year" title="1995-1996 school year" class="mw-redirect">fifth year</a>, he admitted to Harry that he had not told him of the <a href="/wiki/Prophecy" title="Prophecy">prophecy</a> concerning himself and <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>, because he wanted to spare Harry the pain and responsibility it would burden him with for as long as possible. Though Harry was initially furious with him for the frustration he felt for being kept in the dark, the two continued to be close. By Harry's <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">sixth year</a>, Dumbledore took on the role of providing Harry with additional insights into the origins of Lord Voldemort, largely through the use of the <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">Pensieve</a>. He entrusted Harry with the task of getting a final, crucial <a href="/wiki/Memory" title="Memory">memory</a> from <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a> regarding Voldemort's knowledge of <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>.
</p><p>Dumbledore's death was greatly devastating to Harry, though he persevered in the impossibly difficult task Dumbledore had left him of finding and destroying each of Voldemort's Horcruxes. Harry had difficulty coping with the fact that there was much Dumbledore had not told him about his history with the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> and <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a>; however, when he learned during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> that Dumbledore had supposedly planned all along for Harry to sacrifice himself, Harry innately showed incredible faith in his mentor by serenely accepting the task. When Harry allowed himself to be struck by Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>, his soul entered a state of <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">Limbo</a>, resembling <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King&#39;s Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a>, where Dumbledore was waiting to speak with him.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Do not pity the dead, Harry, pity the living. Above all, pity those who live without love.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Dumbledore's parting words to Harry during their encounter in Limbo<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 210px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220457" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry Dumbledore limbo"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry Dumbledore limbo.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/210?cb=20141122220457"  	 width="210"  	 height="157"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fb/Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/210?cb=20141122220457" 	 alt="Harry Dumbledore limbo"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg" 	data-image-name="Harry Dumbledore limbo.jpg" 	 	 width="210"  	 height="157"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Dumbledore_limbo.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry Potter speaking with Albus Dumbledore in Limbo</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The fact that Dumbledore himself was there to meet Harry in a place between life and death attested to the bond of fellowship between them. They discussed all that had happened to Harry since Dumbledore's death, as well as things that had remained unsaid prior to it. At one point, Dumbledore seemed to beg for Harry's reassurance, uncharacteristically doubting some of the decisions he had made in the course of his life, which Harry easily gave him. Though Harry had felt some resentment for how little he felt Dumbledore had actually revealed of himself in their time together, Harry probably learned secrets and saw a side of Dumbledore that no one else knew during the events at "King's Cross".
</p><p>Harry also had a unique relationship with the Dumbledore's phoenix, <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a>; not only was Harry's <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter&#39;s wand">wand</a> one of the only two ever made with feathers from Fawkes's tail, but the phoenix found Harry in the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a>, helped him kill <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin%27s_Basilisk" title="Salazar Slytherin&#39;s Basilisk" class="mw-redirect">Salazar Slytherin's Basilisk</a>, and provided Harry with the only known antidote to <a href="/wiki/Basilisk_venom" title="Basilisk venom">Basilisk venom</a>: phoenix tears. Fawkes's song was a source of comfort for Harry on a number occasions before the phoenix left Hogwarts following Dumbledore's death.
</p><p>Harry later named his <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">second son</a> Albus, after the Hogwarts Headmaster.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Lord_Voldemort">Lord Voldemort</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (film)">"<i>Don’t you turn your back on </i>me<i>, Harry Potter! I want you to look at me when I kill you! I want to see the light leave your eyes!</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Voldemort taunting Harry before the duel in the graveyard<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Voldemort1998.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220615" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Voldemort1998"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Voldemort1998.jpg" 	data-image-name="Voldemort1998.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Voldemort1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220615"  	 width="140"  	 height="214"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Voldemort1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220615" 	 alt="Voldemort1998"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Voldemort1998.jpg" 	data-image-name="Voldemort1998.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="214"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort1998.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Lord Voldemort, his mortal enemy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, who sought to destroy Harry ever since the boy was an infant, was Harry's most dangerous enemy. Dumbledore described the relationship between <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> and Harry as follows: "<i>You and Lord Voldemort have journeyed together into realms of magic hitherto unknown and untested... Voldemort wrapped your destinies together more securely than ever two wizards were joined in history... both kin and mortal enemy</i>". The two wizards had their destines locked together even since <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_first_prophecy" title="Sybill Trelawney&#39;s first prophecy">a prophecy</a> foretelling of child "<i>with the power to Vanquish the Dark Lord</i>" was made and relayed in part Voldemort, who decided to act to prevent it from coming to fruition. Though two infants fit the description of "The Chosen One", Voldemort believed the son of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter" title="Lily Potter">Lily Potter</a> posed the greater threat, as he, like Voldemort himself, was a <a href="/wiki/Half-blood" title="Half-blood">half-blood</a>.
</p><p>To circumvent the prophecy, Voldemort went to <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric&#39;s Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a> to murder the baby Harry. When Lily refused to move aside and allow Voldemort access to his true target, her son, her willing sacrifice afforded Harry a <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">protection</a> so powerful, it caused the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> Voldemort aimed at Harry to rebound. Voldemort's body was destroyed and the fragment of soul residing within it was forced to flee and exist in a weak, spectral form. In attempting to kill Harry, Voldemort unintentionally embedded a piece of his <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">soul</a> and some of his own abilities into Harry, as well as effectively marking Harry "as his equal". It was only after Voldemort attacked Harry that the latter became a <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parselmouth</a>, a trait Voldemort inherited from <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a>, as well as was able to see into Voldemort's mind on occasion — both tools that aided Harry in bringing about Lord Voldemort's end. As it happened, when Voldemort tried to kill Harry in the Forbidden Forest during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, he was unable to because when Voldemort had used Harry's blood to restore his body, he had unwittingly bound Harry's life to his own. As such, the curse only destroyed the Horcrux piece of Voldemort’s soul within Harry, while Harry survived.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/Tumblr_mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140705155925" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1 250"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1 250.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/Tumblr_mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140705155925"  	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/Tumblr_mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1_250.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140705155925" 	 alt="Tumblr mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1 250"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1_250.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1 250.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="130"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_mv0xoiWzPj1qeijvdo1_250.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry being possessed by Voldemort in <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>There are many features that both Voldemort and Harry share: both were only children who were "abandoned" at a very young age, too young to properly remember their parents. Both had grown up believing untruths about their parents (Harry was told that his parents were unemployed drunks who had died in a car accident, while Voldemort was allegedly told that his mother was from a circus). Lord Voldemort, like Harry, never knew his mother. Although he did meet his father, he only sought him out for revenge to kill him. Harry only vaguely remembers both his parents, being too young when they were killed to remember anything more than vague images and fleeting feelings. However, he has been able to connect with them through objects once belonging to his father, such as the Invisibility Cloak and the Marauder's Map, his mother's letter, old photographs, and also his parents' friends. He also met their spirits via the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a>. In addition, both boys wore second-hand clothes: Harry was given his repulsive cousin Dudley's enormous cast offs and Tom wore tatty hand-me-downs supplied by the orphanage. Both Riddle and Harry were friendless as children: Harry was kept isolated and denied a normal social life by his <a href="/wiki/Petunia_Dursley" title="Petunia Dursley">aunt</a> and <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">uncle</a>, while Tom expressed his bitterness and loneliness by tormenting the other orphans, frightening them away.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">"<i>There is no good and evil... There's only power, and those who are too weak to seek it </i>[...]<i> </i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Voldemort, speaking through Quirrell, in 1992<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher&#39;s Stone">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p>Both Harry and Voldemort were Parselmouths: wizards who have the ability to speak to snakes. This is less coincidental than it might seem, for Voldemort actually transferred this ability to Harry when attacking him. Voldemort was in <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> house and the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> almost placed Harry into Slytherin, though Harry asked to be placed in some other House, thus, making it so his choices define who he is. Both boys had followers: Tom gathered <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_gang" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s gang">a small group of "<i>friends</i>"</a> through fear, intimidation, as well as tenuous promises and then later a whole group calling themselves the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>. Similarly, many students gravitated to Harry out of loyalty and a shared cause, but also curiosity and an attraction to his fame.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Tumblr_m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1_500.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140521135059" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Tumblr m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1 500"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1_500.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1 500.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Tumblr_m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1_500.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20140521135059"  	 width="230"  	 height="131"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c8/Tumblr_m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1_500.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width/230?cb=20140521135059" 	 alt="Tumblr m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1 500"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Tumblr_m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1_500.gif" 	data-image-name="Tumblr m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1 500.gif" 	 	 width="230"  	 height="131"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tumblr_m23mqsgsCN1qeb3sro1_500.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry &amp; Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The two wizards also had "twin" wands: each wand contained the same phoenix feather <a href="/wiki/Wand_core" title="Wand core">wand core</a>, that is later revealed to be from <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a>, Dumbledore's pet phoenix. As well, both boys were unaware they were wizards until about the age of eleven, even though each could make unusual things happen. Both Harry and Tom were of great interest to Dumbledore and both felt their first home was Hogwarts. In addition, both achieved greatness in the <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> class, however, each for different reasons. Both Harry and Voldemort were half-bloods, though that only matters to Tom Riddle. Both are also rule breakers: Harry, of course, feels justified when he does things like leaving his dorm after hours, entering the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, as well as eavesdropping on teachers because he believes it serves a greater purpose. Tom might have engaged in similar activities, but if so, then he did this for darker and self-serving reasons, as well as without benefit of an Invisibility Cloak like Harry: while at school, Tom framed Hagrid for a girl's death, then went on to worse crimes.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>Potter doesn't mean that. Who else are you going to use as a shield today, Potter?</i>"
</dd><dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>No one. There are no more Horcruxes. It's just you and me. One of us is going to leave for good.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212; The final confrontation between Voldemort and Harry at the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd></dl>
</div>
<p>However, there are also many features that set Harry and Voldemort apart: at his initial Sorting, Harry requested he not be placed in Slytherin. It is unlikely Tom Riddle would have made a similar request, even if he was unaware what his ancestry was. Furthermore, Voldemort never had friends, only followers who feared him or hoped to gain some reward or advantage. Harry made many friends: his dorm-mates, the Weasley family, as well as many teachers: especially Hagrid, Remus Lupin, as well as (the real) Mad-Eye Moody. They supported Harry because they share a common belief. While both were half-blood, Harry's mother, a witch, was Muggle-born, whereas Lord Voldemort's <i>father</i> was a Muggle, as well as incidentally, so was Snape's, which is why he called himself the Half-Blood Prince.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 255px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Voldemort-Harry_1st_duel_%28Concept_Artwork_for_the_HP4_film%29.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220623" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Voldemort-Harry 1st duel (Concept Artwork for the HP4 film)"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Voldemort-Harry_1st_duel_%28Concept_Artwork_for_the_HP4_film%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Voldemort-Harry 1st duel (Concept Artwork for the HP4 film).jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Voldemort-Harry_1st_duel_%28Concept_Artwork_for_the_HP4_film%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/255?cb=20141122220623"  	 width="255"  	 height="109"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f7/Voldemort-Harry_1st_duel_%28Concept_Artwork_for_the_HP4_film%29.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/255?cb=20141122220623" 	 alt="Voldemort-Harry 1st duel (Concept Artwork for the HP4 film)"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Voldemort-Harry_1st_duel_%28Concept_Artwork_for_the_HP4_film%29.jpg" 	data-image-name="Voldemort-Harry 1st duel (Concept Artwork for the HP4 film).jpg" 	 	 width="255"  	 height="109"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort-Harry_1st_duel_(Concept_Artwork_for_the_HP4_film).jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Voldemort's final duel on 2 May, <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Most importantly, Harry cared about the people around him, even pitying Draco Malfoy when the boy was ordered by Voldemort to assassinate Dumbledore. Harry had the ability to love and be compassionate, making him more vulnerable to suffering pain, but also capable of experiencing deep friendship and loyalty that helped guide him to greatness. For Voldemort, love, fidelity, or compassion are unknown and unwelcome concepts. Voldemort would demand loyalty and respect from his <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, but had little in return. Voldemort had a tendency to dispose of <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> who either failed him, angered him, or were no longer of use to him. Despite literally sharing the same blood, Voldemort and Harry were also related by blood, however distantly, through their shared descent from the Peverells (Voldemort through the <a href="/wiki/House_of_Gaunt" title="House of Gaunt">Gaunts</a> and Harry through the <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">Potters</a>). This made them distant cousins.
</p><p>It is possible that Harry won the allegiance of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_wand" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s wand">Voldemort's wand</a> after the latter's death during their <a href="/wiki/Duel_in_the_Great_Hall" title="Duel in the Great Hall" class="mw-redirect">Duel in the Great Hall</a>. If so, it is highly unlikely Harry will ever use the wand due to his personal history with both the wand itself and its original owner.
</p><p>Voldemort and Harry share some things: The same wand cores and the same family because Harry Potter is related to Tom Riddle, they are related through the <a href="/wiki/Peverell_family" title="Peverell family">Peverell brothers</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Rubeus_Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (film)">"<i>There's no Hogwarts without you, Hagrid.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry, after Hagrid's return from <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets_(film)" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (film)">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<p><a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> was Harry's first friend in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a>. In effect, he rescued Harry twice: once from the wreckage of his destroyed home, as a baby; second, from the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursleys</a>' to take him back into the wizarding world.
</p>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/Harry_hagrid_1998.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111130811" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry hagrid 1998"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_hagrid_1998.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry hagrid 1998.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/Harry_hagrid_1998.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111130811"  	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/42/Harry_hagrid_1998.gif/revision/latest?cb=20141111130811" 	 alt="Harry hagrid 1998"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry_hagrid_1998.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry hagrid 1998.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="125"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_hagrid_1998.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry with Rubeus Hagrid; his friend, protector, and teacher</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Both orphaned outsiders, Harry and Hagrid shared a bond that Harry never failed to honour. He constantly defended the <a href="/wiki/Half-giant" title="Half-giant">half-giant</a> against name-calling and mockery, and despite his disapproval, helped Hagrid protect various dangerous <a href="/wiki/Beast" title="Beast">pets</a> and raise his half-brother, <a href="/wiki/Grawp" title="Grawp">Grawp</a>. Harry also refused to believe Hagrid opened the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a>, when <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_Diary" title="Tom Riddle&#39;s Diary" class="mw-redirect">Tom Riddle's Diary</a> showed him the memory. Discovering Hagrid's ancestry as a half-giant did nothing to deter their friendship; Harry showed no concern to begin with, and was disgusted when <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> revealed it via media, causing Hagrid depression.
</p><p>During the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> in <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> forced a distraught Hagrid to carry Harry's <i>"</i>corpse<i>"</i> out of the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, during which time Hagrid expressed his fury with the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest_Centaur_colony" title="Forbidden Forest Centaur colony">centaurs</a> for initially refusing to fight, prompting them to join in soon after.
</p><p>In 2017, Harry's sons, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus</a>, were planning to meet Hagrid for tea shortly after their arrival at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Sirius_Black">Sirius Black</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>It was cruel that you and Sirius had such a short time together. A brutal ending to what should have been a long and happy relationship.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Sirius_black_investigation.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220633" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Sirius black investigation"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Sirius_black_investigation.jpg" 	data-image-name="Sirius black investigation.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Sirius_black_investigation.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220633"  	 width="140"  	 height="208"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Sirius_black_investigation.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220633" 	 alt="Sirius black investigation"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Sirius_black_investigation.jpg" 	data-image-name="Sirius black investigation.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="208"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Sirius_black_investigation.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Sirius Black, his godfather and friend</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Filling in as a paternal figure or an uncle (unlike Uncle Vernon), <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> was Harry's godfather, as well as his most trusted confidant. When <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_scars" title="Harry Potter&#39;s scars">Harry's scar</a> hurt in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, he acknowledged that he could tell and ask Sirius anything without feeling foolish, hesitant, or uncomfortable. During <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>'s dictatorial rule over Hogwarts during the <a href="/wiki/1995%E2%80%931996_school_year" title="1995–1996 school year">1995–1996 school year</a>, Sirius supported Harry's rebellion against her, telling Harry that he and <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James</a> would have done the same thing. He also supported his <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore&#39;s Army">plan to teach students</a> practical defensive magic.
</p><p>When Harry first met Sirius, he wanted to kill Sirius for the betrayal of his parents. When the truth was revealed that <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a> had been the one who sold the <a href="/wiki/Potters" title="Potters" class="mw-redirect">Potters</a> to <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>, Sirius still showed immense guilt, because it had been his idea for Pettigrew to become the Potters' <a href="/wiki/Secret-Keeper" title="Secret-Keeper" class="mw-redirect">Secret-Keeper</a>.
</p><p>Harry, for his part, became very protective of Sirius. Knowing that the Ministry believed him guilty of mass murder, Harry refused to put Sirius in danger if it could be avoided. When Harry was mysteriously entered into the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, he tried everything to convince Sirius to remain in hiding instead of returning to England. During Umbridge's year at the school, Harry asked Sirius not to come to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> as <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Padfoot</a>, since he did not want to risk Sirius getting thrown back into <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a>; while Sirius obeyed Harry's wishes, he observed that James would have been willing to take the risk.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>I realised I can’t shut myself away, or — or crack up. Sirius wouldn’t have wanted that, would he? And anyway, life’s too short... look at <a href="/wiki/Amelia_Bones" title="Amelia Bones">Madam Bones</a>, look at <a href="/wiki/Emmeline_Vance" title="Emmeline Vance">Emmeline Vance</a>... it could be me next, couldn’t it? But if it is, I’ll make sure I take as many Death Eaters with me as I can and Voldemort too, if I can manage it.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry honors his godfather's memory<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Harry%26Sirius1.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140902221723" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Harry&amp;Sirius1"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Harry%26Sirius1.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry&amp;amp;Sirius1.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Harry%26Sirius1.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140902221723"  	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Harry%26Sirius1.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140902221723" 	 alt="Harry&amp;Sirius1"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Harry%26Sirius1.gif" 	data-image-name="Harry&amp;amp;Sirius1.gif" 	 	 width="245"  	 height="120"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry%26Sirius1.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Sirius</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Sirius was killed in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, Harry at first refused to believe he was dead. Harry was completely devastated by Sirius's death; for the following months, Harry avoided talking about Sirius if he could; whenever the subject came up, he would distract himself in some way to avoid joining the discussion. Very fortunately, Harry was able to move on with his life after a short period of grieving, knowing that Sirius would not want him to shut himself away or crack up. When Harry prepared to sacrifice himself to Voldemort in <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Sirius was one of the spirits he summoned using the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a>. Sirius assured Harry that dying was "<i>quicker and easier</i>" than falling asleep.
</p><p>Sirius also was the one who gave Harry his first <a href="/wiki/Toy_broomstick" title="Toy broomstick">toy broomstick</a>, as a year old baby. In a letter to Sirius, Harry's mother thanked him and described James's impression that Harry would be a "<i>good Quidditch player.</i>" Sirius later gave Harry another <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomstick</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">Firebolt</a>, as thirteen years's worth of presents from his godfather.
</p><p>Harry would name his <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_II" title="James Potter II">eldest son</a> after James and Sirius.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Remus_Lupin">Remus Lupin</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>You're the best <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> teacher we've ever had</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry to Remus Lupin<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 145px"> 	<a href="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/Remus_Lupin_Deathly_Hallows_promo_image.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220644" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Remus Lupin Deathly Hallows promo image"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Remus_Lupin_Deathly_Hallows_promo_image.jpg" 	data-image-name="Remus Lupin Deathly Hallows promo image.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/Remus_Lupin_Deathly_Hallows_promo_image.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220644"  	 width="145"  	 height="193"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/Remus_Lupin_Deathly_Hallows_promo_image.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220644" 	 alt="Remus Lupin Deathly Hallows promo image"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Remus_Lupin_Deathly_Hallows_promo_image.jpg" 	data-image-name="Remus Lupin Deathly Hallows promo image.jpg" 	 	 width="145"  	 height="193"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Remus_Lupin_Deathly_Hallows_promo_image.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Remus Lupin: friend, protector, and former teacher</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry's simple student-teacher relationship with <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> quickly developed into a strong friendship, akin to the one that a kind, loving uncle and his favourite nephew would share.
</p><p>Harry first met Remus when he was an infant, and again in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a> when Remus saved him from the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> on the Hogwarts Express. Remus had been appointed the <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> professor at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> that year, and soon became his favourite professor as well as a mentor of sorts. It was suggested that Remus' classes were how Harry discovered his extraordinary talent for <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>. When Harry continued to be badly affected by <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a>, Remus agreed to give Harry <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_Remus_Lupin%27s_private_lessons" title="Harry Potter and Remus Lupin&#39;s private lessons" class="mw-redirect">private lessons</a> to teach him the <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a>. It was during these lessons that Harry discovered that Remus was one of his parents' oldest, dearest friends. Although Remus attempted to maintain a teacher-student relationship with Harry, he did act more as a close friend or a beloved uncle at times, answering his questions patiently, sharing Butterbeer after a private lesson, assisting him in avoiding trouble with <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a>, and even returning the <a href="/wiki/Marauder%27s_Map" title="Marauder&#39;s Map">Marauder's Map</a> to Harry once he was no longer a professor. Harry, in turn, became deeply fond of Remus, and was extremely upset to hear of his resignation after <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> exposed him as a <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolf</a>. He even attempted to try and talk him into staying on at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, but it was futile, though Remus told him that it had been a real pleasure teaching him, and assured him that they would meet again.
</p><p>The two indeed met again in the summer of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> when members of the <a href="/wiki/Advance_Guard" title="Advance Guard">Advance Guard</a> of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> arrived to pick up Harry from Privet Drive. Although initially wary of intruders, Harry relaxed on learning of Remus' presence in the group, indicating that he still trusted his father's old dear friend despite a year without contact. During the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, Remus protected Harry and <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> from an attack by <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a> and saved Harry's life by preventing him from running into the <a href="/wiki/Veil" title="Veil">Veil</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Death_Chamber" title="Death Chamber">Death Chamber</a> in an attempt to save his godfather, <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>But you are normal. You've just got a — a problem.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Harry Potter to Remus Lupin regarding the latter's <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">lycanthropy</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/250px-Dementor_Boggart.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140523162043" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="250px-Dementor Boggart"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="250px-Dementor_Boggart.gif" 	data-image-name="250px-Dementor Boggart.gif" 	 data-src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/250px-Dementor_Boggart.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140523162043"  	 width="250"  	 height="106"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/250px-Dementor_Boggart.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140523162043" 	 alt="250px-Dementor Boggart"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="250px-Dementor_Boggart.gif" 	data-image-name="250px-Dementor Boggart.gif" 	 	 width="250"  	 height="106"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:250px-Dementor_Boggart.gif" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Remus protecting Harry when his <a href="/wiki/Boggart" title="Boggart">boggart</a> turns into a <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementor</a> in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Remus' undercover assignment with the <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolves</a> prevented him from maintaining contact with Harry in the wake of his <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">godfather</a>'s death, something about which he expressed regret. On the few occasions that they saw each other during Harry's sixth year, Harry was worried about Remus' increasingly haggard and gaunt appearance. He displayed a protective streak towards Remus, expressing anger over his forced resignation from <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> and the general perception of <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolves</a>.
</p><p>In <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, Harry was thrilled to hear of Remus' marriage to <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a> and was puzzled by Lupin's increasingly worried appearance. He was outraged when Remus temporarily left his <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">wife</a> for fear of their then unborn child becoming a <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolf</a>. While Harry maintained his stance on their argument, he deeply regretted the harsh words he said to Remus in his anger. When Remus' son <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a> was born, Harry was relieved that Remus had clearly forgiven him, and was overwhelmed but delighted to be made Teddy's godfather. Remus also spoke about Harry on <a href="/wiki/Potterwatch" title="Potterwatch">Potterwatch</a>, saying that if Harry could hear him he would tell him to trust his instincts which were "<i>nearly always right</i>". This deeply affected Harry who was then informed by Ron that Lupin was back with Tonks, having apparently listened to what Harry had said despite the way he said it.
</p><p>Of all the people who died during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, Remus' death, along with those of his wife, <a href="/wiki/Nymphadora_Tonks" title="Nymphadora Tonks">Nymphadora Tonks</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a>, were the ones that hit Harry the hardest. Remus was one of the spirits that was summoned by the <a href="/wiki/Resurrection_Stone" title="Resurrection Stone">Resurrection Stone</a> to speak to Harry and give him the support he needed as he walked to what he believed was his death, indicating the almost familial bond between Remus and Harry.
</p><p>In <i><a href="/wiki/Fantastic_Beasts_and_Where_to_Find_Them" title="Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them">Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them</a></i>, Harry wrote in the werewolf section that they "<i>aren't all bad</i>", and Harry and <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Remus' son, Teddy</a> became very close after the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">war</a>. Harry and his family had dinner with Teddy four times a week and Harry's children hoped that Teddy would either be married into the Weasley-Potter family, or Harry would ask Teddy to move in with <a href="/wiki/Potter_family" title="Potter family">the Potters</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Minerva_McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Why would Harry Potter try and get inside <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw_Tower" title="Ravenclaw Tower">Ravenclaw Tower</a>? Potter belongs in </i>my<i> house!.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;<a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a> confronting <a href="/wiki/Amycus_Carrow" title="Amycus Carrow">Amycus Carrow</a>, proud that Harry was in Gryffindor<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tleft show-info-icon" style="width: 140px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220657" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Mcgonagall"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Mcgonagall.jpg" 	data-image-name="Mcgonagall.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220657"  	 width="140"  	 height="199"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/84/Mcgonagall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/140?cb=20141122220657" 	 alt="Mcgonagall"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Mcgonagall.jpg" 	data-image-name="Mcgonagall.jpg" 	 	 width="140"  	 height="199"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Mcgonagall.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Minerva McGonagall: Head of his house, teacher, friend, and protector</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry had a strong relationship with his <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">Transfiguration</a> teacher and Head of <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> House, Professor <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>. Though theirs was a typical student-teacher relationship for Harry's first three years at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, after Harry was selected to become a Triwizard Champion, the sheer level of danger he faced seemed to warm her to him. In Harry's <a href="/wiki/1995-1996_school_year" title="1995-1996 school year" class="mw-redirect">fifth year</a>, McGonagall urged Harry not to give <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> or the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry</a> any more ammunition to use against him, and she later stood up for him to Umbridge, promising to help Harry become an Auror if it was the last thing she did. Harry felt a powerful surge of anger when Umbridge later gloated that Minerva was too ill to talk to anyone after being hit in the chest with four simultaneous <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">Stunners</a>.
</p><p>McGonagall considered him a talented and likeable wizard<sup id="cite_ref-DH33_82-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH33-82">[83]</a></sup> and expressed pride at having Harry in her house, In turn Harry felt affection for her. He was so enranged at <a href="/wiki/Amycus_Carrow" title="Amycus Carrow">Amycus Carrow</a> for spitting in McGonagall's face, that he succeeded in using the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> on the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eater" title="Death Eater" class="mw-redirect">Death Eater</a>, agreeing with Bellatrix Lestrange's assertion that one had to "<i>really mean it</i>" in order to perform the curse effectively. McGonagall returned Harry's devotion by arming Hogwarts on Harry's request, and then fighting Voldemort head on in the final battle. When <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> had Harry's seemingly dead body brought out from the Forest, Minerva gave a terrible cry, to rival those of Ron, Hermione, and Ginny and later embraced him when he revealed himself to be alive and killed Voldemort. Professor McGonagall was like a strict and loving grandmother to Harry.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Severus_Snape">Severus Snape</span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2">"<i>You have your mother's eyes.</i>"</span>
</dd><dd>&#8212;Severus Snape's to Harry Potter before he died<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows:_Part_2" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2">[src]</a></sup>
</dd><dd></div>
</dd></dl>
<figure class="article-thumb tright show-info-icon" style="width: 145px"> 	<a href="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Odfestudiohq3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141122220746" 	class="image image-thumbnail" 	 	 	><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" 	 alt="Odfestudiohq3"  	class="thumbimage lzy lzyPlcHld " 	 	data-image-key="Odfestudiohq3.jpg" 	data-image-name="Odfestudiohq3.jpg" 	 data-src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Odfestudiohq3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220746"  	 width="145"  	 height="197"  	 	 	 onload="if(typeof ImgLzy===&#39;object&#39;){ImgLzy.load(this)}"  	><noscript><img src="http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Odfestudiohq3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width/145?cb=20141122220746" 	 alt="Odfestudiohq3"  	class="thumbimage " 	 	data-image-key="Odfestudiohq3.jpg" 	data-image-name="Odfestudiohq3.jpg" 	 	 width="145"  	 height="197"  	 	 	 	></noscript></a>  	<figcaption> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Odfestudiohq3.jpg" class="sprite info-icon"></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Severus Snape: teacher, protector, and former enemy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During his years in school, Harry's relationship with <a href="/wiki/Potions_master" title="Potions master" class="mw-redirect">Potions master</a> <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> was nothing short of deepest mutual loathing. When Harry first saw Snape in the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a> at Hogwarts, he got the initial feeling that Snape disliked him; only after his first <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a> lesson did Harry realise the resentment dug much deeper. Harry soon learned that Snape saw Harry as a younger version of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">his father</a> — a self-centred boy who enjoyed the attention paid to him, and was "<i>so arrogant that criticism simply bounced off him.</i>" 
</p><p>In <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, after having "looked inside" <a href="/wiki/Voldemort" title="Voldemort" class="mw-redirect">Voldemort</a> 's mind, and discovering that <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a>, who was on guard duty at the<a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries"> Department of Mysteries</a> , was to be killed by <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, Voldemort's snake, <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore" title="Dumbledore" class="mw-redirect">Dumbledore</a> ordered Snape to teach Harry the skill of <a href="/wiki/Occlumency" title="Occlumency">Occlumency</a>, to block his mind from Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimency</a> probing. A very tedious and trying set of lessons, at one point Snape provoked Harry into casting a shield charm, which allowed Harry to catch a glimpse of Snape's own memories. Later, when Snape left the room to attend to <a href="/wiki/Montague" title="Montague" class="mw-redirect">Montague</a>, Harry entered the <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">pensieve</a> in order to see what memories Snape was hiding from him — which turned out to be of Snape being taunted by <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_I" title="James Potter I">James Potter I</a> and the other Marauders, and of Snape calling Lily a mudblood out of humiliation. This caused Harry great distress because he had never before believed a word of Snape's criticisms of James. Although humbling Harry somewhat towards Snape, they still retained a very strained and bitter relationship during Harry's remaining time at Hogwarts.
</p><p>In <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, Snape's relationship with Harry was further strained when Harry helped <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> escape as Snape during that time believed that Sirius betrayed Harry's mother <a href="/wiki/Lily_Evans" title="Lily Evans">Lily Potter I</a>, whom he loved since childhood, to Voldemort. Harry, on the other hand, had learned that Sirius was innocent, having been framed by <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a> who was the actual culprit.
</p>
